<body>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">INTO MY OWN<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">One of my wishes is that those dark trees,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">So old and firm they scarcely show the breeze,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Were not, as 'twere, the merest mask of gloom,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">But stretched away unto the edge of doom.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I should not be withheld but that some day<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Into their vastness I should steal away,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Fearless of ever finding open land,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Or highway where the slow wheel pours the sand.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I do not see why I should e'er turn back,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Or those should not set forth upon my track<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">To overtake me, who should miss me hdre<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And long to know if still I held them dg&amp;r.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">They would not find me changed from him they<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">knew<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Only more sure of all I thought was true.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">GHOST HOUSE<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I dwell in a lonely house I know<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">That vanished many a summer ago,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And left no trace but the cellar walls,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And a cellar in which the daylight falls,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And the purple-stemmed wild raspberries grow.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">O'er ruined fences the grape-vines shield<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The woods come back to the mowing field;<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The orchard tree has grown one copse<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Of new wood and old where the woodpecker chops;<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The footpath down to the well is healed.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I dwell with a strangely aching heart<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">In that vanished abode there far apart<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">On that disused and forgotten road<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">That has no dust-bath now for the toad.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Night comes; the black bats tumble and dart;<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The whippoorwill is coming to shout<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And hush and cluck and flutter about:<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I hear him begin far enough away<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Full many a time to say his say<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Before he arrives to say it out.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">THE PASTURE<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I'm going out to clean the pasture spring;<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I'll only stop to rake the leaves away<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">(And wait to watch the water clear, I may):<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I sha'n't be gone long. You come too.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I'm going out to fetch the little calf<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">That's standing by the mother. It's so young.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">It totters when she licks it with her tongue.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I sha'n't be gone long. You come too.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">INTO MY OWN<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">One of my wishes is that those dark trees,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">So old and firm they scarcely show the breeze,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Were not, as 'twere, the merest mask of gloom,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">But stretched away unto the edge of doom.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I should not be withheld but that some day<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Into their vastness I should steal away,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Fearless of ever finding open land,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Or highway where the slow wheel pours the sand.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I do not see why I should e'er turn back,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Or those should not set forth upon my track<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">To overtake me, who should miss me hdre<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And long to know if still I held them dg&amp;r.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">They would not find me changed from him they<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">knew<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Only more sure of all I thought was true.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">GHOST HOUSE<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I dwell in a lonely house I know<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">That vanished many a summer ago,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And left no trace but the cellar walls,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And a cellar in which the daylight falls,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And the purple-stemmed wild raspberries grow.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">O'er ruined fences the grape-vines shield<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The woods come back to the mowing field;<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The orchard tree has grown one copse<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Of new wood and old where the woodpecker chops;<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The footpath down to the well is healed.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I dwell with a strangely aching heart<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">In that vanished abode there far apart<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">On that disused and forgotten road<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">That has no dust-bath now for the toad.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Night comes; the black bats tumble and dart;<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The whippoorwill is coming to shout<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And hush and cluck and flutter about:<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I hear him begin far enough away<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Full many a time to say his say<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Before he arrives to say it out.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">It is under the small, dim, summer star.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">\ know not who these mute folk are<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Who share the unlit place with me<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Those stones out under the low-limbed tree<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Doubtless bear names that the mosses mar.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">They are tireless folk, but slow and sad,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Though two, close-keeping, are lass and lad,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">With none among them that ever sings,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And yet, in view of how many things,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">rVs sweet companions as might be had.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">MY NOVEMBER GUEST<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">JVly Sorrow, when she's here with me,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Thinks these dark days of autumn rain<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Are beautiful as days can be;<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">She loves the bare, the withered tree;<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">She walks the sodden pasture lane.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Her pleasure will not let me stay.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">She talks and I am fain to list:<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">She's glad the birds are gone away,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">She's glad her simple worsted grey<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Is silver now with clinging mist.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The desolate, deserted trees,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The faded earth, the heavy sky,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The beauties she so truly sees,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">She thinks I have no eye for these,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And vexes me for reason why.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Not yesterday I learned to know<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The love of bare November days<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Before the coming of the snow,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">But it were vain to tell her so,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And they are better for her praise.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">TO THE THAWING WIND<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">C^ome with rain, O loud Southwester!<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Bring the singer, bring the nester;<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Give the buried flower a dream;<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Make the settled snow-bank stream;<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Find the brown beneath the white;<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">But whate'er you do to-night,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Bathe my window, make it flow &gt;<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Melt it as the ice will go;<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Melt the glass and leave the sticks<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Like a hermit's crucifix;<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Burst into my narrow stall;<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Swing the picture on the wall;<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Run the rattling pages o'er;<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Scatter poems on the floor;<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Turn the poet out of door.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">12<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">A PRAYER IN SPRING<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Oh, give us pleasure in the flowers to-day;<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And give us not to think so far away<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">As the uncertain harvest; keep us here<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">All simply in the springing of the year.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Oh, give us pleasure in the orchard white,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Like nothing else by day, like ghosts by night;<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And make us happy in the happy bees,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The swarm dilating round the perfect trees.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And make us happy in the darting bird<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">That suddenly above the bees is heard,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The meteor that thrusts in with needle bill,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And off a blossom in mid air stands still.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">For this is love and nothing else is love,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The which it is reserved for God above<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">To sanctify to what far ends He will,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">But which it only needs that we fulfil.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">13<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">LOVE AND A QUESTION<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">A Stranger came to the door at eve,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And he spoke the bridegroom fair.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">He bore a green- white stick in his hand,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And, for all burden, care.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">He asked with the eyes more than the lips<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">For a shelter for the night,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And he turned and looked at the road afar<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Without a window light.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The bridegroom came forth into the porch<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">With 'Let us look at the sky,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And question what of the night to be,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Stranger, you and I.'<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The woodbine leaves littered the yard,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The woodbine berries were blue,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Autumn, yes, winter 'was in the wind;<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">* Stranger, I wish I knew.'<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Within, the bride in the dusk alone<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Bent over the open fire,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Her face rose-red with the glowing coal<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And the thought of the heart's desire.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The bridegroom, looked at the weary road,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Yet saw but her within,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And wished her heart in a case of gold<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And pinned with a silver pin.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The bridegroom thought it little to give<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">A dole of bread, a purse,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">A heartfelt prayer for the poor of God,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Or for the rich a curse;<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">But whether or not a man was asked<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">To mar the love of two<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">By harboring woe in the bridal house,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The bridegroom wished he knew.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">STARS<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">How countlessly they congregate<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">O'er our tumultuous snow.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Which flows in shapes as tall as trees<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">"When wintry winds do blow! -<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">As if with keenness for our fate,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Our faltering few steps on<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">To white rest, and a place of rest<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Invisible at dawn,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And yet with neither love nor hate,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Those stars like some snow-white<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Minerva's snow-white marble eyes<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Without the gift of sight.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">1C<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">STORM FEAR<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">\Vhen the wind works against us in the dark,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And pelts with snow<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The lower chamber window on the east,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And whispers with a sort of stifled bark,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The beast,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">'Come out! Come outf-<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">it costs no inward struggle not to go,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Ah, no!<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I count our strength,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Two and a child,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Those of us not asleep subdued to mark<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">How the cold creeps as the fire dies at length,-<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">How drifts are piled,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Dooryard and road ungraded,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Till even the comforting barn grows far away,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And my heart owns a doubt<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Whether 'tis in us to arise with day<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And save ourselves unaided.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">11<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">TO THE THAWING WIND<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">with rain, O loud South wester!<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Bring the singer, bring the nester;<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Give the buried flower a dream;<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Make the settled snow-bank stream;<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Find the brown beneath the white;<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">But whatever you do to-night,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Bathe my window, make it flow &gt;<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Melt it as the ice will go;<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Melt the glass and leave the sticks<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Like a hermit's crucifix;<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Burst into my narrow stall;<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Swing the picture on the wall;<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Run the rattling pages o'er;<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Scatter poems on the floor;<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Turn the poet out of door.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">12<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">A PRAYER IN SPRING<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Oh, give us pleasure in the flowers to-day;<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And give us not to think so far away<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">As the uncertain harvest; keep us here<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">All simply in the springing of the year.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Oh, give us pleasure in the orchard white,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Like nothing else by day, like ghosts by night;<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And make us happy in the happy bees,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The swarm dilating round the perfect trees.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And make us happy in the darting bird<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">That suddenly above the bees is heard,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The meteor that thrusts in with needle bill,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And off a blossom in mid air stands still.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">For this is love and nothing else is love,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The which it is reserved for God above<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">To sanctify to what far ends He will,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">But which it only needs that we fulfil.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">13<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">FLOWER-GATHERING<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">1 left you in the morning,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And in the morning glow,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">You walked a way beside me<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">To make me sad to go.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Do you know me in the gloaming,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Gaunt and dusty grey with roaming?<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Are you dumb because you know me not,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Or dumb because you know?<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">All for me? And not a question<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">For the faded flowers gay<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">That could take me from beside you<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">For the ages of a day?<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">They are yours, and be the measure<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Of their worth for you to treasure,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The measure of the little while<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">That I've been long away.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">ROSE POGONIAS<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">A saturated meadow,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Sun-shaped and jewel-small,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">A circle scarcely wider<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Than the trees around were tall;<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Where winds were quite excluded,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And the air was stifling sweet<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">With the breath of many flowers,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">A temple of the heat.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">There we bowed us in the burning,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">As the sun's right worship is,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">To pick where none could miss them<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">A thousand orchises;<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">For though the grass was scattered,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Yet every second spear<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Seemed tipped with wings of color,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">That tinged the atmosphere.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">We raised a simple prayer<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Before we left the spot,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">That in the general mowing<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">That place might be forgot;<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Or if not all so favoured,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Obtain such grace of hours,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">That none should mow the grass there<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">While so confused with flowers.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">15<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">WAITING<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">AFIELD AT DUSK<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">What things for dream there are when spectre-like,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Moving among tall haycocks lightly piled,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I enter alone upon the stubble field,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">From which the laborers' voices late have died,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And in the antiphony of afterglow<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And rising full moon, sit me down<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Upon the full moon's side of the first haycock<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And lose myself amid so many alike.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I dream upon the opposing lights of the hour,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Preventing shadow until the moon prevail;<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I dream upon the night-hawks peopling heaven,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Each circling each with vague unearthly cry,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Or plunging headlong with fierce twang afar;<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And on the bat's mute antics, who would seem<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Dimly to have made out my secret place,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Only to lose it when he pirouettes,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And seek it endlessly with purblind haste;<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">On the last swallow's sweep; and on the rasp<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">In the abyss of odor and rustle at my back,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">That, silenced by my advent, finds once more,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">After an interval, his instrument,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And tries once twice and thrice if I be there;<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And on the worn book of old-golden song<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I brought not here to read, it seems, but hold<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">16<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And freshen in this air of withering sweetness;<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">But on the memory of one absent most,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">For whom these lines when they shall greet her eye.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">17<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">IN NEGLECT<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">1 hey leave us so to the -way we took,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">As two in whom they were proved mistaken.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">That we sit sometimes in the wayside nook,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">With mischievous &gt; vagrant, seraphic look,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And try if we cannot feel forsaken.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">18<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">THE VANTAGE POINT<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">If tired of trees I seek again mankind,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Well I know where to hie me in the dawn,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">To a slope where the cattle keep the lawn.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">There amid lolling juniper reclined,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Myself unseen, I see in white defined fc<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Far off the homes of men, and farther still,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The graves of men on an opposing hill,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Living or dead, whichever are to mind.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And if by noon I have too much of these,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I have but to turn on my arm, and lo,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The sun-burned hillside sets my face aglow,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">My breathing shakes the bluet like a breeze,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I smell the earth, I smell the bruised plant,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I look into the crater of the ant.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">19<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">MOWING<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">1 here was never a sound beside the wood but one,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And that was my long scythe whispering to the<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">ground.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">What was it it whispered? I knew not well myself;<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Perhaps it was something about the heat of the sun,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Something, perhaps, about the lack of sound<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And that was why it whispered and did not speak.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">It was no dream of the gift of idle hours,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Or easy gold at the hand of fay or elf:<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Anything more than the truth would have seemed<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">too weak<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">To the earnest love that laid the swale in rows,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Not without feeble-pointed spikes of flowers<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">(Pale orchises), and scared a bright green snake.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The fact is the sweetest dream that labor knows.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">My long scythe whispered and left the hay to make.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">20<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">GOING FOR WATER<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">1 he well was dry beside the door,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And so we went with pail and can<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Across the fields behind the house<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">To seek the brook if still it ran;<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Not loth to have excuse to go,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Because the autumn eve was fair<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">(Though chill), because the fields were ours,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And by the brook our woods were there.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">We ran as if to meet the moon<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">That slowly dawned behind the trees,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The barren boughs without the leaves,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Without the birds, without the breeze.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">But once within the wood, we paused<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Like gnomes that hid us from the moon,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Ready to run to hiding new<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">With laughter when she found us soon.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Each laid on other a staying hand<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">To listen ere we dared to look,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And in the hush we joined to make<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">We heard, we knew we heard the brook.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">21<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">A note as from a single place,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">A slender tinkling fall that made<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Now drops that floated on the pool<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Like pearls, and now a silver blade.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">22<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">REVELATION<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">\Ve make ourselves a place apart<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Behind light words that tease and flout,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">But oh, the agitated heart<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Till someone find us really out.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">'Tis pity if the case require<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">(Or so we say) that in the end<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">We speak the literal to inspire<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The understanding of a friend.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">But so with all, from babes that play<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">At hide-and-seek to God afar,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">So all who hide too well away<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Must speak and tell us where they are.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">THE TUFT OF FLOWERS<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">1 went to turn the grass once after one<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Who mowed it in the dew before the sun.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The dew was gone that made his blade so keen<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Before I came to view the levelled scene.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">f looked for him behind an isle of trees;<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I listened for his whetstone on the breeze.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">But he had gone his way, the grass all mown,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And I must be, as he had been, alone,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">'As all must be/ I said within my heart,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">'Whether they work together or apart/<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">But as I said it, swift there passed me by<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">On noiseless wing a bewildered butterfly,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Seeking with memories grown dim o'er night<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Some resting flower of yesterday's deKght.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And once I marked his flight go round and round,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">As where some flower lay withering on the ground,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">i<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And then he flew as far as eye could see,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And then on tremulous wing came back to me.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I thought of questions that have no reply,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And would have turned to toss the grass to dry;<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">But he turned first, and led my eye to look<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">At a tall tuft of flowers beside a brook,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">A leaping tongue of bloom the scythe had spared<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Beside a reedy brook the scythe had bared.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I left my place to know them by their name,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Finding them butterfly weed when I came.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The mower in the dew had loved them thus,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">By leaving them to flourish, not for us,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Nor yet to draw one thought of ours to him,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">But from sheer morning gladness at the brim.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The butterfly and I had lit upon,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Nevertheless, a message from the dawn,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">That made me hear the wakening birds around,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And hear his long scythe whispering to the ground,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And feel a spirit kindred to my own;<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">So that henceforth I worked no more alone;<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">But glad with him, I worked as with his aid,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And weary, sought at noon with him the shade;<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And dreaming, as it were, held brotherly speech<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">With one whose thought I had not hoped to reach.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">v Men work together/ I told him from the heart,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">'Whether they work together or apart.'<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">.26<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">THE DEMIURGE'S LAUGH<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">It was far in the sameness of the wood;<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I was running with joy on the Demon's trail,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Though I knew what I hunted was no true god.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">It was just as the light was beginning to fail<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">That I suddenly heard all I needed to hear:<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">It has lasted me many and many a year.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The sound was behind me instead of before,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">A sleepy sound, but mocking half,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">As of one who utterly couldn't care.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The Demon arose from his wallow to laugh,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Brushing the dirt from his eye as he went;<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And well I knew what the Demon meant.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I shall not forget how his laugh rang out.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I felt as a fool to have been so caught,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And checked my steps to make pretence<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">It was something among the leaves I sought<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">(Though doubtful whether he stayed to see).<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Thereafter I sat me against a tree.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">A LINE-STORM SONG<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The line-storm clouds fly tattered and swiftj<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The road is forlorn all day,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">\Vhere a myriad snowy quartz stones lift,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And the hoof-prints vanish away.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The roadside flowers, too wet for the bee,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Expend their bloom in vain.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Come over the hills and far with me,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And be my love in the rain.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The birds have less to say for themselves<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">In the wood- world's torn despair<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Than now these numberless years the elves A<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Although they are no less there:<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">All song of the woods is crushed like some<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Wild, easily shattered rose.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Come, be my love in the wet woods, come,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Where the boughs rain when it blows.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">There is the gale to urge behind<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And bruit our singing down,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And the shallow waters aflutter with wind<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">From which to gather your gown.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">What matter if we go clear to the west,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And come not through dry-shod?<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">For wilding brooch shall wet your breast<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The rain-fresh goldenrod.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">28<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Oh, never this whelming east wind swells<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">But it seems like the sea's return<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">To the ancient lands where it left the shells<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Before the age of the fern;<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And it seems like the time when after doubt<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Our love came back amain.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Oh, come forth into the storm and rout<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And be my love in the rain.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">OCTOBER<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">O hushed October morning mild,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Thy leaves have ripened to the fall;<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">To-morrow's wind, if it be wild,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Should waste them all.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The crows above the forest call;<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">To-morrow they may form and go.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">O hushed October morning mild,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Begin the hours of this day slow.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Make the day seem to us less brief.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Hearts not averse to being beguiled,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Beguile us in the way you know.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
