<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Release one leaf at break of day;<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">At noon release another leaf;<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">One from our trees, one far away.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Retard the sun with gentle mist;<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Enchant the land with amethyst.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Slow, slow!<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">For the grapes' sake, if they were all,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Whose leaves already are burnt with frost,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Whose clustered fruit must else be lost<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">For the grapes' sake along the wall.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">RELUCTANCE<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">vJut through the fields and the woods<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And over the walls I have wended;<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I have climbed the hills of view<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And looked at the world., and descended;<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I have come by the highway home,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And lo, it is ended.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The leaves are all dead on the ground,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Save those that the oak is keeping<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">To ravel them one by one<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And let them go scraping and creeping<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Out over the crusted snow,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">\Vhen others are sleeping.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And the dead leaves lie huddled and still,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">No longer blown hither and thither;<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The last lone aster is gone;<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The flowers of the witch-hazel wither;<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The heart is still aching to seek,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">But the feet question 'Whither?*<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Ah, when to the heart of man<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">"Was it ever less than a treason<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">To go with the drift of things,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">To yield with a grace to reason,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And bow and accept the end<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Of a love or a season?<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">North of Boston<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">MENDING WALL<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Something there is that doesn't love a wall,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">That sends the frozen-ground-swell under it,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And spills the upper boulders in the sun;<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And makes gaps even two can pass abreast.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The work of hunters is another thing:<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I have come after them and made repair<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Where they have left not one stone on a stone,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">But they would have the rabbit out of hiding,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">To please the yelping dogs. The gaps I mean,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">No one has seen them made or heard them made<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">But at spring mending-time we find them there.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I let my neighbour know beyond the hill;<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And on a day we meet to walk the line<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And set the wall between us once again.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">We keep the wall between us as we go.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">To each the boulders *hat have fallen to each.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And some are loaves and some so nearly balls<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">We have to use a spell to make them balance:<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">'Stay where you are until our backs are turned \ y<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">We wear our fingers rough with handling them.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Oh, just another kind of out-door game,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">One on a side. It comes to little more:<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">There where it is we do not need the wall:<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">He is all pine and I am apple orchard.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">My apple trees will never get across<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And eat the cones under his pines, I tell him.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">He only says, 'Good fences make good neighbours/<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">35<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Spring is the mischief in me, and I wonder<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">If I could put a notion in his head:<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">'Why do they make good neighbours? Isn't it<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Where there are cows? But here there are no cows.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Before I built a wall I'd ask to know<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">What I was walling in or walling out,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And to whom I was like to give offence.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Something there is that doesn't love a wall,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">That wants it down/ I could say ( EIves' to him,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">But it's not elves exactly, and I'd rather<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">He said it for himself. I see him there<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Bringing a stone grasped firmly by the top<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">In each hand, like an old-stone savage armed.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">He moves in darkness as it seems to me,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Not of woods only and the shade of trees.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">He will not go behind his father's saying,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And he likes having thought of it so well<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">He says again, 'Good fences make good neighbours.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">THE MOUNTAIN<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">1 he mountain held the town as in a shadow.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I saw so much before I slept there once:<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I noticed that I missed stars in the west,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Where its black body cut into the sky.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Near me it seemed: I felt it like a wall<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Behind which I was sheltered from a wind.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And yet between the town and it I found,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">When I walked forth at dawn to see new things,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Were fields, a river, and beyond, more fields.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The river at the time was fallen away,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And made a widespread brawl 011 cobble-stones;<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">But the signs showed what it had done in spring:<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Good grass-land gullied out, and in the grass<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Ridges of sand, and driftwood stripped of bark.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I crossed the river and swung round the mountain.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And there I met a man who moved so slow<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">With white-faced oxen in a heavy cart,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">It seemed no harm to stop him altogether.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">'What town is this?' I asked.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">'This? Lunenburg.'<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Then I was wrong: the town of my sojourn,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Beyond the bridge, was not that of the mountain,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">But only felt at night its shadowy presence.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">* Where is your village? Very far from here?*<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">45<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">There is no village only scattered farms.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">We were but sixty voters last election.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">We can't in nature grow to many more:<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">That thing takes all the room!' He moved his goad.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The mountain stood there to be pointed at.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">asture ran up the side a little way,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">\nd then there was a wall of trees with trunks;<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">After that only tops of trees, and cliffs<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Imperfectly concealed among the leaves.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">A dry ravine emerged from under boughs<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Into the pasture.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">'That looks like a path.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Is that the way to reach the top from here?<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Not for this morning, but some other time:<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I must be getting back to breakfast now/<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">'I don't advise your trying from this side.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">There is no proper path, but those that have<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Been up, I understand, have climbed from Ladd's.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">That's five miles back. You can't mistake the place:<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">They logged it there last winter some way up.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Td take you, but Fm bound the other way.'<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">You've never climbed it?'<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I've been on the sides,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Deer-hunting and trout-fishing. There's a brook<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">That starts up on it somewhere I've heard say<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Right on the top, tip-top a curious thing.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">46<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">But what would interest you about the brook,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">It's always cold in summer, warm in winter.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">One of the great sights going is to see<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">It steam in winter like an ox's breath,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Until the bushes all along its banks<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Are inch-deep with the frosty spines and bristles<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">You know the kind. Then let the sun shine on it!'<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">'There ought to be a view around the world<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">From such a mountain if it isn't wooded<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Clear to the top.' I saw through leafy screens<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Great granite terraces in sun and shadow,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Shelves one could rest a knee on getting up<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">With depths behind him sheer a hundred feet.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Or turn and sit on and look out and down,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">With little ferns in crevices at his elbow.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">* As to that I can't say. But there's the spring,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Right on the summit, almost like a fountain.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">That ought to be worth seeing/<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">If it's there.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">You never saw it? 1<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">'I guess there's no doubt<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">About its being there. I never saw it.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">It may not be right on the very top:<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">It wouldn't have to be a long way down<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">To have some head of water from above,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And a good distance down might not be noticed<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">47<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">By anyone who'd come a long way up.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">One time I asked a fellow climbing it<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">To look and tell me later how it was.'<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">' What did he say?'<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">'He said there was a lake<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Somewhere in Ireland on a mountain top.'<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">'But a lake's different. What about the spring?'<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">'He never got up high enough to see.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">That's why I don't advise your trying this side.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">He tried this side. I've always meant to go<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And look myself, but you know how it is:<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">It doesn't seem so much to climb a mountain<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">You've worked around the foot of all your life.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">What would I do? Go in my overalls,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">With a big stick, the same as when the cows<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Haven't come down to the bars at milking lime?<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Or with a shotgun for a stray black bear?<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">'Twouldn't seem real to climb for climbing it '<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">f l shouldn't climb it if I didn't want to<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Not for the sake of climbing. What's its name^'<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">'We call it Hor: I don't know if that's right/<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Can one walk around it? Would it be too far?'<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">( You can drive round and keep in Lunenburg,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">But it's as much as ever you can do,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The boundary lines keep in so close to it.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Hor is the township, and the township's Hor<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And a few houses sprinkled round the foot,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Like boulders broken off the upper cliff,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Rolled out a little farther than the rest/<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">' Warm in December, cold in June, you say?'<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">'I don't suppose the water's changed at all.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">You and I know enough to know it's warm<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Compared with cold, and cold compared with warm<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">But all the fun's in how you say a thing.'<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">1 You've lived here all your life?'<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">'Ever since Hor<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Was no bigger than a' What, I did not hear.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">He drew the oxen toward him with light touches<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Of his slim goad on nose and offside flank,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Gave them their marching orders and was moving,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">A HUNDRED COLLARS<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Lancaster bore him such a little town,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Such a great man. It doesn't see him often<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Of late years, though he keeps the old homestead<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And sends the children down there with their mother<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">To run wild in the summer a little wild.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Sometimes he joins them for a day or two<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And sees old friends he somehow can't get near.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">They meet him in the general store at night,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Pre-occupied with formidable mail,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Rifling a printed letter as he talks.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">They seem afraid. He wouldn't have it so:<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Though a great scholar, he's a democrat,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">If not at heart, at least on principle.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Lately when coming up to Lancaster,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">His train being late, he missed another train<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And had four hours to wait at Woodsville Junction<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">After eleven o'clock at night. Too tired<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">To think of sitting such an ordeal out,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">He turned to the hotel to find a bed.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">'No room/ the night clerk said. 'Unless'<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Woodsville's a place of shrieks and wandering lamps<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And cars that shock and rattle and one hotel.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">'You say "unless."'<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">50<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">'Unless you wouldn't mind<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Sharing a room with someone else.'<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">'Who is it?'<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">man.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">'So I should hope. What kind of man?'<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">'I know him: he's all right. A man's a man.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Separate beds, of course, you understand.'<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The night clerk blinked his eyes and dared him on.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Who's that man sleeping in the office chair?<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Has he had the refusal of my chance?'<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">'He was afraid of being robbed or murdered.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">What do you say?'<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Til have to have a bed.'<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The night clerk led him up three flights of stairs<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And down a narrow passage full of doors,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">At the last one of which he knocked and entered.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">'Lafe, here's a fellow wants to share your room.'<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">'Show him this way. I'm not afraid of him.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I'm not so drunk I can't take care of myself.'<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The night clerk clapped a bedstead on the foot.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">'This will be yours. Good-night,' he said, and went<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">'Lafe was the name, I think?'<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">'Yes, Layfayette.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">You got it the first time. And yours?'<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">'Magoon,.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Doctor Magoon.'<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">'A Doctor?'<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">'Well, a teacher/''<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">'Professor Square-the-circle-till-you're-tired?<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Hold on, there's something I don't think of now<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">That I had on my mind to ask the first<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Man that knew anything I happened in with.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I'll ask you later don't let me forget it.'<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The Doctor looked at Lafe and looked away.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">A man? A brute. Naked above the waist,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">He sat there creased and shining in the light,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Fumbling the buttons in a well-starched shirt:<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">'I'm moving into a size-larger shirt.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I've felt mean lately; mean's no name for it.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I just found what the matter was to-night:<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I've been a-choking like a nursery tree<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">When it outgrows the wire band of its name tag.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">52<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I blamed it on the hot spell we've been having.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">'Twas nothing but my foolish hanging back,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Not liking to own up I'd grown a size.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Number eighteen this is. What size do you wear?'<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The Doctor caught his throat convulsively.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">v Oh ah fourteen fourteen. '<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">'Fourteen! You say so!<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I can remember when I wore fourteen.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And come to think I must have back at home<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">More than a hundred collars, size fourteen.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Too bad to waste them all. You ought to have<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">them.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">They're yours and welcome; let me send them to<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">you.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">What makes you stand there on one leg like that?<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">You're not much furtherer than where Kike left you.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">You act as if you wished you hadn't come.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Sit down or lie down, friend; you make me nervous/<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The Doctor made a subdued dash for it,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And propped himself at bay against a pillow.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">'Not that way, with your shoes on Kike's white bed<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">You can't rest that way. Let me pull your shoes off.'<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">'Don't touch me, please I say, don't touch me,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">please.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I'll not be put to bed by you, my man.'<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">53<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">'Just as you say. Have it your own way then.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">"My man" is it? You talk like a professor.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Speaking of who's afraid of who, however,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I'm thinking I have more to lose than you<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">If anything should happen to be wrong.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Who wants to cut your number fourteen throat I<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Let's have a show down as an evidence<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Of good faith. There is ninety dollars.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Come, if you're not afraid/<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">f Tm not afraid.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">There's five: that's all I carry.'<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">1 can search you?<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Where are you moving over to? Stay still.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">You'd better tuck your money under you<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And sleep on it the way I always do<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">When I'm with people I don't trust at night.'<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">'Will you believe me if I put it there<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Right on the counterpanethat I do trust you?'<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">'You'd say so, Mister Man. I'm a collector.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">My ninety isn't mine you won't think that.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I pick it up a dollar at a time<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">All round the country for the Weekly News,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Published in Bow. You know the Weekly News?'<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">'Known it since I was young.'<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">54<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">'Then you know me.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Now we are getting on together talking.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I'm sort of Something for it at the front.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">My business is to find what people want:<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">They pay for it, and so they ought to have it.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Fairbanks, he says to mehe's editor<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">"Feel out the public sentiment" he says.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">A good deal comes on me when all is said.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The only trouble is we disagree<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">In politics: I'm Vermont Democrat<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">You know what that is, sort of double-dyed;<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The News has always been Republican.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Fairbanks, he says to me, "Help us this year,"<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Meaning by us their ticket. "No," I says,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">"I can't and won't. You've been in long enough:<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">It's time you turned around and boosted us.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">You'll have to pay me more than ten a week<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">If Fm expected to elect Bill Taft.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I doubt if I could do it anyway." '<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">1 You seem to shape the paper's policy/<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">* You see I'm in with everybody, know 'em all.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I almost know their farms as well as they do/<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">' You drive around? It must be pleasant work/<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">It's business, but I can't say it's not fun.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">What I like best's the lay of different farms,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">55<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Coming out on them from a stretch of woods,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Or over a hill or round a sudden corner.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I like to find folks getting out in spring,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Raking the dooryard, working near the house.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Later they get out further in the fields.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Everything's shut sometimes except the barn;<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The family's all away in some back meadow.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">There's a hay load a-coming when it comes.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And later still they all get driven in:<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The fields are stripped to lawn, the garden patches<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Stripped to bare ground, the maple trees<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">To whips and poles. There's nobody about.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The chimney, though, keeps up a good brisk smoking.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And I lie back and ride. I take the reins<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Only when someone's coming, and the mare<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Stops when she likes: I tell her when to go.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I've spoiled Jemima in more ways than one.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">She's got so she turns in at every house<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">As if she had some sort of curvature,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">No matter if I have no errand there.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">She thinks I'm sociable. I maybe am.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">It's seldom I get down except for meals, though.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Folks entertain me from the kitchen doorstep,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">All in a family row down to the youngest.'<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">'One would suppose they might not be as glad<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>

<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Sorry there is no cup to give you a drink.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>

<p class="p1"><span class="s1">'Not till I shrink, when they'll be out of style.'<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>

<p class="p1"><span class="s1">There now, you get some sleep/<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>

<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>

<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Anything in her after all the years.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">He fell at Gettysburg or Fredericksburg,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>

<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Fredericksburg wasn't Gettysburg, of course.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">But what I'm getting to is how forsaken<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>

<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Since she went more than ever, but before<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I don't mean altogether by the lives<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>

<p class="p1"><span class="s1">That had gone out of it, the father first,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>

<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>

<p class="p1"><span class="s1">It always seems to me a sort of mark<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">To measure how far fifty years have brought us.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Why not sit down if you are in no haste?<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">These doorsteps seldom have a visitor.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The warping boards pull out their own old nails<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">With none to tread and put them in their place.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">She had her own idea of things, the old lady.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And she liked talk. She had seen Garrison<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And Whittier, and had her story of them.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">One wasn't long in learning that she thought<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Whatever else the Civil War was for,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">It wasn't just to keep the States together,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Nor just to free the slaves, though it did both.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">65<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">She wouldn't have believed those ends enough<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">To have given outright for them all she gave.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Her giving somehow touched the principle<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">That all men are created free and equal.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And to hear her quaint phrasesso removed<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">From the world's view to-day of all those things.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">That's a hard mystery of Jefferson's.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">What did he mean? Of course the easy way<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Is to decide it simply isn't true.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">It may not be. I heard a fellow say so.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">But never mind, the Welshman got it planted<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Where it will trouble us a thousand years.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Each age will have to reconsider it.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">You couldn't tell her what the West was saying,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And what the South to her serene belief.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">She had some art of hearing and yet not<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Hearing the latter wisdom of the world.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">White was the only race she ever knew.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Black she had scarcely seen, and yellow never.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">But how could they be made so very unlike<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">By the same hand working in the same stuff?<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">She had supposed the war decided that.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">What are you going to do with such a person?<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Strange how such innocence gets its own way.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I shouldn't be surprised if in this world<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">It were the force that would at last prevail.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Do you know but for her there was a time<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">When to please younger members of the church,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Or rather say non-members in the church,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Whom we all have to think of nowadays,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">66<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I would have changed the Creed a very little?<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Not that she ever had to ask me not to;<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">It never got so far as that; but the bare thought<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Of her old tremulous bonnet in the pew,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And of her half asleep was too much for me.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Why, I might wake her up and startle her.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">It was the words "descended into Hades' '<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">That seemed too pagan to our liberal youth.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">You know they suffered from a general onslaught.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And well, if they weren't true why keep right on<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Saying them like the heathen? We could drop them.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Only there was the bonnet in the pew.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Such a phrase couldn't have meant much to her.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">But suppose she had missed it from the Creed<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">As a child misses the unsaid Good-night,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And falls asleep with heartache how should I feel?<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Fm just as glad she made me keep hands off,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">For, dear me, why abandon a belief<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Merely because it ceases to be true.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Cling to it long enough, and not a doubt<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">It will turn true again, for so it goes.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Most of the change we think we see in life<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Is due to truths being in and out of favour.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">As I sit here, and oftentimes, I wish<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I could be monarch of a desert land<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I could devote and dedicate forever<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">To the truths we keep coming back and back to.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">So desert it would have to be, so walled<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">By mountain ranges half in summer snow,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">No one would covet it or think it worth<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">67<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The pains of conquering to force change on.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Scattered oases where men dwelt, but mostly<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Sand dunes held loosely in tamarisk<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Blown over and over themselves in idleness.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Sand grains should sugar in the natal dew<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The babe born to the desert, the sand storm<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Retard mid-waste my cowering caravans-<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">There are bees in this wall. 7 He struck the clapboards,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Fierce heads looked out; small bodies pivoted.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">We rose to go. Sunset blazed on the windows.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">68<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">BLUEBERRIES 1<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">You ought to have seen what I saw on my way<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">To the village, through Patterson's pasture to-day:<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Blueberries as big as the end of your thumb,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Real sky-blue, and heavy, and ready to drum<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">In the cavernous pail of the first one to come!<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And all ripe together, not some of them green<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And some of them ripe! You ought to have seenP<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">'I don't know what part of the pasture you mean.'<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">&lt; You know where they cut off the woods let me see~<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">It was two years ago or no! can it be<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">No longer than that? and the following fall<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The fire ran and burned it all up but the wall.'<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">'Why, there hasn't been time for the bushes to grow %<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">That's always the way with the blueberries, though:<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">There may not have been the ghost of a sign<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Of them anywhere under the shade of the pine,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">But get the pine out of the way, you may burn<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The pasture all over until not a fern<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Or grass-blade is left, not to mention a stick,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And presto, they're up all around you as thick<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And hard to explain as a conjuror's trick/<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">'It must be on charcoal they fatten their fruit.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I taste in them sometimes the flavour of soot.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And after all really they're ebony skinned:<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The blue's but a mist from the breath of the wind,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">A tarnish that goes at a touch of the hand,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And less than the tan with which pickers are tanned/<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">'Does Patterson know what he has, do you think?'<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">'He may and not care and so leave the chewink<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">To gather them for him you know what he is.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">He won't make the fact that they're rightfully his<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">An excuse for keeping us other folk out/<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">'I wonder you didn't see Loren about.'<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">'The best of it was that I did. Do you know,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">[ was just getting through what the field had to show<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And over the wall and into the road,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">When who should come by, with a democrat-load<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Of all the young chattering Lorens alive,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">But Loren, the fatherly, out for a drive/<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">'He saw you, then? What did he do? Did he frown?'<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">'He just kept nodding his head up and down.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
