<p class="p1"><span class="s1">You know how politely he always goes by.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">But he thought a big thought I could tell by his eye<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Which being expressed, might be this in effect:<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">!&lt; I have left those there berries, I shrewdly suspect,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">To ripen too long. I am greatly to blame." '<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">70<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">'He's a thriftier person than some I could name/<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">'He seems to be thrifty; and hasn't he need,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">With the mouths of all those young Lorens to feed?<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">He has brought them all up on wild berries, they say,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Like birds. They store a great many away.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">They eat them the year round, and those they don't eat<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">They sell in the store and buy shoes for their feet/<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">'Who cares what they say? It's a nice way to live,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Just taking what Nature is willing to give,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Not forcing her hand with harrow and plow.'<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">'I wish you had seen his perpetual bow<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And the air of the youngsters! Not one of them turned,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And they looked so solemn-absurdly concerned/<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">'I wish I knew half what the flock of them know<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Of where all the berries and other things grow,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Cranberries in bogs and raspberries on top<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Of the boulder-strewn mountain, and when they<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">will crop.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I met them one day and each had a flower<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Stuck into his berries as fresh as a shower;<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Some strange kindthey told me it hadn't a name/<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Tve told you how once not long after we came,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I almost provoked poor Loren to mirth<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">By going to him of all people on earth<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">71<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">To ask if he knew any fruit to be had<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">For the picking. The rascal, he said he'd be glad<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">To tell if he knew. But the year had been bad.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">There had been some berries but those were all gone.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">He didn't say where they had been. He went on:<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">"I'm sure I'm sure" as polite as could be.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">He spoke to his wife in the door, "Let me see,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Mame, we don't know any good berrying place?"<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">It was all he could do to keep a straight face.'<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">'If he thinks all the fruit that grows wild is for him,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">He'll find he's mistaken. See here, for a whim,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">We'll pick in the Pattersons' pasture this year.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">We'll go in the morning, that is, if it's clear,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And the sun shines out warm: the vines must be wet.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">It's so long since I picked I almost forget<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">How we used to pick berries: we took one look round.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Then sank out of sight like trolls underground,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And saw nothing more of each other, or heard,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Unless when you said I was keeping a bird<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Away from its nest, and I said it was you.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">"Well, one of us is." For complaining it flew<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Around and around us. And then for a while<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">We picked, till I feared you had wandered a mile,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And I thought I had lost you. I lifted a shout<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Too loud for the distance you were, it turned out,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">For when you made answer, your voice was as low<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">fas talking you stood up beside me, you know/<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">( We ska'n't have the place to ourselves to enjoy<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">72<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Not likely, when all the young Lorens deploy.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">They'll be there lo-morrow, or even to-night.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">They won't be too friendly they may be polite<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">To people they look on as having no right<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">To pick where they're picking. But we won't com-<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">plain.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">You ought to have seen how it looked in the rain,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The fruit mixed with water in layers of leaves,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Like two kinds of jewels, a vision for thieves.'<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">73<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">A SERVANT TO SERVANTS<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I didn't make you know how glad I was<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">To have you come and camp here on our land.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I promised myself to get down some day<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And see the way you lived, but I don't know!<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">With a houseful of hungry men to feed<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I guess you'd find. ... It seems to me<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I can't express my feelings any more<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Than I can raise my voice or want to lift<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">My hand (oh, I can lift it when I have to).<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Did ever you feel so? I hope you never.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">It's got so I don't even know for sure<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Whether I am glad, sorry, or anything.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">There's nothing but a voice-like left inside<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">That seems to tell me how I ought to feel,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And would feel if I wasn't all gone wrong.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">You take the lake. I look and look at it.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I see it's a fair, pretty sheet of water.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I stand and make myself repeat out loud<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The advantages it has, so long and narrow,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Like a deep piece of some old running river<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Cut short off at both ends. It lies five miles<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Straight away through the mountain notch<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">From the sink window where I wash the plates,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And all our storms come up toward the house,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Drawing the slow waves whiter and whiter and<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">whiter.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">It took my mind off doughnuts and soda biscuit<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">74<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">To step outdoors and take the water dazzle<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">A sunny morning, or take the rising wind<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">About my face and body and through my wrapper,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">When a storm threatened from the Dragon's Den,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And a cold chill shivered across the lake.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I see it's a fair, pretty sheet of water,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Our Willoughby! How did you hear of it?<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I expect, though, everyone's heard of it.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">In a book about ferns? Listen to that!<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">You let things more like feathers regulate<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Your going and coming. And you like it here?<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I can see how you might. But I don't know!<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">It would be different if more people came,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">For then there would be business. As it is,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The cottages Len built, sometimes we rent them,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Sometimes we don't. We've a good piece of shore<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">That ought to be worth something, and may yet.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">But I don't count on it as much as Len.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">He looks on the bright side of everything,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Including me. He thinks I'll be all right<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">With doctoring. But it's not medicine-<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Lowe is the only doctor's dared to say so-<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">ft's rest I want there, I have said it out<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">From cooking meals for hungry hired men<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And washing dishes after them from doing<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Things over and over that just won't stay done.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">By good rights I ought not to have so much<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Put on me, but there seems no other way.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Len says one steady pull more ought to do it.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">He says the best way out is always through.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">75<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And I agree to that, or in so far<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">As that I can see no way out but through<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Leastways for me and then they'll be convinced.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">It's not that Len don't want the best for me.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">It was his plan our moving over in<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Beside the lake from where that day I showed you<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">We used to live ten miles from anywhere.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">We didn't change without some sacrifice,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">But Len went at it to make up the loss.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">His work's a man's, of course, from sun to sun,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">But he works when he works as hard as I do-<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Though there's small profit in comparisons.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">(Women and men will make them all the same. )<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">But work ain't all. Len undertakes too much.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">He's into everything in town. This year<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">It's highways, and he's got too many men<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Around him to look after that make waste.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">They take advantage of him shamefully,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And proud, too, of themselves for doing so.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">We have four here to board, great good-for-nothings,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Sprawling about the kitchen with their talk<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">While I fry their bacon. Much they care!<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">No more put out in what they do or say<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Than if I wasn't in the room at all.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Coming and going all the time, they are:<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I don't learn what their names are, let alone<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Their characters, or whether they are safe<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">To have inside the house with doors unlocked.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Fm not afraid of them, though, if they're not<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Afraid of me. There's two can play at that.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I have my fancies: it runs in the family.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">My father's brother wasn't right. They kept him<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Locked up for years back there at the old farm.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I've been away once yes, IVe been away.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The State Asylum. I was prejudiced;<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I wouldn't have sent anyone of mine there;<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">You know the old ideathe only asylum<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Was the poorhouse, and those who could afford,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Rather than send their folks to such a place,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Kept them at home; and it does seem more human.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">But it's not so: the place is the asylum.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">There they have every means proper to do with,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And you aren't darkening other people's lives-<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Worse than no good to them, and they no good<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">To you in your condition; you can't know<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Affection or the want of it in that state.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I've heard too much of the old-fashioned way.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">My father's brother, he went mad quite young.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Some thought he had been bitten by a dog,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Because his violence took on the form<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Of carrying his pillow in his teeth;<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">But it's more likely he was crossed in love,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Or so the story goes. It was some girl.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Anyway all he talked about was love.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">They soon saw he would do someone a mischief<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">If he wa'n't kept strict watch of, and it ended<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">In father's building him a sort of cage,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Or room within a room, of hickory poles,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Like stanchions in the barn, from floor to ceiling.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">A narrow passage all the way around.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Anything they put in for furniture<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">He'd tear to pieces, even a bed to lie on.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">So they made the place comfortable with straw,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Like a beast's stall, to ease their consciences.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Of course they had to feed him without dishes.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">They tried to keep him clothed, but he paraded<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">With his clothes on his arm all of his clothes.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Cruelit sounds. I 'spose they did the best<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">They knew. And just when he was at the height,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Father and mother married, and mother came,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">A bride, to help take care of such a creature,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And accommodate her young life to his.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">That was what marrying father meant to her.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">She had to lie and hear love things made dreadful<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">By his shouts in the night. He'd shout and shout<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Until the strength was shouted out of him,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And his voice died down slowly from exhaustion.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">He'd pull his bars apart like bow and bowstring,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And let them go and make them twang until<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">His hands had worn them smooth as any oxbow.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And then he'd crow as if he thought that child's play<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The only fun he had. I've heard them say, though,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">They found a way to put a stop to it.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">He was before my time I never saw him;<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">But the pen stayed exactly as it was<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">There in the upper chamber in the ell,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">A sort of catch-all full of attic clutter.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I often think of tJig^nioathJiickof.y, bars.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">It got so I would say you know, half fooling<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">'It's time I took my turn upstairs in jail'<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Just as you will till it becomes a habit.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">78<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">No wonder L was glad to get away.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Mind you, I waited till Len said the word.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I didn't want the blame if things went wrong.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I was glad though ; no end, when we moved out,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And I looked to be happy, and I was,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">As I said, for a while but I don't know!<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Somehow the change wore out like a prescription.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And there's more to it than just window-views<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And living by a lake. I'm past such help<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Unless Len took the notion, which he won't,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And I won't ask himit's not sure enough.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I 'spose I've got to go the road Fm going:<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Other folks have to, and why shouldn't I?<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">T almost think if I could do like you,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Drop everything and live out on the ground-<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">But it might be, come night, I shouldn't like it,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Or a long rain. I should soon get enough,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And be glad of a good roof overhead.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Fve lain awake thinking of you, Fll warrant,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">More than you have yourself, some of these nights.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The wonder was the tents weren't snatched away<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">From over you as you lay in your beds.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I haven't courage for a risk like that.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Bless you, of course, you're keeping me from work,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">But the thing of it is, I need to be kept.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">There's work enough to do there's always that;<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">But behind' s behind. The worst that you can do<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Is set me back a little more behind.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I sha'n't catch up in this world, anyway.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I'd rather you'd not go unless you must.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">AFTER APPLE-PICKING<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">IVly long two-pointed ladder 's sticking through a<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">tree<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Toward heaven still,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And there's a barrel that I didn't fill<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Beside it, and there may be two or three<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Apples I didn't pick upon some bough.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">But I am done with apple-picking now.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Essence of winter sleep is on the night,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The scent of apples: I am drowsing off.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I cannot rub the strangeness from my sight<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I got from looking through a pane of glass<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I skimmed this morning from the drinking trough<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And held against the world of hoary grass.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">It melted, and I let it fall and break.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">But I was well<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Upon my way to sleep before it fell,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And I could tell<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">What form my dreaming was about to take.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Magnified apples appear and disappear,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Stem end and blossom end,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And every fleck of russet showing clear.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">My instep arch not only keeps the ache,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">It keeps the pressure of a ladder-round.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I feel the ladder sway as the boughs bend.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And I keep hearing from the cellar bin<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The rumbling sound<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Of load on load of apples coming in.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">80<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">For I have had too much<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Of apple-picking: I am overtired<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Of the great harvest I myself desired.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">There were ten thousand thousand fruit to touch,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Cherish in hand, lift down, and not let fall.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">For all<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">That struck the earth,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">No matter if not bruised or spiked with stubble,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Went surely to the cider-apple heap<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">As of no worth.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">One can see what will trouble<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">This sleep of mine, whatever sleep itj.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Were he not gone,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The woodchuck could say whether it's like his<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Long sleep, as I describe its coming on,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Or just some human sleep.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">81<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">THE CODE<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">1 here were three in the meadow by the brook<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Gathering up windrows, piling cocks of hay,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">With an eye always lifted toward the west<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Where an irregular sun-bordered cloud<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Darkly advanced with a perpetual dagger<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Flickering across its bosom. Suddenly<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">One helper, thrusting pitchfork in the ground,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Marched himself off the field and home. One stayed.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The town-bred farmer failed to understand.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">* What is there wrong?'<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">'Something you just now said/<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">' What did I say?'<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">* About our taking pains/<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">'To cock the hay? because it's going to shower?<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I said that more than half an hour ago.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I said it to myself as much as you/<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">'You didn't know. But James is one big fool.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">He thought you meant to find fault with his work.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">That's what the average farmer would have meant.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">James would take time, of course, to chew it over<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Before he acted: he's just got round to act/<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">82<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">'He is a fool if that's the way he takes me.'<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">'Don't let it bother you. You've found out something<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The hand that knows his business won't be told<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">To do work better 01 fasterthose two things.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I'm as particular as anyone:<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Most likely I'd have served you just the same.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">But I know you don't understand our ways.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">You were just talking what was in your mind,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">What was in all our minds, and you weren't hinting.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Tell you a story of what happened once:<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I was up here in Salem at a man's<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Named Sanders with a gang of four or five<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Doing the haying. No one liked the boss.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">He was one of the kind sports call a spider,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">All wiry arms and legs that spread out wavy<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">From a humped body nigh as big's a biscuit<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">But work! that man could work, especially<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">If by so doing he could get more work<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Out of his hired help. I'm not denying<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">He was hard on himself. I couldn't find<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">That he kept any hours not for himself.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Daylight and lantern-light were one to him:<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I've heard him pounding in the barn all night.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">But what he liked was someone to encourage.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Them that he couldn't lead he'd get behind<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And drive, the way you can, you know, in mowing-<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Keep at their heels and threaten to mow their legs off<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I'd seen about enough of his bulling tricks<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">(We call that bulling). I'd been watching him.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">83<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">So when he paired off with me in the hayfield<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">To load the load, thinks I, Look out for trouble.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I built the load and topped it off; old Sanders<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Combed it down with a rake and says, "O. K."<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Everything went well till we reached the barn<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">With a big jag to empty in a bay.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">You understand that meant the easy job<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">For the man up on top of throwing down<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The hay and rolling it off wholesale,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Where on a mow it would have been slow lifting.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">You wouldn't think a fellow'd need much urging<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Under those circumstances, would you now?<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">But the old fool seizes his fork in both hands,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And looking up bewhiskered out of the pit,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Shouts like an army captain, "Let her come!"<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Thinks I, D'ye mean it? " What was that you said?"<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I asked out loud, so's there'd be no mistake,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">"Did you say, Let her come?" "Yes, let her come."<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">He said it over, but he said it softer.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Never you say a thing like that to a man,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Not if he values what he is. God, I'd as soon<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Murdered him as left out his middle name.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Fd built the load and knew right where to find it.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Two or three forkfuls I picked lightly round for<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Like meditating, and then I just dug in<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And dumped the rackful on him in ten lots.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I looked over the side once in the dust<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And caught sight of him treading- water-like,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Keeping his head above. "Damn ye," I says,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">84<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">"That gets ye!" He squeaked like a squeezed rat.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">That was the last I saw or heard of him.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I cleaned the rack and drove out to cool off.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">As I sat mopping hayseed from my neck,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And sort of waiting to be asked about it,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">One of the boys sings out, " Where's the old man?"<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">"I left him in the barn under the hay.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">If ye want him, ye can go and dig him out."<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">They realized from the way I swobbed my neck<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">More than was needed something must be up.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">They headed for the barn; I stayed where I was.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">They told me afterward. First they forked hay,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">A lot of it, out into the barn floor.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Nothing! They listened for him. Not a rustle.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I guess they thought I'd spiked him in the temple<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Before I buried him, or I couldn't have managed.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">They excavated more. "Go keep his wife<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Out of the barn." Someone looked in a window,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And curse me if he wasn't in the kitchen<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Slumped way down in a chair, with both his feet<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Against the stove, the hottest day that summer.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">He looked so clean disgusted from behind<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">There was no one that dared to stir him up,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Or let him know that he was being looked at.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Apparently I hadn't buried him<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">(I may have knocked him down); but my just trying<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">To bury him had hurt his dignity.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">He had gone to the house so's not to meet me.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">He kept away from us all afternoon.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">85<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">We tended to his hay. We saw him out<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">After a while picking peas in his garden:<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">He couldn't keep away from doing something.'<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">* Weren't you relieved to find he wasn't dead?'<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">No! and yet I d'jn't know it's hard to say,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I went about to kill him fair enough.'<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">' You took an awkward way. Did he discharge you? 1<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">4 Discharge me? No! He knew I did just right/<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">86<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">THE GENERATIONS OF MEN<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">A. governor it was proclaimed this time,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">When all who would come seeking in<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Hampshire<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Ancestral memories might come together.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And those of the name Stark gathered in Bow,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">A rock-strewn town where farming has fallefrofl,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And sprout-lands flourish where the axe has gone.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Someone had literally run to earth<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">In an old cellar hole in a by-road<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The origin of all the family there.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Thence they were sprung, so numerous a tribe<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">That now not all the houses left in town<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Made shift to shelter them without the help<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Of here and there a tent in grove and orchard.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">They were at Bow, but that was not enough:<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Nothing would do butthey must fix a day<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">To stand together on the crater's verge<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">That turned them on the world, and try to fathom<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The past and get some strangeness out of it.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">But rain spoiled all. The day began uncertain,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">With clouds low trailing and moments of rain that<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">misted.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The young folk held some hope out to each other<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Till well toward noon when the storm settled down<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">With a swish in the grass. 'What if the others<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Are there/ they said. 'It isn't going to rain/<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Only one from a farm not far away<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">87<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Strolled thither, not expecting he would find<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Anyone else, but out of idleness.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">One, and one other, yes, for there were two.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The second round the curving hillside road<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Was a girl; and she halted some way off<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">To reconnoitre, and then made up her mind<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">At least to pass by and see who he was,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And perhaps hear some word about the weather.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">This was some Stark she didn't know. He nodded.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">'No fete to-day/ he said.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">'It looks that way/<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">She swept the heavens, turning on her heel.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">'I only idled down/<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">'I idled down/<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Provision there had been for just such meeting<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Of stranger cousins, in a family tree<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Drawn on a sort of passport with the branch<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Of the one bearing it done in detail-<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Some zealous one's laborious device.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">She made a sudden movement toward her bodice,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">As one who clasps her heart. They laughed together.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">'Stark?' he inquired. 'No matter for the proof/<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">'Yes, Stark. And you?'<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Tm Stark.' He drew his passport.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">68<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">( You know we might not be and still be cousins:<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The town is full of Chases, Lowes, and Baileys,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">All claiming some priority in Starkness.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">My mother was a Lane, yet might have married<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Anyone upon earth and still her children<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Would have been Starks, and doubtless here to-day.'<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">( You riddle with your genealogy<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Like a Viola. I don't follow you/<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">*I only mean my mother was a Stark<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Several times over, and by marrying father<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">No more than brought us back into the name/<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">'One ought not to be thrown into confusion<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">By a plain statement of relationship,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">But I own what you say makes my head spin.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">You take my card you seem so good at such things<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And see if you can reckon our cousinship.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Why not take seats here on the cellar wall<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And dangle feet among the raspberry vines?*<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">'Under the shelter of the family tree/<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">'Just so that ought to be enough protection/<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">'Not from the rain. I think it's going to rain/<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>

<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Bowed outward on the mountain half-way up,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>

<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">1 Well then, it's Granny speaking: "I dunnow!<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>

<p class="p1"><span class="s1">But there's a dite too many of them for comfort.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>

<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And begin over" There, she'd better stop.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">You can see what is troubling Granny, though.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">But don't you think we sometimes make too much<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Of the old stock? What counts is the ideals,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And those will bear some keeping still about.'<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">'I can see we are going to be good friends.'<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">'I like your "going to be." You said just now<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">It's going to rain/<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>

<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>

<p class="p1"><span class="s1">'I know, and it was raining.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I let you say all that. But I must go now.'<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>

<p class="p1"><span class="s1">* You let me say it? on consideration?<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">How shall we say good-bye in such a case?'<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>

<p class="p1"><span class="s1">'No, I don't trust your eyes. You've said enough.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Now give me your hand up. Pick me that flower.'<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>

<p class="p1"><span class="s1">But if we must, in sunshine.' So she went.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>

<p class="p1"><span class="s1">THE HOUSEKEEPER<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>

<p class="p1"><span class="s1">It's you/ she said. 'I can't get up. Forgive mt<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Not answering your knock. I can no more<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Let people in than I can keep them out.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I'm getting too old for my size, I tell them.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">My fingers are about all I've the use of<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">So's to take any comfort. I can sew:<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>

<p class="p1"><span class="s1">' You mean? oh, for some miss.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I can't keep track of other people's daughters.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Lord, if I were to dream of everyone<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>

<p class="p1"><span class="s1">That's his mistake. The dear knows my interest<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Has been to keep the thing from breaking up.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>

<p class="p1"><span class="s1">He'd say, " Why should they?" no more words that<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">that.'<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
