<p class="p1"><span class="s1">'And after all why should they? John's been fair<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I take it. What was his was always hers.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">There was no quarrel about property.'<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">'Reason enough, there was no property.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">A friend or two as good as own the farm,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Such as it is. It isn't worth the mortgage/<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">'I mean Estelle has always held the purse/<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">'The rights of that are harder to get at.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I guess Estelle and I have filled the purse.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">'Twas we let him have money, not he us.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">John's a bad farmer. I'm not blaming him.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Take it year in, year out, he doesn't make much.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">We came here for a home for me, you know,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Estelle to do the housework for the board<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Of both of us. But look how it turns out:<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">She seems to have the housework, and besides<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Half of the outdoor work, though as for that,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">He'd say she does it more because she likes it.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">101<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">You see our pretty things are all outdoors.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Our hens and cows and pigs are always better<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Than folks like us have any business with.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Farmers around twice as well off as we<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Haven't as good. They don't go with the farm.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">One thing you can't help liking about John,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">He's fond of nice things too fond, some would say.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">But Estelle don't complain: she's like him there.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">She wants our hens to be the best there are.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">You never saw this room before a show,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Full of lank, shivery, half-drowned birds<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">In separate coops, having their plumage done.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The smell of the wet feathers in the heat!<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">You spoke of John's not being safe to stay with.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">You don't know what a gentle lot we are:<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">We wouldn't hurt a hen! You ought to see us<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Moving a flock of hens from place to place.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">We're not allowed to take them upside down,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">All we can hold together by the legs.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Two at a time's the rule, one on each arm,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">No matter how far and how many times<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">We have to go/<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">' You mean that's John's idea/<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">'And we live up to it; or I don't know<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">What childishness he wouldn't give way to.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">He manages to keep the upper hand<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">On his own farm. He's boss. But as to hens:<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">We fence our flowers in and the hens range.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">102<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Nothing's too good for them. We say it pays.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">John likes to tell the offers he has had,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Twenty for this cock, twenty-five for that.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">He never takes the money. If they're worth<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">That much to sell, they ' re worth as much to keep.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Bless you, it's all expense, though. Reach me down<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The little tin box on the cupboard shelf,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The upper shelf, the tin box. That's the one.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Til show you. Here you are/<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">'What's this?'<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">'Abill-<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">For fifty dollars for one Langshang cock<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Receipted. And the cock is in the yard/<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">'Not in a glass case, then?'<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">'He'd need a tall one:<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">He can eat off a barrel from the ground.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">He's been in a glass case, as you may say,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The Crystal Palace, London. He's imported.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">John bought him, and we paid the bill with beads-*<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Wampum, I call it. Mind, we don't complain.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">But you see, don't you, we take care of him.'<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">'And like it, too. It makes it all the worse/<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">'It seems as if. And that's not all: he's helpless<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">In ways that I can hardly tell you of.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">103<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Sometimes he gets possessed to keep accounts<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">To see where all the money goes so fast.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">You know how men will be ridiculous.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">But it's just fun the way he gets bedeviled<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">If he's untidy now, what will he be?'<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">J It makes it all the worse. You must be blind/<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">'Estelle's the one. You needn't talk to me/<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">J Can't you and I get to the root of it?<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">What's the real trouble? What will satisfy her?'<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">"It's as I say; she's turned from him, that's ali/<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">'But why, when she's well off? Is it the neighbours,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Being cut off from friends?'<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">&lt; We have our friends.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">That isn't it. Folks aren't afraid of us/<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">'She's let it worry her. You stood the strain,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And you're her mother/<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">'But I didn't always.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I didn't relish it along at first.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">But I got wonted to it. And besides<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">John said I was too old to have grandchildren.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">But what's the use of talking when it's done?<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">She won't come back it's worse than that she can't. 1<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">104<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">&lt; Why do you speak like that? What do you know?<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">What do you mean? she's done harm to herself?'<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">'I mean she's marriedmarried someone else/<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">'Oho, oho!'<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">'You don't believe me/<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">'Yes, I do,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Only too well. I knew there must be something!<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">So that was what was back. She's bad, that's all!'<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">'Bad to get married when she had the chance?'<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">'Nonsense! See what she's done! But who, but who<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">'Who'd marry her straight out of such a mess?<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Say it right out no matter for her mother.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The man was found. I'd better name no names.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">John himself won't imagine who he is/<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">'Then it's all up. I think I'll get away.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">You'll be expecting John. I pity Estelle;<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I suppose she deserves some pity, too.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">You ought to have the kitchen to yourself<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">To break it to him. You may have the job/<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">'You needn't think you're going to get away,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">John's almost here. I've had my eye on someone<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">105<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Coming down Ryan's Hill. I thought 'twas him.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Here he is now. This box! Put it away.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And this bill/<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">What's the hurry? He'll unhitch/<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">'No, he won't, either. He'll just drop the reins<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And turn Doll out to pasture, rig and all.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">She won't get far before the wheels hang up<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">On something there's no harm. See, there he is!<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">My, but he looks as if he must have heard!'<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">John threw the door wide but he didn't enter.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">'How are you, neighbour? Just the man I'm after.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Isn't it Hell,' he said. 'I want to know.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Come out here if you want to hear me talk.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Til talk to you, old woman, afterward.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I've got some news that maybe isn't news.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">What are they trying to do to me, these two? 7<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">'Do go along with him and stop his shouting/<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">She raised her voice against the closing door:<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">"Who wants to hear your news, youdreadful fool?'<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">106<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">THE FEAR<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">A lantern light from deeper in the barn<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Shone on a man and woman in the door<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And threw their lurching shadows on a house<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Near by, all dark in every glossy window.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">A horse's hoof pawed once the hollow floor,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And the back of the gig they stood beside<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Moved in a little. The man grasped a wheel,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The woman spoke out sharply, 'Whoa, stand still!<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I saw it just as plain as a white plate/<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">She said, 'as the light on the dashboard ran<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Along the bushes at the roadside a man's face.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">You must have seen it too/<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">1 didn't see it.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Are you sure'<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">' Yes, I'm sure!'<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">'it was a face?'<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">*}oel, Til have to look. I can't go in,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I can't, and leave a thing like that unsettled.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Doors locked and curtains drawn will make no dif-<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">ference.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I always have felt strange when we came home<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">To the dark house after so long an absence,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And the key rattled loudly into place<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">107<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Seemed to warn someone to be getting out<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">At one door as we entered at another.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">What if Fm right, and someone all the time-<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Don' t hold my arm!'<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">1 say it's someone passing/<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">'You speak as if this were a travelled road.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">You forget where we are. What is beyond<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">That he'd be going to or coming from<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">At such an hour of night, and on foot too?<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">What was he standing still for in the bushes?'<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">It's not so very late -it's only dark.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">There's more in it than you're inclined to say.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Did he look like-?'<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">'He looked like anyone.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I'll never rest to-night unless I know.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Give me the lantern.'<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">'You don't want the lantern.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">She pushed past him and got it for herself.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">'You're not to come/ she said. 'This is my business<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">If the time's come to face it, Fm the one<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">To put it the right way. He'd never dare<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Listen! He kicked a stone. Hear that, hear that!<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">He's coming towards us. Joel, go in please.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Hark! 1 don't hear him now. But please go in/<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">108<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">'In the first place you can't make me believe<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">it's-'<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">'It is or someone else he's sent to watch.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And now's the time to have it out with him<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">While we know definitely where he is.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Let him get off and he'll be everywhere<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Around us, looking out of trees and bushes<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Till I sha'n't dare to set a foot outdoors.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And I can't stand it. Joel, let me go!'<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">'But it's nonsense to think he'd care enough.'<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">( You mean you couldn't understand his caring.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Oh, but you see he hadn't had enough-<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Joel; I won't I won' t I promise you.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">We mustn't say hard things. You mustn't either.'<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Til be the one, if anybody goes!<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">But you give him the advantage with this light.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">What couldn't he do to us standing here!<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And if to see was what he wanted, why<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">He has seen all there was to see and gone/<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">He appeared to forget to* keep his hold,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">But advanced with her as she crossed the grass.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">4 What do you want?' she cried to all the dark.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">She stretched up tall to overlook the light<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">That hung in both hands hot against her skirt.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">'There's no one; so you're wrong/ he said.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">'There ib.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">What do you want?' she cried, and then herself<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Was startled when an answer really came.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">'Nothing/ It came from well along the road.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">She reached a hand to Joel for support:<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The smell of scorching woollen made her faint.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">"What are you doing round this house at night?'<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">'Nothing.' A pause: there seemed no more to say.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And then the voice again: You seem afraid.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I saw by the way you whipped up the horse.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I'll just come forward in the lantern light<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And let you see.'<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">'Yes, do. Joel, go back!'<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">She stood her ground against the noisy steps<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">That came on, but her body rocked a little.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">'You see/ the voice said.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">'Oh.' She looked and looked.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">110<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">1 You don't secI've a child here by the hand.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">A robber wouldn't have his family with him/<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">* What's a child doing at this time of night?'<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">'Out walking. Every child should have the memory<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Of at least one long-after-bedtime walk.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">What, son?'<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">'Then I should think you'd try to find<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Somewhere to walk'<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">'The highway, as it happens-<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">We're stopping for the fortnight down at Dean's.'<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">'But if that's all Joelyou realize<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">You won't think anything. You understand?<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">You understand that we have to be careful.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">This is a very, very lonely place.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Joel!' She spoke as if she couldn't turn.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The swinging lantern lengthened to the ground,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">It touched, it struck, it clattered and went out.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Ill<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">THE WOOD-PILE<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Out walking in the frozen swamp one grey day,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I paused and said, 'I will turn back from here.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">No, I will go on farther and we shall see/<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The hard snow held me, save where now and then<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">One foot went through. The view was all in lines<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Straight up and down of tall slim trees<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Too much alike to mark or name a place by<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">So as to say for certain I was here<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Or somewhere else: I was just far from home.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">A small bird flew before me. He was careful<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">To put a tree between us when tye lighted,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And say no word to tell me who he was<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Who was so foolish as to think what he thought.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">He thought that I was after him for a feather<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The white one in his tail; like one who takes<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Everything said as personal to himself.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">One flight out sideways would have undeceived him.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And then there was a pile of wood for which<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I forgot him and let his little fear<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Carry him off the way I might have gone,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Without so much as wishing him good-night.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">He went behind it to make his last stand.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">It was a cord of maple, cut and split<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And piled and measured, four by four by eight.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And not another like it could I see.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">No runner tracks in this year's snow looped near it.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And it was older sure than this year's cutting,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">112<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Or even last year's or the year's before.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The wood was grey and the bark warping off it<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And the pile somewhat sunken. Clematis<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Had wound strings round and round it like a bundle,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">What held it though on one side was a tree<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Still growing, and on one a stake and prop,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">These latter about to fall. I thought that only<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Someone who lived in turning to fresh tasks<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Could so forget his handiwork on which<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">He spent himself, the labour of his axe,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And leave it there far from a useful fireplace<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">To warm the frozen swamp as best it could<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">With the slow smokeless burning of decay.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">GOOD HOURS<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I had for my winter evening walk<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">No one at all with whom to talk,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">But I had the cottages in a row<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Up to their shining eyes in snow.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And I thought I had the folk within:<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I had the sound of a violin;<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I had a glimpse through curtain laces<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Of youthful forms and youthful faces<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I had such company outward bound.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I went till there were no cottages found.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I turned and repented, but coming back<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I saw no window but that was black.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Over the snow my creaking feet<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Disturbed the slumbering village street<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Like profanation, by your leave.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">At ten o'clock of a winter eve.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">114<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Mountain Interval<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">THE ROAD NOT TAKEN<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">1 wo roads diverged in a yellow wood,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And sorry I could not travel both<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And be one traveler, long I stood<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And looked down one as far as I could<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">To where it bent in the undergrowth;<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Then took the other, as just as fair,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And having perhaps the better claim,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Because it was grassy and wanted wear;<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Though as for that the passing there<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Had worn them really about the same,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And both that morning equally lay<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">In leaves no step had trodden black.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Oh, I kept the first for another day!<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Yet knowing how way leads on to way,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I doubted if I should ever come back.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I shall be telling this with a sigh<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Somewhere ages and ages hence:<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Two roads diverged in a wood, and I<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I took the one less traveled by,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And that has made all the difference.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">CHRISTMAS TREES<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">A CHRISTMAS CIRCULAR LETTER<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The city had withdrawn into itself<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And left at last the country to the country;<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">When between whirls of snow not come to lie<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And whirls of foliage not yet laid, there drove<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">A stranger to our yard, who looked the city,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Yet did in country fashion in that there<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">He sat and waited till he drew us out<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">A-buttoning coats to ask him who he was.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">He proved to be the city come again<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">To look for something it had left behind<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And could not do without and keep its Christmas.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">He asked if I would sell my Christmas trees;<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">My woods the young fir balsams like a place<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Where houses all are churches and have spires.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I hadn't thought of them as Christmas trees.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I doubt if I was tempted for a moment<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">To sell them off their feet to go in cars<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And leave the slope behind the house all bare,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Where the sun shines now no warmer than the moon.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I'd hate to have them know it if I was.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Yet more I'd hate to hold my trees except<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">As others hold theirs or refuse for them,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Beyond the time of profitable growth,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The trial by market everything must come to.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I dallied so much with the thought of selling.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Then whether from mistaken courtesy<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">118<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And fear of seeming short of speech, or whether<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">From hope of hearing good of what was mine,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I said, 'There aren't enough to be worth while/<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">'I could soon tell how many they would cut,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">You let me look them over/<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">'You could look.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">But don't expect I'm going to let you have them/<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Pasture they spring in, some in clumps too close<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">That lop each other of boughs, but not a few<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Quite solitary and having equal boughs<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">All round and round. The latter he nodded 'Yes' to,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Or paused to say beneath some lovelier one,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">With a buyer's moderation, 'That would do/<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I thought so too, but wasn't there to say so.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">We climbed the pasture on the south, crossed over,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And came down on the north.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">He said, 'A thousand/<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">'A thousand Christmas trees! at what apiece? J<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">He felt some need of softening that to me:<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">' A thousand trees would come to thirty dollars/<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Then I was certain I had never meant<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">To let him have them. Never show surprise!<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">But thirty dollars seemed so small beside<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The extent of pasture I should strip, three cents<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">119<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">(For that was all they figured out apiece),<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Three cents so small beside the dollar friends<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I should be writing to within the hour<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Would pay in cities for good trees like those,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Regular vestry-trees whole Sunday Schools<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Could hang enough on to pick off enough.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">A thousand Christmas trees I didn't know I had!<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Worth three cents more to give away than sell<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">As may be shown by a simple calculation.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Too bad I couldn't lay one in a letter.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I can't help wishing I could send you one,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">In wishing you herewith a Merry Christmas.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">120<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">AN OLD MAN'S WINTER NIGHT<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">All out of doors looked darkly in at him<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Through the thin frost, almost in separate stars.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">That gathers on the pane in empty rooms.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">What kept his eyes from giving back the gaze<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Was the lamp tilted near them in his hand.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">What kept him from remembering the need<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">That brought him to that creaking room was age.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">He stood with barrels round him at a loss.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And having scared the cellar under him<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">In clomping there, he scared it once again<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">In clomping off;- and scared the outer night,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Which has its sounds, familiar, like the roar<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Of trees and crack of branches, common things,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">But nothing so like beating on a box.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">A light he was to no one but himself<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">aiHaO '<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Where now he sat, concerned with he knew what,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">A quiet light, and then not even that.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">He consigned to the moon, such as she was,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">So late-arising, to the broken moon<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">As better than the sun in any case<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">For such a charge, his snow upon the roof,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">His icicles along the wall to keep;<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And slept. The log that shifted with a jolt<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Once in the stove, disturbed him and he shifted,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And eased his heavy breathing, but still slept.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">One aged manone mancan't keep a house,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">12!<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">A farm, a countryside, or if he can,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">It's thus he does it of a winter night.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">122<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">THE TELEPHONE<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">\Vhen I was just as far as I could walk<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">From here to-day,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">There was an hour<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">All still<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">When leaning with my head against a flower<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I heard you talk.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Don't say I didn't, for I heard you say<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">You spoke from that flower on the window sill-<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Do you remember what it was you said?'<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">'First tell me what it was you thought you heard.'<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">' Having found the flower and driven a bee away,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I leaned my head,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And holding by the stalk,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I listened and I thought I caught the word<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">What was it? Did you call me by my name?<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Or did you say<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Someone said "Com^" I heard it as I bowed/<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">'I may have thought as much, but not aloudo '<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">' Well, so I came"<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">123<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">HYLA BROOK<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">JDy June our brook's run out of song and speed.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Sought for much after that, it will be found<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Either to have gone groping underground<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">(And taken with it all the Hyla breed<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">That shouted in the mist a month ago,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Like ghost of sleigh-bells in a ghost of snow) -<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Or flourished and come up in jewel-weed,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Weak foliage that is blown upon and bent<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Even against the way its waters went.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Its bed is left a faded paper sheet<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Of dead leaves stuck together by the heat<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">A brook to none but who remember long.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">This as it will be seen is other far<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Than with brooks taken otherwhere in song.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">We love the things we love for what they are.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">124<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">THE OVEN BIRD<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">1 here is a singer everyone has heard,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Loud, a mid-summer and a mid- wood bird,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Who makes the solid tree trunks sound again.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">He says that leaves are old and that for flowers<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Mid-summer is to spring as one to ten.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Ke says the early petal-fall is past<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">When pear and cherry bloom went down in showers<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">On sunny days a moment overcast;<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And comes that other fall we name the fall.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">He says the highway dust is over all.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The bird would cease and be as other birds<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">But that he knows in singing not to sing.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The question that he frames in all but words<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Is what to make of a diminished thing.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">BOND AND FREE<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">.Love has earth to which she clings<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">With hills and cii cling arms about-<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Wall within wall to shut fear out.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">But Thought has need of no such things,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">For Thought has a pair of dauntless wings.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">On snow and sand and turf, I see<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Where Love has left a printed trace<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">With straining in the world's embrace.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And such is Love and glad to be.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">But Thought has shaken his ankles free.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Thought cleaves the interstellar gloom<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And sits in Sirius' disc all night,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Till day makes him retrace his flight,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">With smell of burning on every plume,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Back past the sun to an earthly room.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">His gains in heaven are what they are.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Yet some say Love by being thrall<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And simply staying possesses all<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">In several beauty that Thought fares far<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">To find fused in another star.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">126<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Small good to anything growing wild,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">They were crooking many a trillium<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">That had budded before the boughs v/ere piled<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And since it was coming up had to come.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">131<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">PUTTING IN THE SEED<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
