<p class="p1"><span class="s1">You come to fetch me from my work to-night<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">When supper's on the table, and we'll see<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">If I can leave off burying the white<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Soft petals fallen from the apple tree<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">(Soft petals, yes, but not so barren quite,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Mingled with these, smooth bean and wrinkled pea;)<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And go along with you ere you lose sight<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Of what you came for and become like me,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Slave to a springtime passion for the earth.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">How Love burns through the Putting in the Seed<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">On through the watching for that early birth<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">When, just as the soil tarnishes with weed,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The sturdy seedling with arched body comes<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Shouldering its way and shedding the earth crumbs.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">A TIME TO TALK<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">\Vhen a friend calls to me from the road<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And slows his horse to a meaning walk,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I don't stand still and look around<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">On all the hills I haven't hoed,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And shout from where I am, 'What is it?'<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">No, not as there is a time to talk.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">1 thrust my hoe in the mellow ground.,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Blade-end up and five feet tall,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And plod. I go up to the stone wall<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">For a friendly visit.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">133<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">THE COW IN APPLE TIME<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">oomething inspires the only cow of late<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">To make no more of a wall than an open gate,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And think no more of wall-builders than fools.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Her face is flecked with pomace and she drools<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">A cider syrup. Having tasted fruit,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">She scorns a pasture withering to the root.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">She runs from tree to tree where lie and sweeten<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The windfalls spiked with stubble and worm-eaten.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">She leaves them bitten when she has to fly.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">She bellows on a knoll against the sky.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Her udder shrivels and the milk goes dry.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">134<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">AN ENCOUNTER<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Once on the kind of day called &lt; weather breeder/<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">When the heat slowly hazes and the sun<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">By its own power seems to be undone,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I was half boring through, half climbing through<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">A swamp of cedar. Choked with oil of cedar<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And scurf of plants, and weary and over-heated,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And sorry I ever left the road I knew,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I paused and rested on a sort of hook<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">That had me by the coat as good as seated,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And since there was no other way to look,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Looked up toward heaven, and there against the blue,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Stood over me a resurrected tree,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">A tree that had been down and raised again<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">A barkless spectre. He had halted too,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">As if for fear of treading upon me.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I saw the strange position of his hands<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Up at his shoulders, dragging yellow strands<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Of wire with something in it from men to men.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">4 You here?' I said. 'Where aren't you nowadays?<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And what's the news you carry if you know?<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And tell me where you're off tor Montreal?<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Me? I'm not off for anywhere at all.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Sometimes I wander out of beaten ways<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Half looking for the orchid Calypso/<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">135<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">RANGE-FINDING<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The battle rent a cobweb diamond-strung<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And cut a flower beside a ground bird's nest<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Before it stained a single human breast.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The stricken flower bent double and so hung.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And still the bird revisited her young.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">A butterfly its fall had dispossessed<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">A moment sought in air his flower of rest,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Then lightly stooped to it and fluttering clung.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">On the bare upland pasture there had spread<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Overnight 'twixt mullein stalks a wheel of thread<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And straining cables wet with silver dew.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">A sudden passing bullet shook it dry.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The indwelling spider ran to greet the fly,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">But finding nothing, sullenly withdrew.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">136<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">THE HILL WIFE<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">LONELINESS<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Her Word<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">One ought not to have to care<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">So much as you and I<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Care when the birds come round the house<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">To seem to say good-bye;<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Or care so much when they come back<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">With whatever it is they sing;<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The truth being we are as much<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Too glad for the one thing<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">As we are too sad for the other here<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">With birds that fill their breasts<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">But with each other and themselves<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And their built or driven nests.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">HOUSE FEAR<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Always I tell you this they learned<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Always at night when they returned<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">To the lonely house from far away<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">To lamps unlighted and fire gone gray,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">They learned to rattle the lock and key<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">To give whatever might chance to be<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Warning and time to be off in flight:<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And preferring the out- to the in-door night,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">They learned to leave the house-door wide<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Until they had lit the lamp inside.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">THE SMILE<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Her Word<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I didn't like the way he went away.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">That smile! It never came of being gay.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Still he smileddid you see him? I was sure!<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Perhaps because we gave htm only bread<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And the wretch knew from that that we were poor<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Perhaps because he let us give instead<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Of seizing from us as he might have seized.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Perhaps he mocked at us for being wed,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Or being very young (and he was pleased<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">To have a vision of us old and dead).<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I wonder how far down the road he's got.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">He's watching from the woods as like as not.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">THE OFT-REPEATED DREAM<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">She had no saying dark enough<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">For the dark pine that kept<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Forever trying the window-latch<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Of the room where they slept.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The tireless but ineffectual hands<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">That with every futile pass<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Made the great tree seem as a little bird<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Before the mystery of glass!<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">It never had been inside the room,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And only one of the two<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Was afraid in an oft-repeated dream<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Of what the tree might do.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">THE IMPULSE<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">It was too lonely for her there,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And too wild,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And since there were but two of them,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And no child,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And work was little in the house.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">She was free,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And followed where he furrowed field,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Or felled tree.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">She rested on a log and tossed<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The fresh chips,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">With a song only to herself<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">On her lips.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And once she went to break a bough<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Of black alder.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">She strayed so far she scarcely heard<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">When he called her<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">139<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And didn't answer didn't speak<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Or return.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">She stood, and then she ran and hid<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">In the fern.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">He never found her, though he looked<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Everywhere,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And he asked at her mother's house<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">V/as she there.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Sudden and swift and light as that<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The ties gave,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And he learned of finalities<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Besides the grave.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">140<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">THE BONFIRE<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">, let's go up the hill and scare ourselves,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">As reckless as the best of them to-night,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">By setting fire to all the brush we piled<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">With pitchy hands to wait for rain or snow.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Oh, let's not wait for rain to make it safe.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The pile is ours: we dragged it bough on bough<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Down dark converging paths between the pines.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Let's not care what we do with it to-night.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Divide it? No! But burn it as one pile<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The way we piled it. And let's be the talk<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Of people brought to windows by a light<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Thrown from somewhere against their wall-paper.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Rouse them all, both the free and not so free<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">With saying what they'd like to do to us<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">For what they'd better wait till we have done.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Let's all but bring to life this old volcano,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">If that is what the mountain ever was<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And scare ourselves. Let wild fire loose we will . .<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">'And scare you too?' the children said together.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">* Why wouldn't it scare me to have a fire<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Begin in smudge with ropy smoke and know<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">That still, if I repent, I may recall it,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">But in a moment not: a little spurt<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Of burning fatness, and then nothing but<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The fire itself can put it out, and that<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">141<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">By burning out, and before it burns out<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">It will have roared first and mixed sparks with stars &gt;<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And sweeping round it with a flaming sword,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Made the dim trees stand back in wider circle-<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Done so much and I know not how much more<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I mean it shall not do if I can bind it.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Well if it doesn't with its draft bring on<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">A wind to blow in earnest from some quarter,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">As once it did with me upon an April.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The breezes were so spent with winter blowing<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">They seemed to fail the bluebirds under them<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Short of the perch their languid flight was toward,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And my flame made a pinnacle to heaven<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">As I walked once around it in possession.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">But the wind out of doorsyou know the saying.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">There came a gust. You used to think the trees<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Made wind by fanning since you never knew<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">It blow but that you saw the trees in motion.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Something or someone watching made that gust.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">It put the flame tip-down and dabbed the grass<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Of over- winter with the least tip-touch<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Your tongue gives salt or sugar in your hand.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The place it reached to blackened instantly.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The black was almost all there was by day-light,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">That and the merest curl of cigarette smoke<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And a flame slender as the hepaticas,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Blood-root, and violets so soon to be now.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">But the black spread like black death on the ground,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And I think the sky darkened with a cloud<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Like winter and evening coming on together.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">142<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">They were enough things to be thought of then.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Where the field stretches toward the north<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And setting sun to Hyla brook, I gave it<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">To flames without twice thinking, where it verges<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Upon the road, to flames too, though in fear<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">They might find fuel there, in withered brake,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Grass its full length, old silver golden-rod,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And alder and grape vine entanglement,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">To leap the dusty deadline. For my own<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I took what front there was beside. I knelt<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And thrust hands in and held my face away.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Fight such a fire by rubbing not by beating.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">A board is the best weapon if you have it.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I had my coat. And oh, I knew, I knew,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And said out loud, I couldn't bide the smother<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And heat so close in; but the thought of all<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The woods and town on fire by me, and all<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The town turned out to fight for me that held me.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I trusted the brook barrier, but feared<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The road would fail; and on that side the fire<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Died not without a noise of crackling wood<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Of something more than tinder-grass and weed-<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">That brought me to my feet to hold it back<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">By leaning back myself, as if the reins<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Were round my neck and I was at the plough,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I won! But I'm sure no one ever spread<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Another color over a tenth the space<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">That I spread coal-black over in the time<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">It took me. Neighbors coming home from town<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Couldn't believe that so much black had come there<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">143<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">While they had backs turned, that it hadn't been there<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">When they had passed an hour or so before<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Going the other way and they not seen it.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">They looked about for someone to have done it.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">But there was no one. I was somewhere wondering<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Where all my weariness had gone and why<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I walked so light on air in heavy shoes<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">In spite of a scorched Fourth-of-July feeling.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Why wouldn't I be scared remembering that?'<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">'If it scares you, what will it do to us?'<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">'Scare you. But if you shrink from being scared,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">What would you say to war if it should come?<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">That's what for reasons I should like to know<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">If you can comfort me by any answer.'<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">'Oh, but war's not for childrenit's for men.'<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">'Now we are digging almost down to China.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">My dears, my dears, you thought that we all thought<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">it.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">So your mistake was ours. Haven't you heard, though,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">About the ships where war has found them out<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">At sea, about the towns where war has come<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Through opening clouds at night with droning speed<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Further o'erhead than all but stars and angels,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And children in the ships and in the towns?<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Haven't you heard what we have lived to learn?<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Nothing so new something we had forgotten:<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">144<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">War is for everyone, for children too.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I wasn't going to tell you and I mustn't.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The best way is to come up hill with me<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And have our fire and laugh and be afraid/<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">145<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">THE LAST WORD OF A BLUEBIRD<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">AS TOLD TO A CHILD<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">As I went out a Crow<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">In a low voice said 'Oh ;<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I was looking for you.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">How do you do?<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I just came to tell you<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">To tell Lesley (will you?)<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">That her little Bluebird<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Wanted me to bring word<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">That the north wind last night<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">That made the stars bright<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And made ice on the trough<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Almost made him cough<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">His tail feathers off.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">He just had to fly!<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">But he sent her Good-bye,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And said to be good,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And wear her red hood,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And look for skunk tracks<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">In the snow with an axe<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And do everything!<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And perhaps in the spring<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">He would come back and sing.'<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">146<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">'OUT,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">1 he buzz-saw snarled and rattled in the yard<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And made dust and dropped stove-length sticks of<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">wood,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Sweet-scented stuff when the breeze drew across it.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And from there those that lifted eyes could count<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Five mountain ranges one behind the other<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Under the sunset far into Vermont.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And the saw snarled and rattled, snarled and rattled,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">As it ran light, or had to bear a load.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And nothing happened: day was all but done.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Call it a day, I wish they might have said<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">To please the boy by giving him the half hour<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">That a boy counts so much when saved from work.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">His sister stood beside them in her apron<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">To tell them 'Supper.' At the word, the saw,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">As if to prove saws knew what supper meant,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Leaped out at the boy's hand, or seemed to leap-<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">He must have given the hand. However it was,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Neither refused the meeting. But the hand!<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">^ ne boy's first outcry was a rueful laugh,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">As he swung toward them holding up the hand<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Half in appeal, but half as if to keep<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The life from spilling. Then the boy saw ail-<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Since he was old enough to know, big boy<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Doing a man's work, though a child at heart-<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">He saw all spoiled. 'Don't let him cut my hand off<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The doctor, when he comes. Don't let him, sister P<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">147<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">So. But the hand was gone already.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The doctor put him in the dark of ether.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">He lay and puffed his lips out with his breath.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And then the watcher at his pulse took fright.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">No one believed. They listened at his heart.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Littleless nothing! and that ended it.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">No more to build on there. And they, since they<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Were not the one dead, turned to their affairs.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">148<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">BROWN'S DESCENT<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">OR<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">THE WILLY-NILLY SLIDE<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Drown lived at such a lofty farm<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">That everyone for miles could see<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">His lantern when he did his chores<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">In winter after half-past three.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And many must have seen him make<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">His wild descent from there one night,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">'Cross lots, 'cross walls, 'cross everything,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Describing rings of lantern light.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Between the house and barn the gale<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Got him by something he had on<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And blew him out on the icy crust<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">That cased the world, and he was gone!<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Walls were all buried, trees were few:<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">He saw no stay unless he stove<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">A hole in somewhere with his heel.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">But though repeatedly he strove<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And stamped and said things to himself,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And sometimes something seemed to yield,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">He gained no foothold, but pursued<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">His journey down from field to field.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">149<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Sometimes he came with arms outspread<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Like wings, revolving in the scene<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Upon his longer axis, and<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">With no small dignity of mien.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Faster or slower as he chanced,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Sitting or standing as he chose,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">According as he feared to risk<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">His neck, or thought to spare his clothes,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">He never let the lantern drop.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And some exclaimed who saw afar<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The figures he described with it,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">( I wonder what those signals are<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Brown makes at such an hour of night!<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">He's celebrating something strange.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I wonder if he's sold his farm,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Or been made Master of the Grange/<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">He reeled, he lurched, he bobbed, he checked;<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">He fell and made the lantern rattle<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">(But saved the light from going out.)<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">So half-way down he fought the battle,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Incredulous of his own bad luck.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And then becoming reconciled<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">To everything, he gave it up<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And came down like a coasting child.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">150<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">' Well-I-be-' that was all he said,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">As standing in the river road,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">He looked back up the slippery slope<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">(Two miles it was) to his abode.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Sometimes as an authority<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">On motor-cars, Fm asked if I<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Should say our stock was petered out,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And this is my sincere reply:<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Yankees are what they always were.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Don't think Brown ever gave up hope<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Of getting home again because<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">He couldn't climb that slippery slope;<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Or even thought of standing there<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Until the January thaw<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Should take the polish off the crust.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">He bowed with grace to natural law,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And then went round it on his feet,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">After the manner of our stock;<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Not much concerned for those to whom,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">At that particular time o'clock,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">It must have looked as if the course<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">He steered was really straight away<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">From that which he was headed for<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Not much concerned for them, I say;<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">151<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">No more so than became a man<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And politician at odd seasons.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I've kept Brown standing in the cold<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">While I invested him with reasons;<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">But now he snapped his eyes three times;<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Then shook his lantern, saying, He's<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">'Bout out!' and took the long way home<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">By road, a matter of several miles.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">152<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">THE GUM-GATHERER<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">There overtook me and drew me in<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">To his down-hill, early-morning stride,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And set me five miles on my road<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Better than if he had had me ride,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">A man with a swinging bag for load<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And half the bag wound round his hand.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">We talked like barking above the din<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Of water we walked along beside.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And for my telling him where I'd been<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And where I lived in mountain land<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">To be coming home the way I was,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">He told me a little about himself.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">He came from higher up in the pass<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Where the grist of the new-beginning brooks<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Is blocks split off the mountain mass<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And hopeless grist enough it looks<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Ever to grind to soil for grass.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">(The way it is will do for moss.)<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">There he had built his stolen shack.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">It had to be a stolen shack<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Because of the fears of fire and loss<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">That trouble the sleep of lumber folk:<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Visions of half the world burned black<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And the sun shrunken yellow in smoke.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">We know who when they come to town<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Bring berries under the wagon seat,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Or a basket of eggs between their feet;<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">153<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">What this man brought in a cotton sack<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Was gum, the gum of the mountain spruce.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">He showed me lumps of the scented stuff<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Like uncut jewels, dull and rough.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">It conies to market golden brown;<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">But turns to pink between the teeth.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I told him this is a pleasant life<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">To set your breast to the bark of trees<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">That all your days are dim beneath,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And reaching up with a little knife,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">To loose the resin and take it down<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And bring it to market when you please.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">154<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">THE LINE-GANG<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Jriere come the line-gang pioneering by.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">They throw a forest down less cut than broken.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">They plant dead trees for living, and the dead<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">They string together with a living thread.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">They string an instrument against the sky<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Wherein words whether beaten out or spoken<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Will run as hushed as when they were a thought.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">But in no hush they string it: they go past<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">With shouts afar to pull the cable taut,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">To hold it hard until they make it fast,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">To ease away they have it. With a laugh,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">An oath of towns that set the wild at naught<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">They bring the telephone and telegraph.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">155<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">THE VANISHING RED<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">lie is said to have been the last Red Man<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">In Acton. And the Miller is said to have laughed<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">If you like to call such a sound a laugh.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">But he gave no one else a laughter's license.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">For he turned suddenly grave as if to say,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">' Whose business,if I take it on myself,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Whose businessbut why talk round the barn?<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">When it's just that I hold with getting a thing done<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">with.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">You can't get back and see it as he saw it.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">It's too long a story to go into now.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">You'd have to have been there and lived it.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Then you wouldn't have looked on it as just a matter<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Of who began it between the two races.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Some guttural exclamation of surprise<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The Red Man gave in poking about the mill<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Over the great big thumping shuffling mill-stone<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Disgusted the Miller physically as coming<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
