<p class="p1"><span class="s1">From one who had no right to be heard from.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">'Come, John/ he said, 'you want to see the wheel pit? &gt;<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">He took him down below a cramping rafter,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And showed him, through a manhole in the floor,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The water in desperate straits like frantic fish,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Salmon and sturgeon, lashing with their tails.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Then he shut down the trap door with a ring in it<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">156<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">That jangled even above the general noise,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And came up stairs alone and gave that laugh,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And said something to a man with a meal-sack<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">That the man with the meal-sack didn't catch then.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Oh, yes, he showed John the wheel pit all right.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">157<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">SNOW<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">1 he three stood listening to a fresh access<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Of wind that caught against the house a moment,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Gulped snow, and then blew free again the Coles<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Dressed, but dishevelled from some hours of sleep,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Meserve belittled in the great skin coat he wore.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Meserve was first to speak. He pointed backward<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Over his shoulder with his pipe-stem, saying,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">* You can just see it glancing off the roof<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Making a great scroll upward toward the sky,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Long enough for recording all our names on.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I think Til just call up my wife and tell her<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I'm here so far and starting on again.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I'll call her softly so that if she's wise<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And gone to sleep, she needn't wake to answer/<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Three times he barely stirred the bell, then listened.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">'Why, Lett, still up? Lett, I'm at Cole's. I'm late.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I called you up to say Good-night from here<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Before I went to say Good-morning there.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I thought I would. I know, but, Lett I know<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I could, but what's the sense? The rest won't be<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">So bad. Give me an hour for it. Ho, ho,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Three hours to here! But that was all up hill;<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The rest is down. Why no, no, not a wallow:<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">They kept their heads and took their time to it<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Like darlings, both of them. They're in the barn.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">158<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">My dear, I'm coming just the same. I didn't<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Call you to ask you to invite me home. '<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">He lingered for some word she wouldn't say,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Said it at last himself, * Good-night/ and then<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Getting no answer, closed the telephone.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The three stood in the lamplight round the table<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">With lowered eyes a moment till he said,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Til just see how the horses are/<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">1 Yes, do/<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Both the Coles said together. Mrs. Cole<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Added: ' You can judge better after seeing.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I want you here with me, Fred. Leave him here,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Brother Meserve. You know to find your way<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Out through the shed/<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">'I guess I know my way,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I guess I know where I can find my name<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Carved in the shed to tell me who I am<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">If it don't tell me where I am. I used<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">To play'<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">* You tend your horses and come back.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Fred Cole, you're going to let him!'<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">'Well, aren't you:<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">How can you help yourself?'<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">'I called him Brother.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Why did I call him that?'<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">159<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">'It's right enough.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">That's all you ever heard him called round here.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">He seems to have lost off his Christian name/<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">'Christian enough I should call that myself.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">He took no notice, did he? Well, at least<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I didn't use it out of love of him,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The dear knows. I detest the thought of him<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">With his ten children under ten years old.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I hate his wretched little Racker Sect,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">All's ever I heard of it, which isn't much.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">But that's not saying Look, Fred Cole, it's twelve,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Isn't it, now? He's been here half an hour.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">He says he left the village store at nine.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Three hours to do four miles a mile an hour<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Or not much better. Why, it doesn't seem<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">As if a man could move that slow and move.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Try to think what he did with all that time.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And three miles more to go!'<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">'Don't let him go.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Stick to him, Helen. Make him answer you.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">That sort of man talks straight on all his life<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">From the last thing he said himself, stone deaf<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">To anything anyone else may say.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I should have thought, though, you could make him<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">hear you/<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">'What is he doing out a night like this?<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Why can't he stay at home?'<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">16O<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">'He had to preach/<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">'It's no night to be out.'<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">'He may be small,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">He may be good, but one thing's sure, he's tough. 1<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">'And strong of stale tobacco/<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">'He'll pull through.'<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">'You only say so. Not another house<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Or shelter to put into from this place<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">To theirs. I'm going to call his wife again.'<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">' Wait and he may. Let's see what he will do.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Let's see if he will think of her again.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">But then I doubt he's thinking of himself.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">He doesn't look on it as anything.'<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>

<p class="p1"><span class="s1">leaf!<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>

<p class="p1"><span class="s1">You recollect the boy who came out here<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>

<p class="p1"><span class="s1">165<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>

<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>

<p class="p1"><span class="s1">While you sit warm and read up balanced rations.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>

<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Well, now I leave you, people.'<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>

<p class="p1"><span class="s1">This house is frozen brittle, all except<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>

<p class="p1"><span class="s1">\nd feel it less. Hear the soft bombs of dust<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>

<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>

<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And let you get to bed again. Good-night,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Sorry I had to break in on your sleep/<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">* Lucky for you you did. Lucky for you<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>

<p class="p1"><span class="s1">To stop at. If you were the kind of man<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Paid heed to women, you'd take my advice<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And for your family's sake stay where you are.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">But what good is my saying it over and over?<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">You've done more than you had a right to think<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">You could donoiu. You know the risk you take<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">In going on.'<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">'Our snow-storms as a rule<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Aren't looked on as man-killers, and although<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>

<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Under it all, his door sealed up and lost,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Than the man fighting it to keep above it,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Yet think of the small birds at roost and not<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">In nests. Shall I be counted less than they are?<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>

<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Good! Why I asked she didn't seem to answer.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">He says she went to let him in the barn.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">We're glad. Oh, say no more about it, man.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Drop in and see us when you're passing.'<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">'Well,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">She has him then, though what she wants him for<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I don't see.'<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">'Possibly not for herself.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Maybe she only wants him for the children/<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">'The whole to-do seems to have been for nothing.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">What spoiled our night was to him just his fun.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">What did he come in for? To talk and visit?<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Thought he'd just call to tell us it was snowing.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">If he thinks he is going to make our house<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">A half-way coffee house 'twixt town and nowhere'<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">173<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">'I thought you'd feel you'd been too much concerned<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">'You think you haven't been concerned yourself.'<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">'If you mean he was inconsiderate<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">To rout us out to think for him at midnight<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And then take our advice no more than nothing,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Why, I agree with you. But let's forgive him.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">We've had a share in one night of his life.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">What'll you bet he ever calls again?'<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">174<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">THE SOUND OF THE TREES<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I wonder about the trees.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Why do we wish to bear<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Forever the noise of these<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">More than another noise<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">So close to our dwelling place?<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">We suffer them by the day<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Till we lose all measure of pace,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And fixity in our joys,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And acquire a listening air.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">They are that that talks of going<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">But never gets away;<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And that talks no less for knowing,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">As it grows wiser and older,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">That now it means to stay.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">My feet tug at the floor<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And my head sways to my shoulder<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Sometimes when I watch trees sway,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">From the window or the door.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I shall set forth for somewhere,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I shall make the reckless choice<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Some day when they are in voice<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And tossing so as to scare<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The white clouds over them on.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I shall have less to say,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">But I shall be gone.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">175<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">New Hampshire<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">NEW HAMPSHIRE<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">1 met a lady from the South who said<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">(You won't believe she said it, but she said it):<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">'None of my family ever worked, or had<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">A thing to sell/ I don't suppose the work<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Much matters. You may work for all of me.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I've seen the time I've had to work myself.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The having anything to sell is what<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Is the disgrace in man or state or nation.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I met a traveller from Arkansas<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Who boasted of his state as beautiful<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">For diamonds and apples. 'Diamonds<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And apples in commercial quantities?'<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I asked him, on my guard. ( Oh yes/ he answered,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Off his. The time was evening in the Pullman.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">'I see the porter's made your bed/ I told him.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I met a Californian who would<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Talk California a state so blessed,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">He said, in climate, none had ever died there<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">A natural death, and Vigilance Committees<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Had had to organize to stock the graveyards<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And vindicate the state's humanity.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">'Just the way Steffanson runs on/ I murmured,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">'About the British Arctic. That's what comes<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Of being in the market with a climate.'<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">179<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I met a poet from another state,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">A zealot full of fluid inspiration,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Who in the name of fluid inspiration,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">But in the best style of bad salesmanship,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Angrily tried to make me write a protest<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">(In verse I think) against the Volstead Act.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">He didn't even offer me a drink<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Until I asked for one to steady him.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">This is called having an idea to sell.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">It never could have happened in New Hampshire.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The only person really soiled with trade<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I ever stumbled on in old New Hampshire<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Was someone who had just come back ashamed<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">From selling things in California.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">He'd built a noble mansard roof with balls<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">On turrets like Constantinople, deep<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">In woods some ten miles from a railroad station,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">As if to put forever out of mind<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The hope of being, as we say, received.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I found him standing at the close of day<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Inside the threshold of his open barn,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Like a lone actor on a gloomy stage<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">&amp;nd recognized him through the iron grey<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">In which his face was muffled to the eyes<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">As an old boyhood friend, and once indeed<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">A drover with me on the road to Brighton.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">His farm was 'grounds,' and not a farm at all;<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">His house among the local sheds and shanties<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">180<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Rose like a factor's at a trading station.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And he was rich, and I was still a rascal.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I couldn't keep from asking impolitely,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Where had he been and what had he been doing?<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">How did he get so? (Rich was understood.)<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">In dealing in 'old rags' in San Francisco.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Oh it was terrible as well could be.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">We both of us turned over in our graves.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Just specimens is all New Hampshire has,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">One each of everything as in a show-case<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Which naturally she doesn't care to sell<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">She had one President (pronounce him Purse,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And make the most of it for better or worse.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">He's your one chance to score against the state),<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">She had one Daniel Webster. He was all<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The Daniel Webster ever was or shall be.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">She had the Dartmouth needed to produce him.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I call her old. She has one family<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Whose claim is good to being settled here<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Before the era of colonization,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And before that of exploration even.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">John Smith remarked them as he coasted by<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Dangling their legs and fishing off a wharf<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">At the Isles of Shoals, and satisfied himself<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">They weren't Red Indians, but veritable<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Pre-primitives of the white race, dawn people,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Like those who furnished Adam's sons with<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">wives;<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">However uninnocent they may have been<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">In being there so early in our history.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">They'd been there then a hundred years or more.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Pity he didn't ask what they were up to<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">At that date with a wharf already built,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And take their name. They've since told me their<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">name-<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Today an honored one in Nottingham.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">As for what they were up to more than fishing-<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Suppose they weren't behaving Puritanly,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The hour had not yet struck for being good,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Mankind had not yet gone on the Sabbatical.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">It became an explorer of the deep<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Not to explore too deep in others' business.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Did you but know of him, New Hampshire has.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">One real reformer who would change the world<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">So it would be accepted by two classes,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Artists the minute they set up as artists,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Before, that is, they are themselves accepted,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And boys the minute they get out of college.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I can't help thinking those are tests to go by.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And she has one I don't know what to call him,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Who comes from Philadelphia every year<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">With a great flock of chickens of rare breeds<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">He wants to give the educational<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Advantages of growing almost wild<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Under the watchful eye of hawk and eagle-<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Dorkings because they're spoken of by Chaucer<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Sussex because they're spoken of by Herrick.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">182<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">She has a touch of gold. New Hampshire gold<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">You may have heard of it. I had a farm<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Offered me not long since up Berlin way<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">With a mine on it that was worked for gold;<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">But not gold in commercial quantities.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Just enough gold to make the engagement rings<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And marriage rings of those who owned the farm.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">What gold more innocent could one have asked for?<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">One of my children ranging after rocks<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Lately brought home from Andover or Canaan<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">A specimen of beryl with a trace<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Of radium. I know with radium<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The trace would have to be the merest trace<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">To be below the threshold of commercial;<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">But trust New Hampshire not to have enough<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Of radium or anything to sell.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">A specimen of everything, I said.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">She has one witch old style. She lives in Colebrook.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">(The only other witch I ever met<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Was lately at a cut-glass dinner in Boston.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">There were four candles and four people present.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The witch was young, and beautiful (new style),<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And open-minded. She was free to question<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Her gift for reading letters locked in boxes.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Why was it so much greater when the boxes<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Were metal than it was when they were wooden?<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">It made the world seem so mysterious.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The S'ciety for Psychical Research<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Was cognizant. Her husband was worth millions.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I think he owned some shares in Harvard College.)<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">183<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">New Hampshire used to have at Salem<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">A company we called the White Corpuscles,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Whose duty was at any hour of night<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">To rush in sheets and fools* caps where they smelled<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">A thing the least bit doubtfully perscented<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And give someone the Skipper Ireson's Ride.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">One each of everything as in a show-case.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">More than enough land for a specimen<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">You'll say she has, but there there enters in<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Something else to protect her from herself.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">There quality makes up for quantity.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Not even New Hampshire farms are much for sale.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The farm I made my home on in the mountains<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I had to take by force rather than buy.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I caught the owner outdoors by himself<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Raking up after winter, and I said,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I'm going to put you off this farm: I want it/<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">* Where are you going to put me? In the road?*<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Tm going to put you on the farm next to it.'<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Why won't the farm next to it do for you?'<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">1 like this better/ It was really better.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Apples? New Hampshire has them, but unsprayed,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">With no suspicion in stem-end or blossom-end<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Of vitriol or arsenate of lead,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And so not good for anything but cider.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Her unpruned grapes are flung like lariats<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Far up the birches out of reach of man.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">184<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">A state producing precious metals, stones,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And writing; none of these except perhaps<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The precious literature in quantity<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Or quality to worry the producer<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">About disposing of it. Do you know,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Considering the market, there are more<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Poems produced than any other thing?<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">No wonder poets sometimes have to seem<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">So much more business-like than business men.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Their wares are so much harder to get rid of.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">She's one of the two best states in the Union.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Vermont's the other. And the two have been<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Yoke-fellows in the sap-yoke from of old<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">In many Marches. And they lie like wedges,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Thick end to thin end and thin end to thick end,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And are a figure of the way the strong<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Of mind and strong of arm should fit together,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">One thick where one is thin and vice versa.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">New Hampshire raises the Connecticut<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">In a trout hatchery near Canada,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">But soon divides the river with Vermont.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Both are delightful states for their absurdly<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Small townsLost Nation, Bungey, Muddy Boo,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Poplin, Still Corners (so called not becaiise<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The place is silent all day long, nor yet<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Because it boasts a whisky still because<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">It set out once to be a city and still<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Is only corners, cross- roads in a wood).<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">185<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And I remember one whose name appeared<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Between the pictures on a movie screen<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Election night once in Franconia,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">When everything had gone Republican<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And Democrats were sore in need of comfort:<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Easton goes Democratic, Wilson 4<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Hughes 2. And everybody to the saddest<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Laughed the loud laugh, the big laugh at the little.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">New York (five million) laughs at Manchester,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Manchester (sixty or seventy thousand) laughs<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">At Littleton (four thousand), Littleton<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Laughs at Franconia (seven hundred), and<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Franconia laughs, I fear, -did laugh that night<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">At Easton. What has Easton left to laugh at,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And like the actress exclaim, 'Oh my God' at?<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">There's Bungey; and for Bungey there are towns,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Whole townships named but without population.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Anything I can say about New Hampshire<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Will serve almost as well about Vermont,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Excepting that they differ in their mountains.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The Vermont mountains stretch extended straight;<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">New Hampshire mountains curl up in a coil.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I had been coming to New Hampshire mountains.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And here I am and what am I to say?<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Here first my theme becomes embarrassing.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Emerson said, 'The God who made New Hampshire<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Taunted the lofty land with little men.'<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Another Massachusetts poet said,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">186<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">'I go no more to summer in New Hampshire.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">IVe given up my summer place in Dublin/<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">But when I asked to know what ailed New Hampshire.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">She said she couldn't stand the people in it,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The little men (it's Massachusetts speaking).<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And when I asked to know what ailed the people,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">She said, 'Go read your own books and find out.'<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I may as well confess myself the author<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Of several books against the world in general.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">To take them as against a special state<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Or even nation's to restrict my meaning.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I'm what is called a sensibilitist,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Or otherwise an environmentalist.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I refuse to adapt myself a mite<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">To any change from hot to cold, from wet<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">To dry, from poor to rich, or back again.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I make a virtue of my suffering<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">From nearly everything that goes on round me.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">In other words, I know wherever I am,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Being the creature of literature I am,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I shall not lack for pain to keep me awake.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Kit Marlowe taught me how to say my prayers:<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">'Why, this is Hell, nor am I out of it/<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Samoa, Russia, Ireland I complain of,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">No less than England, France and Italy.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Because I wrote my novels in New Hampshire<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Is no proof that I aimed them at New Hampshire.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">When I left Massachusetts years ago<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Between two days, the reason why I sought<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">187<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">New Hampshire, not Connecticut,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Rhode Island, New York, or Vermont was this:<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Where I was living then, New Hampshire offered<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The nearest boundary to escape across.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I hadn't an illusion in my hand-bag<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">About the people being better there<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Than those I left behind. I thought they weren't.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I thought they couldn't be. And yet they were.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I'd sure had no such friends in Massachusetts<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">As Hall of Windham, Gay of Atkinson,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Bartlett of Raymond (now of Colorado),<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Harris of Derry, and Lynch of Bethlehem<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The glorious bards of Massachusetts seem<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">To want to make New Hampshire people over.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">They taunt the lofty land with little men.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I don't know what to say about the people.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">For art's sake one could almost wish them worse<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Rather than better. How are we to write<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The Russian novel in America<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">As long as life goes so unterribly?<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">There is the pinch from which our only outcry<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">In literature to date is heard to come.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">We get what little misery we can<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Out of not having cause for misery.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">It makes the guild of novel writers sick<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">To be expected to be Dostoievskis<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">On nothing worse than too much luck and comfort.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">This is not sorrow, though; it's just the vapors,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And recognized as such in Russia itself<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">188<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Under the new regime, and so forbidden.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">If well it is with Russia, then feel free<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">To say so or be stood against the wall<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And shot. It's Pollyanna now or death.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">This, then, is the new freedom we hear tell of;<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And very sensible. No state can build<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">A literature that shall at once be sound<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And sad on a foundation of well-being,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">To show the level of intelligence<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Among us: it was just a Warren farmer<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Whose horse had pulled him short up in the road<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">By me, a stranger. This is what he said,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">From nothing but embarrassment and want<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Of anything more sociable to say:<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">' You hear those hound-dogs sing on Moosilauke?<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Well they remind me of the hue and cry<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">We've heard against the Mid- Victorians<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And never rightly understood till Bryan<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Retired from politics and joined the chorus.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The matter with the Mid- Victorians<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Seems to have been a man named John L. Darwin/<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">'Go 'long/ I said to him, he to his horse.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I knew a man who failing as a farmer<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Burned down his farmhouse for the fire insurance.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And spent the proceeds on a telescope<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">To satisfy a life-long curiosity<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">About our place among the infinities.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And how was that for other-worldliness?<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
