<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">189<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">If I must choose which I would elevate<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The people or the already lofty mountains,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Td elevate the already lofty mountains.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The only fault I find with old New Hampshire<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Is that her mountains aren't quite high enough.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I was not always so; I've come to be so.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">How, to my sorrow, how have I attained<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">A height from which to look down critical<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">On mountains? What has given me assurance<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">To say what height becomes New Hampshire moun-<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">tains,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Or any mountains? Can it be some strength<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I feel as of an earthquake in my back<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">To heave them higher to the morning star?<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Can it be foreign travel in the Alps?<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Or having seen and credited a moment<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The solid moulding of vast peaks of cloud<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Behind the pitiful reality<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Of Lincoln, Lafayette and Liberty?<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Or some such sense as says how high shall jet<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The fountain in proportion to the basin?<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">No, none of these has raised me to my throne<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Of intellectual dissatisfaction,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">But the sad accident of having seen<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Our actual mountains given in a map<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Of early times as twice the height they are-<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Ten thousand feet instead of only five<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Which shows how sad an accident may be.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Five thousand is no longer high enough.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Whereas I never had a good idea<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">190<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">About improving people in the world,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Here I am over-fertile in suggestion,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And cannot rest from planning day or night<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">How high Fd thrust the peaks in summer snow<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">To tap the upper sky and draw a flow<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Of frosty night air on the vale below<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Down from the stars to freeze the dew as starry.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The more the sensibilitist I am<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The more I seem to want my mountains wild;<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The way the wiry gang-boss liked the log-jam.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">After he'd picked the lock and got it started,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">He dodged a log that lifted like an arm<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Against the sky to break his back for him,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Then came in dancing, skipping, with his life<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Across the roar and chaos, and the words<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">We saw him say along the zigzag journey<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Were doubtless as the words we heard him say<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">On coming nearer: 'Wasn't she an i-deal<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Son-of-a-bitch? You bet she was an t-deal.'<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">For all her mountains fall a little short,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Her people not quite short enough for Art,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">She's still New Hampshire, a most restful state.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Lately in converse with a New York alec<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">About the new school of the pseudo-phallic,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I found myself in a close corner where<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I had to make an almost funny choice.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">'Choose you which you will bea prude, or puke,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">191<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Mewling and puking in the public arms/<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">'Me for the hills where I don't have to choose/<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">'But if you had to choose, which would you be?'<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I wouldn't be a prude afraid of nature.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I know a man who took a double axe<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And went alone against a grove of trees;<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">But his heart failing him, he dropped the axe<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And ran for shelter quoting Matthew Arnold:<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">'Nature is cruel, man is sick of blood;<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">There's been enough shed without shedding mine.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Remember Birnam Wood! The wood's in flux!'<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">He had a special terror of the flux<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">That showed itself in dendrophobia.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The only decent tree had been to mill<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And educated into boards, he said.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">He knew too well for any earthly use<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The line where man leaves off and nature starts,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And never over-stepped it save in dreams.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">He stood on the safe side of the line talking;<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Which is sheer Matthew Arnoldism,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The cult of one who owned himself 'a foiled,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Circuitous wanderer,' and 'took dejectedly<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">His seat upon the intellectual throne/<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Agreed in frowning on these improvised<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Altars the woods are full of nowadays,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Again as in the days when Ahaz sinned<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">By worship under green trees in the open.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Scarcely a mile but that I come on one,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">A black-cheeked stone and stick of rain-washed<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">charcoal<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">192<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Even to say the groves were God's first temples<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Comes too near to Ahaz' sin for safety.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Nothing not built with hands of course is sacred.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">But here is not a question of what's sacred;<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Rather of what to face or run away from.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I'd hate to be a runaway from nature.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And neither would I choose to be a puke<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Who cares not what he does in company,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And, when he can't do anything, falls back<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">On words, and tries his worst to make words speak<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Louder than actions, and sometimes achieves it.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">It seems a narrow choice the age insists on.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">How about being a good Greek, for instance?<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">That course, they tell me, isn't offered this year.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">'Come, but this isn't choosing puke or prude?'<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Well, if I have to choose one or the other,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I choose to be a plain New Hampshire farmer<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">With an income in cash of say a thousand<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">(From say a publisher in New York City).<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">It's restful to arrive at a decision,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And restful just to think about New Hampshire.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">At present I am living in Vermont.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">193<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">A STAR IN A STONE-BOAT<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">(For Lincoln MacVeagh)<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">L Sever tell me that not one star of all<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">That slip from heaven at night and softly fall<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Has been picked up with stones to build a wall.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Some laborer found one faded and stone cold,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And saving that its weight suggested gold,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And tugged it from his first too certain hold,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">He noticed nothing in it to remark.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">He was not used to handling stars thrown dark<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And lifeless from an interrupted arc.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">He did not recognize in that smooth coal<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The one thing palpable besides the soul<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">To penetrate the air in which we roll.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">He did not see how like a flying thing<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">It brooded ant-eggs, and had one large wing,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">One not so large for flying in a ring,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And a long Bird of Paradise's tail,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">(Though these when not in use to fly and trail<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">It drew back in its body like a snail);<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Nor know that he might move it from the spot,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The harm was done; from having been star-shot<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The very nature of the soil was hot<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">194<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And burning to yield flowers instead of grain,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Flowers fanned and not put out by all the rain<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Poured on them by his prayers prayed in vain.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">He moved it roughly with an iron bar,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">He loaded an old stone-boat with the star<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And not, as you might think, a flying car,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Such as even poets would admit perforce<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">More practical than Pegasus the horse<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">If it could put a star back in its course.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">He dragged it through the ploughed ground at a pace<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">But faintly reminiscent of the race<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Of jostling rock in interstellar space.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">It went for building stone, and I, as though<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Commanded in a dream, forever go<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">To right the wrong that this should have been so.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Yet ask where else it could have gone as well,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I do not know I cannot stop to tell:<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">He might have left it lying where it fell.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">From following walls I never lift my eye<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Except at night to places in the sky<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Where showers of charted meteors let fly.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">195<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Some may know what they seek in school and church,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And why they seek it there; for what I search<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I must go measuring stone walls, perch on perch;<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Sure that though not a star of death and birth,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">So not to be compared, perhaps, in worth<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">To such resorts of life as Mars and Earth,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Though not, I say, a star of death and sin,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">It yet has poles, and only needs a spin<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">To show its worldly nature and begin<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">To chafe and shuffle in my calloused palm<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And run off in strange tangents with my arm<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">As fish do with the line in first alarm.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Such as it is, it promises the prize<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Of the one world complete in any size<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">That I am like to compass, fool or wise.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">THE CENSUS-TAKER<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">1 came an errand one cloud-blowing evening<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">To a slab-built, black-paper-covered house<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Of one room and one window and one door,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The only dwelling in a waste cut over<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">A hundred square miles round it in the mountains:<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And that not dwelt in now by men or women.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">(Ir never had been dwelt in, though, by women,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">So what is this I make a sorrow of?)<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I came as census-taker to the waste<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">To count the people in it and found none,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">None in the hundred miles, none in the house,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Where I came last with some hope, but not much<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">After hours' overlooking from the cliffs<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">An emptiness flayed to the very stone.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I found no people that dared show themselves,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">None not in hiding from the outward eye.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The time was autumn, but how anyone<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Could tell the time of year when every tree<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">That could have dropped a leaf was down itself<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And nothing but the stump of it was left<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Now bringing out its rings in sugar of pitch;<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And every tree up stood a rotting trunk<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Without a single leaf to spend on autumn,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Or branch to whistle after what was spent.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Perhaps the wind the more without the help<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Of breathing trees said something of the time<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Of year or day the way it swung a door<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">197<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Forever off the latch, as if rude men<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Passed in and slammed it shut each one behind him<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">For the next one to open for himself.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I counted nine I had no right to count<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">(But this was dreamy unofficial counting)<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Before I made the tenth across the threshold.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Where was my supper? Where was anyone's?<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">No lamp was lit. Nothing was on the table.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The stove was cold the stove was off the chimney<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And down by one side where it lacked a leg.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The people that had loudly passed the door<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Were people to the ear but not the eye.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">They were not on the table with their elbows.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">They were not sleeping in the shelves of bunks.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I saw no men there and no bones of men there.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I armed myself against such bones as might be<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">With the pitch-blackened stub of an axe-handle<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I picked up off the straw-dust covered floor.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Not bones, but the ill-fitted window rattled.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The door was still because I held it shut<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">While I thought what to do that could be done<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">About the house about the people not there.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">This house in one year fallen to decay<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Filled me with no less sorrow than the houses<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Fallen to ruin in ten thousand years<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Where Asia wedges Africa from Europe.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Nothing was left to do that I could see<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Unless to find that there was no one there<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And declare to the cliffs too far for echo,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">f The place is desert and let whoso lurks<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">198<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">In silence, if in this he is aggrieved,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Break silence now or be forever silent.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Let him say why it should not be declared so/<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The melancholy of having to count souls<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Where they grow fewer and fewer every year<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Is extreme where they shrink to none at all.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">It must be I want life to go on living.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">199<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">THE STAR-SPLITTER<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">&lt; You know Orion always comes up sideways.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Throwing a leg up over our fence of mountains.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And rising on his hands, he looks in on me<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Busy outdoors by lantern-light with something<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I should have done by daylight, and indeed,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">After the ground is frozen, I should have done<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Before it froze, and a gust flings a handful<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Of waste leaves at my smoky lantern chimney<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">To make fun of my way of doing things,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Or else fun of Orion's having caught me.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Has a man, I should like to ask, no rights<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">These forces are obliged to pay respect to?'<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">So Brad McLaughlin mingled reckless talk<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Of heavenly stars with hugger-mugger farming,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Till having failed at hugger-mugger farming,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">He burned his house down for the fire insurance<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And spent the proceeds on a telescope<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">To satisfy a life-long curiosity<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">About our place among the infinities.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">What do you want with one of those blame things?'<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I asked him well beforehand. 'Don't you get one!'<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">'Don't call it blamed; there isn't anything<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">More blameless in the sense of being less<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">A weapon in our human fight/ he said.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Til have one if I sell my farm to buy it.'<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">There where he moved the rocks to plow the ground<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">200<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And plowed between the rocks he couldn't move,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Few farms changed hands; so rather than spend years<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Trying to sell his farm and then not selling,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">He burned his house down for the fire insurance<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And bought the telescope with what it came to.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">He had been heard to say by several:<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">'The best thing that we're put here for's to see;<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The strongest thing that's given us to see with's<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">A telescope. Someone in every town<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Seems to me owes it to the town to keep one.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">In Littleton it may as well be me/<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">After such loose talk it was no surprise<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">When he did what he did and burned his house down,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Mean laughter went about the town that day<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">To let him know we weren't the least imposed on,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And he could wait we'd see to him to-morrow.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">But the first thing next morning we reflected<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">If one by one we counted people out<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">For the least sin, it wouldn't take us long<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">To get so we had no one left to live with.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">For to be social is to be forgiving.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Our thief, the one who does our stealing from us,s,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">We don't cut off from coming to church supper<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">But what we miss we go to him and ask for.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">He promptly gives it back, that is if still<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Uneaten, unworn out, or undisposed of.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">It wouldn't do to be too hard on Brad<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">About his telescope. Beyond the age<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Of being given one's gift for Christmas,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">2O1<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">He had to take the best way he knew how<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">To find himself in one. \Vell, all we said was<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">He took a strange thing to be roguish over.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Some sympathy was wasted on the house,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">A good old-timer dating back along;<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">But a house isn't sentient; the house<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Didn't feel anything. And if it did,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Why not regard it as a sacrifice,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And an old-fashioned sacrifice by fire,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Instead of a new-fashioned one at auction?<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Out of a house and so out of a farm<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">At one stroke (of a match), Brad had to turn<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">To earn a living on the Concord railroad,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">As under-ticket-agent at a station<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Where his job, when he wasn't selling tickets,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">\Vas setting out up track and down, not plants<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">As on a farm, but planets, evening stars<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">That varied in their hue from red to green.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">He got a good glass for six hundred dollars.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">His new job gave him leisure for star-gazing<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Often he bid me come and have a look<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Up the brass barrel, velvet black inside,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">At a star quaking in the other end.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I recollect a night of broken clouds<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And underfoot snow melted down to ice,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And melting further in the wind to mud.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Bradford and I had out the telescope.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">^Ve spread our two legs as we spread its three,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">202<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Pointed our thoughts the way we pointed it,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And standing at our leisure till the day broke,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Said some of the best things we ever said.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">That telescope was christened the Star-splitter,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Because it didn't do a thing but split<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">A star in two or three the way you split<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">A globule of quicksilver in your hand<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">With one stroke of your finger in the middle.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">It's a star-splitter if there ever was one<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And ought to do some good if splitting stars<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">'Sa thing to be compared with splitting wood.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">We've looked and looked, but after all where are we?<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Do we know any better where we are,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And how it stands between the night to-night<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And a man with a smoky lantern chimney?<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">How different from the way it ever stood?<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">203<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">THE AXE-HELVE<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I've known ere now an interfering branch<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Of alder catch my lifted axe behind me.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">But that was in the woods, to hold my hand<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">From striking at another alder's roots,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And that was, as I say, an alder branch.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">This was a man, Baptiste, who stole one day<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Behind me on the snow in my own yard<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Where I was working at the chopping-block,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And cutting nothing not cut down already.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">He caught my axe expertly on the rise,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">When all my strength put forth was in his favor,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Held it a moment where it was, to calm me,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Then took it from me and I let him take it.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I didn't know him well enough to know<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">What it was all about. There might be something<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">He had in mind to say to a bad neighbor<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">He might prefer to say to him disarmed.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">But all he had to tell me in French-English<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Was what he thought of not me, but my axe;<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Me only as I took my axe to heart.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">It was the bad axe-helve some one had sold me<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">'Made on machine/ he said, ploughing the grain<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">With a thick thumbnail to show how it ran<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Across the handle's long drawn serpentine,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Like the two strokes across a dollar sign.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">'You give her one good crack, she's snap raght off.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Den where's your hax-ead flying through de hair?'<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Admitted; and yet, what was that to him?<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">204<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">'Come on my house and I put you one in<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">What's las' awhile good hick'ry what's grow<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">crooked,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">De second growt' I cut myself tough, tough!'<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Something to sell? That wasn't how it sounded.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">'Den when you say you come? It's cost you nothing<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">To-naght?'<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">As well to-night as any night.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Beyond an over-warmth of kitchen stove<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">My welcome differed from no other welcome.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Baptiste knew best why I was where I was.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">So long as he would leave enough unsaid,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I shouldn't mind his being overjoyed<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">(If overjoyed he was) at having got me<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Where I must judge if what he knew about an axe<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">That not everybody else knew was to count<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">For nothing in the measure of a neighbor.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Hard if, though cast away for life with Yankees,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">A Frenchman couldn't get his human rating!<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Mrs. Baptiste came in and rocked a chair<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">That had as many motions as the world:<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">One back and forward, in and out of shadow,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">That got her nowhere; one more gradual,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Sideways, that would have run her on the stove<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">In time, had she not realized her danger<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And caught herself up bodily, chair and all,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">20 s<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And set herself back where she started from.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">'She ain't spick too much Henglishdat's too bad/<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I was afraid, in brightening first on me,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Then on Baptiste, as if she understood<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">What passed between us, she was only feigning.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Baptiste was anxious for her; but no more<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Than for himself, so placed he couldn't hope<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">To keep his bargain of the morning with me<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">In time to keep me from suspecting him<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Of really never having meant to keep it.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Needlessly soon he had his axe-helves out,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">A quiverful to choose from, since he wished me<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">To have the best he had, or had to spare-<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Not for me to ask which, when what he took<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Had beauties he had to point me out at length<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">To insure their not being wasted on me.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">He liked to have it slender as a whipstock,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Free from the least knot, equal to the strain<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Of bending like a sword across the knee.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">He showed me that the lines of a good helve<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Were native to the grain before the knife<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Expressed them, and its curves were no false curves<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Put on it from without. And there its strength lay<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">For the hard work. He chafed its long white body<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">From end to end with his rough hand shut round it.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">He tried it at the eye-hole in the axe -head.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">'Hahn, hahn/ he mused, 'don't need much taking<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">down/<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">206<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Baptiste knew how to make a short job long<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">For love of it, and yet not waste time either.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Do you know, what we talked about was knowledge?<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Baptiste on his defence about the children<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">He kept from school, or did his best to keep<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Whatever school and children and our doubts<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Of laid-on education had to do<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">With the curves of his axe-helves and his having<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Used these unscrupulously to bring me<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">To see for once the inside of his house.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Was I desired in friendship, partly as some one<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">To leave it to, whether the right to hold<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Such doubts of education should depend<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Upon the education of those who held them?<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">But now he brushed the shavings from his knee<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And stood the axe there on its horse's hoof,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Erect, but not without its waves, as when<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The snake stood up for evil in the Garden,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Top-heavy with a heaviness his short,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Thick hand made light of, steel-blue chin drawn down<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And in a little a French touch in that.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Baptiste drew back and squinted at it, pleased;<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">'See how she's cock her head!'<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">20?<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">THE GRINDSTONE<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">rlaving a wheel and four legs of its own<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Has never availed the cumbersome grindstone<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">To get it anywhere that I can see.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">These hands have helped it go, and even race;<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Not all the motion, though, they ever lent,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Not all the miles it may have thought it went,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Have got it one step from the starting place.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">It stands beside the same old apple tree.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The shadow of the apple tree is thin<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Upon it now, its feet are fast in snow.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">All other farm machinery's gone in,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And some of it on no more legs and wheel<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Than the grindstone can boast to stand or go,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">(I'm thinking chiefly of the wheelbarrow.)<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">For months it hasn't known the taste of steel,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Washed down with rusty water in a tin.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">But standing outdoors hungry, in the cold,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Except in towns at night, is not a sin.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And, anyway, its standing in the yard<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Under a ruinous live apple tree<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Has nothing any more to do with me,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Except that I remember how of old<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">One summer day. all day I drove it hard,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And someone mounted on it rode it hard,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And he and I between us ground a blade.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">1 gave it the preliminary spin,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And poured on water (tears it might have been);<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">2O?<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And when it almost gayly jumped and flowed,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">A Father-Time-like man got on and rode,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Armed with a scythe and spectacles that glowed.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">He turned on will-power to increase the load<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And slow me down and I abruptly slowed,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Like coming to a sudden railroad station.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I changed from hand to hand in desperation.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I wondered what machine of ages gone<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">This represented an improvement on.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">For all I knew it may have sharpened spears<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And arrowheads itself. Much use for years<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Had gradually worn it an oblate<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Spheroid that kicked and struggled in its gait,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Appearing to return me hate for hate;<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">(But I forgive it now as easily<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
