<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">As any other boyhood enemy<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Whose pride has failed to get him anywhere).<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I wondered who it was the man thought ground<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The one who held the wheel back or the one<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Who gave his life to keep it going round?<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I wondered if he really thought it fair<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">For him to have the say when we were done.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Such were the bitter thoughts to which I turned.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Not for myself was I so much concerned.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Oh no! -although, of course, I could have found<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">A better way to pass the afternoon<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Than grinding discord out of a grindstone,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And beating insects at their gritty tune.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Nor was I for the man so much concerned.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">209<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Once when the grindstone almost jumped its bearing<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">It looked as if he might be badly thrown<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And wounded on his blade. So far from caring,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I laughed inside, and only cranked the faster,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">(It ran as if it wasn't greased but glued);<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I'd welcome any moderate disaster<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">That might be calculated to postpone<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">What evidently nothing could conclude.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The thing that made me more and more afraid<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Was that we'd ground it sharp and hadn't known.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And now were only wasting precious blade.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And when he raised it dripping once and tried<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The creepy edge of it with wary touch,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And viewed it over his glasses funny-eyed,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Only disinterestedly to decide<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">It needed a turn more, I could have cried<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Wasn't there danger of a turn too much?<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Mightn't we make it worse instead of better?<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I was for leaving something to the whetter.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">What if it wasn't all it should be? I'd<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Be satisfied if he'd be satisfied.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">210<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">CAUL'S WIFE<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">1 o drive Paul out of any lumber camp<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">All that was needed was to say to him,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">'How is the wife, Paul?' and he'd disappear.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Some said it was because he had no wife,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And hated to be twitted on the subject.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Others because he'd come within a day<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Or so of having one, and then been jilted.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Others because he'd had one once, a good one,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Who'd run away with some one else and left him.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And others still because he had one now<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">He only had to be reminded of,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">He was all duty to her in a minute:<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">He had to run right off to look her up,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">As if to say, 'That's so, how is my wife?<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I hope she isn't getting into mischief.'<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">No one was anxious to get rid of Paul.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">He'd been the hero of the mountain camps<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Ever since, just to show them, he had slipped<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The bark of a whole tamarack off whole,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">As clean as boys do off a willow twig<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">To make a willow whistle on a Sunday<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">In April by subsiding meadow brooks.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">They seemed to ask him just to see him go,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">'How is the wife, Paul?' and he always went.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">He never stopped to murder anyone<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Who asked the question. He just disappeared-<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Nobody knew in what direction,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Although it wasn't usually long<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">211<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Before they heard of him in some new camp,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The same Paul at the same old feats of logging.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The question everywhere was why should Paul<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Object to being asked a civil question<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">A man you could say almost anything to<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Short of a fighting word. You have the answers.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And there was one more not so fair to Paul:<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">That Paul had married a wife not his equal.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Paul was ashamed of her. To match a hero,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">She would have had to be a heroine;<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Instead of which she was some half-breed squaw.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">But if the story Murphy told was true,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">She wasn't anything to be ashamed of.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">You know Paul could do wonders. Everyone's<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Heard how he thrashed the horses on a load<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">That wouldn't budge until they simply stretched<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Their rawhide harness from the load to camp.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Paul told the boss the load would be all right,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">'The sun will bring your load in'and it did<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">By shrinking the rawhide to natural length.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">That's what is called a stretcher. But I guess<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The one about his jumping so's to land<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">With both his feet at once against the Ceiling,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And then land safely right side up again,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Back on the floor, is fact or pretty near fact.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Well this is such a yarn. Paul sawed his wife<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Out of a white-pine log. Murphy was there,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And, as you might say, saw the lady born.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Paul worked at anything in lumbering.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">212<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">He'd been hard at it taking boards away<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">For I forgetthe last ambitious sawyer<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">To want to find out if he couldn't pile<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The lumber on Paul till Paul begged for mercy<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">They'd sliced the first slab off a big butt log,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And the sawyer had slammed the carriage back<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">To slam end on again against the saw teeth.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">To judge them by the way they caught themselves<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">When they saw what had happened to the log,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">They must have had a guilty expectation<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Something was going to go with their slambanging.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Something had left a broad black streak of grease<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">On the new wood the whole length of the log<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Except, perhaps, a foot at either end.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">But when Paul put his finger in the grease,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">It wasn't grease at all, but a long slot.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The log was hollow. They were sawing pine.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">( First time I ever saw a hollow pine.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">That comes of having Paul around the place.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Take it to hell for me,' the sawyer said.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Everyone had to have a look at it,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And tell Paul what he ought to do about it.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">(They treated it as his.) 'You take a jack-knife,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And spread the opening, and you've got a dug-out<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">All dug to go a-fishing in.' To Paul<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The hollow looked too sound and clean and empty<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Ever to have housed birds or beasts or bees.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">There was no entrance for them to get in by.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">It looked to him like some new kind of hollow<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">He thought he'd better take his jack-knife to.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">213<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">So after work that evening he came back<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And let enough light into it by cutting<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">To see if it was empty. He made out in there<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">A slender length of pith, or was it pith?<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">It might have been the skin a snake had cast<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And left stood up on end inside the tree<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The hundred years the tree must have been growing<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">More cutting and he had this in both hands,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And, looking from it to the pond near by,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Paul wondered how it would respond to water.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Not a breeze stirred, but just the breath of air<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">He made in walking slowly to the beach<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Blew it once off his hands and almost broke it.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">He laid it at the edge where it could drink.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">At the first drink it rustled and grew limp.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">At the next drink it grew invisible.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Paul dragged the shallows for it with his fingers,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And thought it must have melted. It was gone.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And then beyond the open water, dim with midges,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Where the log drive lay pressed against the boom,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">It slowly rose a person, rose a girl,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Her wet hair heavy on her like a helmet,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Who, leaning on a log looked back at Paul.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And that made Paul in turn look back<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">To see if it was anyone behind him<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">That she was looking at instead of him.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Murphy had been there watching all the time,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">But from a shed where neither of them could sec him<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">There was a moment of suspense in birth<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">When the girl seemed too water-logged to live,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Before she caught her first breath with a gasp<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">214<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And laughed. Then she climbed slowly to her feet,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And walked off talking to herself or Paul<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Across the logs like backs of alligators,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Paul taking after her around the pond.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Next evening Murphy and some other fellows<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Got drunk, and tracked the pair up Catamount,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">From the bare top of which there is a view<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">To other hills across a kettle valley.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And there, well after dark, let Murphy tell it,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">They saw Paul and his creature keeping house.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">It was the only glimpse that anyone<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Has had of Paul and her since Murphy saw them<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Falling in love across the twilight mill-pond.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">More than a mile across the wilderness<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">They sat together half-way up a cliff<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">In a small niche let into it, the girl<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Brightly, as if a star played on the place,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Paul darkly, like her shadow. All the light<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Was from the girl herself, though, not from a star,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">As was apparent from what happened next.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">All those great ruffians put their throats together,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And let out a loud yell, and threw a bottle,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">As a brute tribute of respect to beauty.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Of course the bottle fell short by a mile,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">But the shout reached the girl and put her light out,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">She went out like a firefly, and that was all.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">So there were witnesses that Paul was married,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And not to anyone to be ashamed of.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Everyone had been wrong in judging Paul.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">215<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Murphy told me Paul put on all those airs<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">About his wife to keep her to himself.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Paul was what's called a terrible possessor.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Owning a wife with him meant owning her.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">She wasn't anybody else's business,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Either to praise her, or so much as name her,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And he'd thank people not to think of her.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Murphy's idea was that a man like Paul<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Wouldn't be spoken to about a wife<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">[n any way the world knew how to speak.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">216<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">WILD GRAPES<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">What tree may not the fig be gathered from?<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The grape may not be gathered from the birch?<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">It's all you know the grape, or know the birch.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">As a girl gathered from the birch myself<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Equally with my weight in grapes, one autumn,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I ought to know what tree the grape is fruit of.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I \vas born, I suppose, like anyone,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And grew to be a little boyish girl<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">My brother could not always leave at home.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">But that beginning was wiped out in fear<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The day I swung suspended with the grapes,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And was come after like Eurydice<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And brought down safely from the upper regions;<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And the life I live now's an extra life<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I can waste as I please on whom I please.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">So if you see me celebrate two birthdays,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And give myself out as two different ages,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">One of them five years younger than I look-<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">One day my brother led me to a glade<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Where a white birch he knew of stood alone,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Wearing a thin head-dress of pointed leaves,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And heavy on her heavy hair behind,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Against her neck, an ornament of grapes.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Grapes, I knew grapes from having seen them last<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">year.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">One bunch of them, and there began to be<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Bunches all round me growing in white birches,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The way they grew round Lief the Lucky's German;<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Mostly as much beyond my lifted hands, though,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">As the moon used to seem when I was younger,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And only freely to be had for climbing.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">My brother did the climbing; and at first<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Threw me down grapes to miss and scatter<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And have to hunt for in sweet fern and hardhack;<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Which gave him some time to himself to eat,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">But not so much, perhaps, as a boy needed.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">So then, to make me wholly self-supporting,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">He climbed still higher and bent the tree to earth,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And put it in my hands to pick my own grapes.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">'Here, take a tree-top, I'll get down another.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Hold on with all your might when I let go.'<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I said I had the tree. It wasn't true.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The opposite was true. The tree had me.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The minute it was left with me alone<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">It caught me up as if I were the fish<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And it the fishpole. So I was translated<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">To loud cries from my brother of 'Let go!<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Don't you know anything, you girl? Let go!'<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">But I, with something of the baby grip<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Acquired ancestrally in just such trees<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">When wilder mothers than our wildest now<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Hung babies out on branches by the hands<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">To dry or wash or tan, I don't know which<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">(You'll have to ask an evolutionist)<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I held on uncomplainingly for life.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">My brother tried to make me laugh to help me.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">218<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">&lt; What are you doing up there in those grapes?<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Don't be afraid. A few of them won't hurt you.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I mean, they won't pick you if you don't them/<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Much danger of my picking anything!<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">By that time I was pretty well reduced<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">To a philosophy of hang-and-let-hang.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">'Now you know how it feels/ my brother said,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">* To be a bunch of fox-grapes, as they call them,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">That when it thinks it has escaped the fox<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">By growing where it shouldn't on a birch,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Where a fox wouldn't think to look for it<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And if he looked and found it, couldn't reach it-<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Just then come you and I to gather it.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Only you have the advantage of the grapes<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">In one way: you have one more stem to cling by,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And promise more resistance to the picker/<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">One by one I lost off my hat and shoes,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And still I clung. I let my head fall back,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And shut my eyes against the sun, my ears<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Against my brother's nonsense; 'Drop/ he said,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Til catch you in my arms. It isn't far/<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">(Stated in lengths of him it might not be. )<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">'Drop or I'll shake the tree and shake you down/<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Grim silence on my part as I sank lower,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">My small wrists stretching till they showed the ban*<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">jo strings.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">'Why, if she isn't serious about it!<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Hold tight awhile till I think what to do.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I'll bend the tree down and let you down by it/<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">219<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">[ don't know much about the letting down;<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">But once I felt ground with my stocking feet<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And the world came revolving back to me,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I know I looked long at my curled-up fingers.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Before I straightened them and brushed the bark off.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">My brother said: 'Don't you weigh anything?<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Try to weigh something next time., so you won't<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Be run oft with by birch trees into space/<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">It wasn't my not weighing anything<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">So much as my not knowing anything<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">My brother had been nearer right before.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I had not taken the first step in knowledge;<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I had not learned to let go with the hands,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">As still I have not learned to with the heart,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And have no wish to with the heartnor need,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">That I can see. The mind is not the heart.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I may yet live, as I know others live,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">To wish in vain to let go with the mind<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Of cares, at night, to sleep; but nothing tells me<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">That I need learn to let go with the heart.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">220<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">THE WITCH OF COOS<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I staid the night for shelter at a farm<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Behind the mountain, with a mother and son,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Two old-believers. They did all the talking.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">MOTHER. Folks think a witch who has familiar<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">spirits<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">She could call up to pass a winter evening,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">But won't, should be burned at the stake or some^<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">thing.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Summoning spirits isn't 'Button, button,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Who's got the button/ 1 would have them know.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">SON. Mother can make a common table rear<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And kick with two legs like an army mule.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">MOTHER. And when I've done it, what good have<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I done?<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Rather than tip a table for you, let me<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Tell you what Ralle the Sioux Control once told me,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">He said the dead had souls, but when I asked him<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">How could that be I thought the dead were souls,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">He broke my trance. Don't that make you suspicious<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">That there's something the dead are keeping back?<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Yes, there's something the dead are keeping back.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">SON. You wouldn't want to tell him what we have<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Up attic, mother?<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">221<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">MOTHER. Bones a skeleton.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">SON. But the headboard of mother's bed is pushed<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Against the attic door: the door is nailed.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">It's harmless, Mother hears it in the night<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Halting perplexed behind the barrier<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Of door and headboard. Where it wants to get<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Is back into the cellar where it came from.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">MOTHER. We'll never let them, will we, son! We'll<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">never!<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">SON. It left the cellar forty years ago<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And carried itself like a pile of dishes<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Up one flight from the cellar to the kitchen,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Another from the kitchen to the bedroom,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Another from the bedroom to the attic,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Right past both father and mother, and neither<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">stopped it.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Father had gone upstairs; mother was downstairs.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I was a baby: I don't know where I was.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">MOTHER. The only fault my husband found withme<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I went to sleep before I went to bed,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Especially in winter when the bed<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Might just as well be ice and the clothes snow.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The night the bones came up the cellar-stairs<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Toffile had gone to bed alone and left me,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">But left an open door to cool the room off<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">So as to sort of turn me out of it.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">222<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I was just coming to myself enough<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">To wonder where the cold was coming from,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">When I heard Toffile upstairs in the bedroom<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And thought I heard him downstairs in the cellar.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The board we had laid down to walk dry-shod on<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">When there was water in the cellar in spring<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Struck the hard cellar bottom. And then someone<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Began the stairs, two footsteps for each step,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The way a man with one leg and a crutch,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Or a little child, comes up. It wasn't Toffile:<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">It wasn't anyone who could be there.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The bulkhead double-doors were double-locked<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And swollen tight and buried under snow.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The cellar windows were banked up with sawdust<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And swollen tight and buried under snow.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">It was the bones. I knew them and good reason.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">My first impulse was to get to the knob<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And hold the door. But the bones didn't try<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The door; they halted helpless on the landing,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Waiting for things to happen in their favor.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The faintest restless rustling ran all through them.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I never could have done the thing I did<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">If the wish hadn't been too strong in me<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">To see how they were mounted for this walk.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I had a vision of them put together<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Not like a man, but like a chandelier.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">So suddenly I flung the door wide on him.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">A moment he stood balancing with emotion,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And all but lost himself. (A tongue of fire<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">223<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Flashed out and licked along his upper teeth.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Smoke rolled inside the sockets of his eyes.)<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Then he came at me with one hand outstretched,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The way he did in life once; but this time<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I struck the hand off brittle on the floor,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And fell back from him on the floor myself.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The finger-pieces slid in all directions.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">(Where did I see one of those pieces lately^<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Hand me my button-boxit must be thei c. )<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I sat up on the floor and shouted, 'Toffil* 1 ,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">It's coming up to you.' It had its choice<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Of the door to the cellar or the hall.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">It took the hall door for the novelty,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And set off briskly for so slow a thing,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Still going every which way in the joints, though,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">So that it looked like lightning or a scribble,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">From the slap I had just now given its hand.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I listened till it almost climbed the stairs<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">From the hall to the only finished bedroom,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Before I got up to do anything;<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Then ran and shouted, 'Shut the bedroom door,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Toffile, for my sake!' ( Company?' he said,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">* Don't make me get up; Pm too warm in bed/<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">So lying forward weakly on the handrail<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I pushed myself upstairs, and in the light<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">(The kitchen had been dark) I had to own<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I could see nothing. 'Toffile, I don't see it.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">It's with us in the room though. It's the bones/<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">*What bones?' 'The cellar bones out of the grave/<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">224<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">That made him throw his bare legs out of bed<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And sit up by me and take hold of me.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I wanted to put out the light and see<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">If I could see it, or else mow the room,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">With our arms at the level of our knees,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And bring the chalk-pile down. Til tell you what<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">It's looking for another door to try.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The uncommonly deep snow has made him think<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Of his old song, The Wild Colonial Boy,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">He always used to sing along the tote-road.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">He's after an open door to get out-doors.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Let's trap him with an open door up attic/<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Toffile agreed to that, and sure enough,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Almost the moment he was given an opening,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The steps began to climb the attic stairs.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I heard them. Toffile didn't seem to hear them.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">'Quick!' I slammed to the door and held the knob,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">'Toffile, get nails/ I made him nail the door shut<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And push the headboard of the bed against it.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Then we asked was there anything<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Up attic that we'd ever want again.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The attic was less to us than the cellar.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">If the bones liked the attic, let them have it.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Let them stay in the attic. When they sometimes<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Come down the stairs at night and stand perplexed<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Behind the door and headboard of the bed,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Brushing their chalky skull with chalky fingers,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">With sounds like the dry rattling of a shutter,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">That's what I sit up in the dark to say<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">225<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">To no one any more since Toffile died.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Let them stay in the attic since they went there.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I promised Toffile to be cruel to them<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">For helping them be cruel once to him.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">SON. We think they had a grave down in the cellar.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">MOTHER. We know they had a grave down in the<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">cellar.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">SON. We never could find out whose bones they<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">were.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">MOTHER. Yes, we could too, son. Tell the truth for<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">once<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">They were a man's his father killed for me.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I mean a man he killed instead of me.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The least I could do was to help dig their grave.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">We were about it one night in the cellar.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Son knows the story: but 'twas not for him<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">To tell the truth, suppose the time had come.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Son looks surprised to see me end a lie<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">We'd kept all these years between ourselves<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">So as to have it ready for outsiders.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">But tonight I don't care enough to lie<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I don't remember why I ever cared.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Toffile, if he were here, I don't believe<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Could tell you why he ever cared himself. . .<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>

<p class="p1"><span class="s1">226<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>

<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">She hadn't found the finger-bone she wanted<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Among the buttons poured out in her lap.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I verified the name next morning: Toffile.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The rural letter-box said Toffile Lajway.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">227<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">AN EMPTY THREAT<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I stay;<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">But it isn't as if<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">There wasn't always Hudson's Bay<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And the fur trade,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">A small skiff<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And a paddle blade.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I can just see my tent pegged,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And me on the floor,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Crosslegged,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
