<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And a trapper looking in at the door<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">With furs to sell.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">His name's Joe,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Alias John,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And between what he doesn't know<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And won't tell<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">About where Henry Hudson's gone,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I can't say he's much help;<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">But we get on.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The seal yelp<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">On an ice cake.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">It's not men by some mistake?<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">No,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">There's not a soul<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">128<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">l&lt;or a wind- break<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Between me and the North Pole<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Except always John- Joe,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">My French Indian Esquimaux.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And he's off setting traps,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">In one himself perhaps.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Give a head shake<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Over so much bay<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Thrown away<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">In snow and mist<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">That doesn't exist,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I was going to say,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">For God, man or beast's sake.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Yet does perhaps for all three.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Don't ask Joe<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">What it is to him.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">It's sometimes dim<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">\Vhat it is to me,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Unless it be<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">It's the old captain's dark fate<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Who failed to find or force a strait<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">In its two-thousand-mile coast;<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And his crew left him where he failed,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And nothing came of all he sailed.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">It's to say, 'You and F<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">To such a ghost,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">229<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">''You and I<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Off here<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">With the dead race of the Greak Auk!'<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And, 'Better defeat almost,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">If seen clear,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Than life's victories of doubt<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">That need endless talk talk<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">To make them out.'<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">230<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">FRAGMENTARY BLUE<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Why make so much of fragmentary blue<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">In here and there a bird, or butterfly,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Or flower, or wearing-stone, or open eye,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">When heaven presents in sheets the solid hue?<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Since earth is earth, perhaps, not heaven (as yet)<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Though some savants make earth include the sky;<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And blue so far above us comes so high,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">It only gives our wish for blue a whet.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">231<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">FIRE AND ICE<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">say the world "will end in fire,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Some say in ice.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">From what I've tasted of desire<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I hold with those who favor fire.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">But if it had to perish twice,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I think I know enough of hate<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">To say that for destruction ice<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">fs also great<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And would suffice.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">232<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">DUST OF SNOW<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Ihe way a crow<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Shook down on me<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The dust of snow<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">From a hemlock tree<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Has given my heart<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">A change of mood<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And saved some part<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Of a day I had rued.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">233<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">TO E. T.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">1 slumbered with your poems on my breast<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Spread open as I dropped them half-read through<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Like dove wings on a figure on a tomb<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">To see, if in a dream they brought of you,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I might not have the chance I missed in life<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Through some delay, and call you to your face<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">First soldier, and then poet, and then both,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Who died a soldier-poet of your race.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">1 meant, you meant, that nothing should remain<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Unsaid between us, brother, and this remained<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And one thing more that was not then to say:<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The Victory for what it lost and gained.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">You went to meet the shell's embrace of fire<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">On Vimy Ridge; and when you fell that day<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The war seemed over more for you than me,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">But now for me than youthe other way.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">How over, though, for even me who knew<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The foe thrust back unsafe beyond the Rhine,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">If I was not to speak of it to you<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And see you pleased once more with words of mine?<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">234<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">NOTHING GOLD CAN STAY<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">INature's first green is gold,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Her hardest hue to hold.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Her early leaf's a flower;<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">But only so an hour.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Then leaf subsides to leaf.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">So Eden sank to grief,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">So dawn goes down to day.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Nothing gold can stay.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">235<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">THE RUNAWAY<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Once when the snow of the year was beginning to<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">fall,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">We stopped by a mountain pasture to say, ' Whose<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">colt?'<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">A little Morgan had one forefoot on the wall,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The other curled at his breast. He dipped his head<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And snorted at us. And then he had to bolt.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">We heard the miniature thunder where he fled,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And we saw him, or thought we saw him, dim and<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Like a shadow against the curtain of falling flakes.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">*I think the little fellow's afraid of the snow.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">He isn't winter-broken. It isn't play<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">With the little fellow at all. He's running away.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I doubt if even his mother could tell him, "Sakes,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">It's only weather/' He'd think she didn't know!<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Where is his mother? He can't be out alone.'<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And now he comes again with clatter of stone,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And mounts the wall again with whited eyes<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And all his tail that isn't hair up straight.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">He shudders his coat as if to throw off flies.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">'Whoever it is that leaves him out so late,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">When other creatures have gone to stall and bin,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Ought to be told to come and take him in.'<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">236<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">THE AIM WAS SONG<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">13efore man came to blow it right<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The wind once blew itself untaught,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And did its loudest day and night<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">In any rough place where it caught.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Man came to tell it what was wrong:<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">It hadn't fouijd the place to blow;<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">It blew too hardthe aim was song.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And listen how it ought to go!<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">He took a little in his mouth,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And held it long enough for north<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">To be converted into south,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And then by measure blew it forth.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">By measure. It was word and note,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The wind the wind had meant to be<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">A little through the lips and throat.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The aim was song the wind could see.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">237<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">STOPPING BY WOODS ON A SNOWY<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">EVENING<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Whose woods these are I think I know<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">His house is in the village though;<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">He will not see me stopping here<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">To watch his woods fill up with snow.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">My little horse must think it queer<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">To stop without a farmhouse near<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Between the woods and frozen lake<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The darkest evening of the year.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">He gives his harness bells a shake<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">To ask if there is some mistake.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The only other sound's the sweep<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Of easy wind and downy flake.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The woods are lovely, dark and deep.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">But I have promises to keep,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And miles to go before I sleep,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And miles to go before I sleep.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">238<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">FOR ONCE, THEN, SOMETHING<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">vJthers taunt me with having knelt at well-curbs<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Always wrong to the light, so never seeing<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Deeper down in the well than where the water<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Gives me back in a shining surface picture<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Me myself in the summer heaven godlike<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Looking out of a wreath of fern and cloud puffs.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Once, when trying with chin against a well-curb,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I discerned, as I thought, beyond the picture,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Through the picture, a something white, uncertain,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Something more of the depths and then I lost it.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Water came to rebuke the too clear water.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">One drop fell from a fern, and lo, a ripple<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Shook whatever it was lay there at bottom,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Blurred it, blotted it out. What was that whiteness?<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Truth? A pebble of quartz? For once, then, some-<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">thing.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">239<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">6LUE-BUTTERFLY DAY<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">It is blue-butterfly day here in spring.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And with these sky-flakes down in flurry on flurry<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">There is more unmixed color on the wing<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Than flowers will show for days unless they hurry.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">But these are flowers that fly and all but sing:<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And now from having ridden out desire<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">They lie closed over in the wind and cling<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Where wheels have freshly sliced the April mire.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">240<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">THE ONSET<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Always the same, when on a fated night<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">At last the gathered snow lets down as white<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">As may be in dark woods, and with a song<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">It shall not make again all winter long<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Of hissing on the yet uncovered ground,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I almost stumble looking up and round,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">As one who overtaken by the end<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Gives up his errand, and lets death descend<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Upon him where he is, with nothing done<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">To evil, no important triumph won,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">More than if life had never been begun.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Yet all the precedent is on my side:<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I know that winter death has never tried<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The earth but it has failed: the snow may heap<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">In long storms an undrifted four feet deep<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">As measured against maple, birch and oak,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">It cannot check the peeper's silver croak;<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And I shall see the snow all go down hill<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">In water of a slender April rill<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">That flashes tail through last year's withered brake<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And dead weeds, like a disappearing snake.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Nothing will be left white but here a birch,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And there a clump of houses with a church.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">241<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">TO EARTHWARD<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Love at the lips was touch<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">As sweet as I could bear;<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And once that seemed too much;<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I lived on air<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">That crossed me from sweet things,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The flow of was it musk<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">From hidden grapevine springs<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Down hill at dusk?<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I had the swirl and ache<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">From sprays of honeysuckle<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">That when they're gathered shake<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Dew on the knuckle.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I craved strong sweets, but those<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Seemed strong when I was young;<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The petal of the rose<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">It was that stung.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Now no joy but lacks salt<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">That is not dashed with pain<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And weariness and fault;<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I crave the stain<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Of tears, the aftermark<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Of almost too much love,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">242<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The sweet of bitter bark<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And burning clove.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">When stiff and sore and scarred<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I take away my hand<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">From leaning on it hard<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">In grass and sand ;<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The hurt is not enough:<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I long for weight and strength<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">To feel the earth as rough<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">To all my length.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">GOOD-BYE AND KEEP COLD<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">JThis saying good-bye on the edge of the dark<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And the cold to an orchard so young in the bark<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Reminds me of all that can happen to harm<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">An orchard away at the end of the farm<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">All winter, cut off by a hill from the house.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">[ don't want it girdled by rabbit and mouse,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">[ don't want it dreamily nibbled for browse<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">By deer, and I don't want it budded by grouse.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">(If certain it wouldn't be idle to call<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I'd summon grouse, rabbit, and deer to the wall<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And warn them away with a stick for a gun.)<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I don't want it stirred by the heat of the sun,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">(We made it secure against being, I hope^<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">By setting it out on a northerly slope.)<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">No orchard's the worse for the wintriest storm;<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">But one thing about it ; it mustn't get warm.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">'How often already you've had to be told,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Keep cold, young orchard. Good-bye and keep cold,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Dread fifty above more than fifty below.'<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I have to be gone for a season or so.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">My business a while is with different trees,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Less carefully nurtured, less fruitful than these,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And such as is done to their wood with an axe--<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Maples and birches and tamaracks.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I wish I could promise to lie in the night<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And think of an orchard's arboreal plight<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">244<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">When slowly (and nobody comes with a light)<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Its heart sinks lower under the sod.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">But something has to be left to God.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">245<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">TWO LOOK AT TWO<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">JLove and forgetting might have carried them<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">A little further up the mountain side<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">With night so near, but not much further up.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">They must have halted soon in any case<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">With thoughts of the path back, how rough it was<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">With rock and washout, and unsafe in darkness;<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">When they were halted by a tumbled wall<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">With barbed-wire binding. They stood facing this,,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Spending what onward impulse they still had<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">In one last look the way they must not go,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">On up the failing path, where, if a stone<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Or earthslide moved at night, it moved itself;<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">No footstep moved it. 'This is all/ they sighed,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">'Good-night to woods.' But not so; there was more.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">A doe from round a spruce stood looking at them<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Across the wall, as near the wall as they.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">She saw them in their field, they her in hers.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The difficulty of seeing what stood still,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Like some up-ended boulder split in two,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Was in her clouded eyes: they saw no fear there.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">She seemed to think that two thus they were safe.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Then, as if they were something that, though strange,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">She could not trouble her mind with too long,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">She sighed and passed unscared along the wall.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">'This, then, is all. What more is there to ask?'<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">But no, not yet. A snort to bid them wait.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">A buck from round the spruce stood looking at them<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">246<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Across the wall as near the wall as they.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">This was an antlered buck of lusty nostril,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Not the same doe come back into her place.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">He viewed them quizzically with jerks of head,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">As if to ask, 'Why don't you make some motion?<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Or give some sign of life? Because you can't.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I doubt if you're as living as you look/<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Thus till he had them almost feeling dared<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">To stretch a proffering hand and a spell-breaking.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Then he too passed unscared along the wall.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Two had seen two, whichever side you spoke from.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">'This must be all/ It was all. Still they stood,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">A great wave from it going over them,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">As if the earth in one unlooked-for favor<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Had made them certain earth returned their love.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">247<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">NOT TO KEEP<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Ihey sent him back to her. The letter came<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Saying . . . And she could have him. And before<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">She could be sure there was no hidden ill<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Under the formal writing^ he was in her sight,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Living. They gave him back to her alive-<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">How else? They are not known to send the dead-<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And not disfigured visibly. His face?<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">His hands? She had to look, to ask,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">' What is it, dear?' And she had given all<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And still she had all they had they the lucky!<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Wasn't she glad now? Everything seemed won,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And all the rest for them permissible ease.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">She had to ask, ' What was it, dear?'<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">* Enough,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Yet not enough. A bullet through and through,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">High in the breast. Nothing but what good care<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And medicine and rest, and you a week,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Can cure me of to go again. 7 The same<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Grim giving to do over for them both.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">She dared no more than ask him with her eyes<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">How was it with him for a second trial.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And with his eyes he asked her not to ask.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">They had given him back to her, but not to keep.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">A BROOK IN THE CITY<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Ihe farm house lingers, though averse to square<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">With the new city street it has to wear<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">A number in. But what about the brook<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">That held the house as in an elbow-crook?<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I ask as one who knew the brook, its strength<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And impulse, having dipped a finger length<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And made it leap my knuckle, having tossed<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">A flower to try its currents where they crossed.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The meadow grass could be cemented down<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">From growing under pavements of a town;<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The apple trees be sent to hearth-stone flame.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Is water wood to serve a brook the same?<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">How else dispose of an immortal force<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">No longer needed? Staunch it at its source<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">With cinder loads dumped down? The brook was<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">thrown<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Deep in a sewer dungeon under stone<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">In fetid darkness still to live and run<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And all fo^ nothing it had ever done<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Except forget to go in fear perhaps.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">No one would know except for ancient maps<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">That such a brook ran water. But I wonder<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">If from its being kept forever under<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The thoughts may not have risen that so keep<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">This new-built city from both work and sleep.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">249<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">THE KITCHEN CHIMNEY<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Builder, in building the little house,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">In every way you may please yourself;<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">But please please me in the kitchen chimney:<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Don't build me a chimney upon a shelf.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">However far you must go for bricks,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Whatever they cost a-piece or a pound,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Buy me enough for a full-length chimney,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">build the chimney clear from the ground.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">It's not that Fm greatly afraid of fire,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">But I never heard of a house that throve<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">(And I know of one that didn't thrive)<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Where the chimney started above the stove.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And I dread the ominous stain of tar<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">That there always is on the papered walls,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And the smell of fire drowned in rain<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">That there always is when the chimney's false.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">A shelf's for a clock or vase or picture,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">But I don't see why it should have to bear<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">A chimney that only would serve to remind me<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Of castles I used to build in air.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">250<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">LOOKING FOR A SUNSET BIRD IN<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">WINTER<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Ihe west was getting out of gold,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The breath of air had died of cold,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">When shoeing home across the white,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I thought I saw a bird alight.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">In summer when I passed the place<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I had to stop and lift my face;<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">A bird with an angelic gift<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Was singing in it sweet and swift.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">No bird was singing in it now.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">A single leaf was on a bough,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And that was all there was to see<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">In going twice around the tree.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">From my advantage on a hill<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I judged that such a crystal chill<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Was only adding frost to snow<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">As gilt to gold that wouldn't show.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">A brush had left a crooked stroke<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Of what was either cloud or smoke<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">From north to south across the blue;<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">A piercing little star was through.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">251<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">GATHERING LEAVES<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">opades take up leaves<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">No better than spoons,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And bags full of leaves<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Are light as balloons.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I make a great noise<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Of rustling all day<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Like rabbit and deer<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Running away.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">But the mountains I raise<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Elude my embrace.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Flowing over my arms<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And into my face.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I may load and unload<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Again and again<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Till I fill the whole shed,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And what have I then?<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Next to nothing for weight;<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And since they grew duller<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">From contact with earth,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Next to nothing for color.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">252<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Next to nothing for use.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">But a crop is a crop,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And who's to say where<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The harvest shall stop?<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">253<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">MISGIVING<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">All crying 'We will go with you, O Wind!'<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The foliage follow him, leaf and stem;<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">But a sleep oppresses them as they go,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And they end by bidding him stay with them.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Since ever they flung abroad in spring<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The leaves had promised themselves this flight,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Who now would fain seek sheltering wall,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Or thicket, or hollow place for the night.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And now they answer his summoning blast<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">With an ever vaguer and vaguer stir,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Or at utmost a little reluctant whirl<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">That drops them no further than where they were<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I only hope that when I am free<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">As they are free to go in quest<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Of the knowledge beyond the bounds of life<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">It may not seem better to me to rest.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">254<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">PLOWMEN<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">A plow, they say., to plow the snow.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">They cannot mean to plant it, though-<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Unless in bitterness to mock<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">At having cultivated rock.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">255<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">ON A TREE FALLEN ACROSS THE<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">ROAD<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">(TO HEAR US TALK)<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I he tree the tempest with a crash of wood<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Throws down in front of us is not to bar<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Our passage to our journey's end for good,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">But just to ask us who we think we are<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Insisting always on our own way so.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">She likes to halt us in our runner tracks,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And make us get down in a foot of snow<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Debating what to do without an axe.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And yet she knows obstruction is in vain:<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">We will not be put off the final goal<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">We have it hidden in us to attain,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Not though we have to seize earth by the pole<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And, tired of aimless circling in one place,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Steer straight off after something into space.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">256<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">OUR SINGING STRENGTH<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">It snowed in spring on earth so dry and warm<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The flakes could find no landing place to form.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Hordes spent themselves to make it wet and cold,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And still they failed of any lasting hold.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">They made no white impression on the black.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">They disappeared as if earth sent them back.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Not till from separate flakes they changed at night<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">To almost strips and tapes of ragged white<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Did grass and garden ground confess it snowed.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And all go back to winter but the road.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Next day the scene was piled and puffed and dead.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The grass lay flattened under one great tread.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Borne down until the end almost took root,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The rangey bough anticipated fruit<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">With snowballs cupped in every opening bud.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The road alone maintained itself in mud,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Whatever its secret was of greater heat<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">From inward fires or brush of passing feet.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">In spring more mortal singers than belong<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">To any one place cover us with song.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Thrush, bluebird, blackbird, sparrow, and robin<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
