<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">throng;<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Some to go further north to Hudson's Bay,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Some that have come too far north back away,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Really a very few to build and stay.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Now was seen how these liked belated snow.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The fields had nowhere left for them to go;<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">They'd soon exhausted all there was in flying;<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The trees they'd had enough of with once trying<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And setting off their heavy powder load.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">They could find nothing open but the road.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">So there they let their lives be narrowed in<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">By thousands the bad weather made akin.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The road became a channel running flocks<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Of glossy birds like ripples over rocks.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">[ drove them under foot in bits of flight<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">That kept the ground, almost disputing right<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Of way with me from apathy of wing,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">A talking twitter all they had to sing.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">A few I must have driven to despair<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Made quick asides, but having done in air<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">A whir among white branches great and small<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">As in some too much carven marble hall<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Where one false wing beat would have brought<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">down all,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Came tamely back in front of me, the Drover,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">To suffer the same driven nightmare over.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">One such storm in a lifetime couldn't teach them<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">That back behind pursuit it couldn't reach them;<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">None flew behind me to be left alone.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Well, something for a snowstorm to have shown<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The country' s singing strength thus brought together,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">That though repressed and moody with the weather<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Was none the less there ready to be freed<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And sing the wildflowers up from root and seed.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">253<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">THE NEED OF BEING VERSED IN<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">COUNTRY THINGS<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Ihe house had gone to bring again<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">To the midnight sky a sunset glow.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Now the chimney was all of the house that stood,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Like a pistil after the petals go.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The barn opposed across the way,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">That would have joined the house in flame<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Had it been the will of the wind, was left<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">To bear forsaken the place's name.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">No more it opened with all one end<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">For teams that came by the stony road<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">To drum on the floor with scurrying hoofs<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And brush the mow with the summer load.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The birds that came to it through the air<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">At broken windows flew out and in,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Their murmur more like the sigh we sigh<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">From too much dwelling on what has been.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Yet for them the lilac renewed its leaf,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And the aged elm, though touched with fire;<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And the dry pump flung up an awkward arm;<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And the fence post carried a strand of wire.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">259<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">For them there was really nothing sad.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">But though they rejoiced in the nest they kept,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">One had to be versed in country things<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Not to believe the phoebes wept<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">26O<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">West-Running Brook<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">SPRING POOLS<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Ihese pools that, though in forests, still reflect<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The total sky almost without defect,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And like the flowers beside them, chill and shiver,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Will like the flowers beside them soon be gone,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And yet not out by any brook or river,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">But up by roots to bring dark foliage on.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The trees that have it in their pent-up buds<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">To darken nature and be summer woods-<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Let them think twice before they use their powers<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">To blot out and drink up and sweep away<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">These flowery waters and these watery flowers<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">From snow that melted only yesterday.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">263<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">THE FREEDOM OF THE MOON<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I ve tried the new moon tilted in the air<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Above a hazy tree-and-farmhouse cluster<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">As you might try a jewel in your hair,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I've tried it fine with little breadth of lustre,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Alone, or in one ornament combining<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">With one first-water star almost as shining.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I put it shining anywhere I please.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">By walking slowly on some evening later,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I've pulled it from a crate of crooked trees,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And brought it over glossy water, greater,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And dropped it in, and seen the image wallow,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The color run, all sorts of wonder follow.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">264<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">FIREFLIES IN THE GARDEN<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">ilere come real stars to fill the upper skies,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And here on earth come emulating flies,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">That though they never equal stars in size,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">(And they were never really stars at heart)<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Achieve at times a very star-like start.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Only, of course, they can't sustain the part.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">365<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">ATMOSPHERE<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">INSCRIPTION FOR A GARDEN WALL<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">XVinds blow the open grassy places bleak;<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">But where this old wall burns a sunny cheek,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">They eddy over it too toppling weak<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">To blow the earth or anything self-clear;<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Moisture and color and odor thicken here.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The hours of daylight gather atmosphere.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">266<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">DEVOTION<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Ihe heart can think of no devotion<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Greater than being shore to the ocean-<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Holding the curve of one position,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Counting an endless repetition.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">267<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">ON GOING UNNOTICED<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">As vain to raise a voice as a sigh<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">In the tumult of free leaves on high.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">What are you in the shadow of trees<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Engaged up there with the light and breeze?<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Less than the coral-root you know<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">That is content with the daylight low,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And has no leaves at all of its own;<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Whose spotted flowers hang meanly down<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">You grasp the bark by a rugged pleat.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And look up small from the forest's feet.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The only leaf it drops goes wide.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Your name not written on either side.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">You linger your little hour and are gone,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And still the woods sweep leafily on,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Not even missing the coral-root flower<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">You took as a trophy of the hour.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">268<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">A PASSING GLIMPSE<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">To Ridgely Torrence<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">On Last Looking Into His 'Hesperides*<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">1 often see flowers from a passing car<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">That are gone before I can tell what they are.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I want to get out of the train and go back<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">To see what they were beside the track.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I name all the flowers I am sure they weren't:<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Not fireweed loving where woods have burnt-<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Not blue bells gracing a tunnel mouth-<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Not lupine living on sand and drouth.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Was something brushed across my mind<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">That no one on earth will ever find?<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Heaven gives its glimpses only to those<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Not in position to look too close.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">369<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">A PECK OF GOLD<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Dust always blowing about the town,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Except when sea-fog laid it down,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And I was one of the children told<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Some of the blowing dust was gold.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">All the dust the wind blew high<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Appeared like gold in the sunset sky,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">But I was one of the children told<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Some of the dust was really gold.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Such was life in the Golden Gate:<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Gold dusted all we drank and ate,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And I was one of the children told,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">'We all must eat our peck of gold/<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">270<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">ACCEPTANCE<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">When the spent sun throws up its rays on cloud<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And goes down burning into the gulf below,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">No voice in nature is heard to cry aloud<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">At what has happened. Birds, at least, must know<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">It is the change to darkness in the sky.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Murmuring something quiet in her breast,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">One bird begins to close a faded eye;<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Or overtaken too far from his nest,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Hurrying low above the grove, some waif<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Swoops just in time to his remembered tree.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">At most he thinks or twitters softly, 'Safe!<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Now let the night be dark for all of me.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Let the night be too dark for me to see<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Into the future. Let what will be, be/<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">271<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">ONCE BY THE PACIFIC<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Ihe shattered water made a misty din.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Great waves looked over others coming in,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And thought of doing something to the shore<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">That water never did to land before.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The clouds were low and hairy in the skies,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Like locks blown forward in the gleam of eyes.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">You could not tell, and yet it looked as if<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The shore was lucky in being backed by cliff,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The cliff in being backed by continent;<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">It looked as if a night of dark intent<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Was coming, and not only a night, an age.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Someone had better be prepared for rage.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">There would be more than ocean-water broken<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Before God's last Put out the Light was spoken.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">272<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">LODGED<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Ihe rain to the wind said<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">1 You push and I'll pelt/<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">They so smote the garden bed<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">That the flowers actually knelt,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And lay lodged though not dead.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I know how the flowers felt.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">273<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">A MINOR BIRD<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I have wished a bird would fly away,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And not sing by my house all day;<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Have clapped my hands at him from the door<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">When it seemed as if I could bear no more.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The fault must partly have been in me.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The bird was not to blame for his key.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And of course there must be something wrong<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">In wanting to silence any song.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">274<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">BEREFT<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Where had I heard this wind before<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Change like this to a deeper roar?<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">WTiat would it take my standing there for,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Holding open a restive door,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Looking down hill to a frothy shore?<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Summer was past and day was past.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Sombre clouds in the west were massed.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Out in the porch's sagging floor,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Leaves got up in a coil and hissed,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Blindly struck at my knee and missed.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Something^sinister in the tone<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Told me my secret must be known:<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">\Vord I was in the house alone<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Somehow must have gotten abroad,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">"Word I was in my life alone,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Word I had no one left but God,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">275<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">TREE AT MY WINDOW<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Iree at my window, window tree,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">My sash is lowered when night comes on;<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">3ut let there never be curtain drawn<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Between you and me.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Vague dream-head lifted out of the ground,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And thing next most diffuse to cloud,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Not all your light tongues talking aloud<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Could be profound.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">But tree, I have seen you taken and tossed,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And if you have seen me when I slept,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">You have seen me when I was taken and swept<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And all but lost.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">That day she put our heads together,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Fate had her imagination about her,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Your head so much concerned with outer,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Mine with inner, weather.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">276<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">THE PEACEFUL SHEPHERD<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">If heaven were to do again,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And on the pasture bars,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I leaned to line the figures in<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Between the dotted stars,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I should be tempted to forget,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I fear, the Crown of Rule,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The Scales of Trade, the Cross of Faith,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">As hardly worth renewal.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">For these have governed in our lives,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And see how men have warred.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The Cross, the Crown, the Scales may all<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">As well have been the Sword.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">277<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">A WINTER EDEN<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">A winter garden in an alder swamp,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Where conies now come out to sun and romp,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">As near a paradise as it can be<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And not melt snow or start a dormant tree.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">It lifts existence on a plane of snow<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">One level higher than the earth below,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">One level nearer heaven overhead,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And last year's berries shining scarlet red.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">It lifts a gaunt luxuriating beast<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Where he can stretch and hold his highest feast<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">On some wild apple tree's young tender bark,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">What well may prove the year's high girdle mark.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">So near to paradise all pairing ends:<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Here loveless birds now flock as winter friends,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Content with bud-inspecting. They presume<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">To say which buds are leaf and which are bloom.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">A feather-hammer gives a double knock.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">This Eden day is done at two o'clock.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">An hour of winter day might seem too short<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">To make it worth life's while to wake and sport.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">278<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">THE FLOOD<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Blood has been harder to dam back than water.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Just when we think we have it impounded safe<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Behind new barrier walls (and let it chafe!),<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">It breaks away in some new kind of slaughter.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">We choose to say it is let loose by the devil;<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">But power of blood itself releases blood.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">It goes by might of being such a flood<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Held high at so unnatural a level.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">It will have outlet, brave and not so brave.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Weapons of war and implements of peace<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Are but the points at which it finds release.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And now it is once more the tidal wave<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">That when it has swept by leaves summits stained.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Oh, blood will out. It cannot be contained.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">ACQUAINTED WITH THE NIGHT<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">1 have been one acquainted with the night.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I have "walked out in rain and back in rain.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I have outwalked the furthest city light.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I have looked down the saddest city lane.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I have passed by the watchman on his beat<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And dropped my eyes, unwilling to explain.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I have stood still and stopped the sound of feet<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">When far away an interrupted cry<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Came over houses from another sireet,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">But not to call me back or say good-bye;<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And further still at an unearthly height,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">One luminary clock against the sky<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Proclaimed the time was neither wrong nor right<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I have been one acquainted with the night.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">280<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">THE LOVELY SHALL BE CHOOSERS<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The Voice said, &lt;Hther&lt;JoM*i!'<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The Voices, c How far down?'<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">'Seven levels of the world/<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">'How much time have we?'<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">'Take twenty years.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">She would refuse love safe with wealth and honor!<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The lovely shall be choosers, shall they?<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Then let them choose!'<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">'Then we shall let her choose?'<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">'Yes, let her choose.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Take up the task beyond her choosing.'<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Invisible hands crowded on her shoulder<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">In readiness to weigh upon her.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">But she stood straight still,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">In broad round ear-rings, gold and jet with pearls<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And broad round suchlike brooch,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Her cheeks high colored,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Proud and the pride of friends.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The Voice asked, 'You can let her choose?*<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">281<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">'Yes, we can let her and still triumph/<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">'Do it by joys, and leave her always blameless.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Be her first joy her wedding,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">That though a wedding,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Is yet well something they know, he and she.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And after that her next joy<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">That though she grieves,, her grief is secret:<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Those friends know nothing of her grief to make it<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">shameful<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Her third joy that though now they cannot help but<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">know,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">They move in pleasure too far off<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">To think much or much care.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Give her a child at either knee for fourth joy<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">To tell once and once only, for them never to forget,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">How once she walked in brightness,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And make them see it in the winter firelight.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">But give her friends for then she dare not tell<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">For their foregone incredulousness<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And be her next joy this:<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Her never having deigned to tell them.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Make her among the humblest even<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Seem to them less than they are.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Hopeless of being known for what she has been,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Failing of being loved for what she is,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Give her the comfort for her sixth of knowing<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">She fails from strangeness to a way of life<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">She came to from too high too late to learn.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Then send some one with eyes to see<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">282<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">CANIS MAJOR<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Ihe great Overdog,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">That heavenly beast<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">With a star in one eye,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Gives a leap in the east.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">He dances upright<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">All the way to the west<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And never once drops<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">On his forefeet to rest.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I'm a poor underdog,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">But tonight I will bark<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">With the great Overdog<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">That romps through the dark.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">289<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">A SOLDIER<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Jrle is that fallen lance that lies as hurled,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">That lies unlifted now, come dew, come rust,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">But still lies pointed as it plowed the dust.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">If we who sight along it round the world,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">See nothing worthy to have been its mark,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">It is because like men we look too near,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Forgetting that as fitted to the sphere,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Our missiles always make too short an arc.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">They fall, they rip the grass, they intersect<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The curve of earth, and striking, break their own;<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">They make us cringe for metal-point on stone.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">But this we know, the obstacle that checked<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And tripped the body, shot the spirit on<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Further than target ever showed or shone.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">IMMIGRANTS<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">IN o ship of all that under sailor or steam<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Have gathered people to us more and more<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">But Pilgrim-manned the Mayflower in a dream<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Has been her anxious convey in to shore.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">291<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">HANNIBAL<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Was there ever a cause too lost,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Ever a cause that was lost too long,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Or that showed with the lapse of time too vain<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">For the generous tears of youth and song?<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">-92<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">THE FLOWER BOAT<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The fisherman's swapping a yarn for a yarn<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Under the hand of the village barber,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And here in the angle of house and barn<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">His deep-sea dory has found a harbor.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">At anchor she rides the sunny sod<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">As full to the gunnel of flowers growing<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">As ever she turned her home with cod<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">From George's bank when winds were blowing.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And I judge from that Elysian freight<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">That all they ask is rougher weather,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And dory and master will sail by fate<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">To seek for the Happy Isles together.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">THE TIMES TABLE<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">JVlore than half way up the pass<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Was a spring with a broken drinking glass,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And whether the farmer drank or not<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">His mare was sure to observe the spot<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">By cramping the wheel on a water-bar,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Turning her forehead with a star,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And straining her ribs for a monster sigh;<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">To which the farmer would make reply,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">1 A sigh for every so many breath,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And for every so many sigh a death.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">That's what I always tell my wife<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Is the multiplication table of life.'<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The saying may be ever so true;<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">But it's just the kind of a thing that you,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Nor I, nor nobody else may say,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Unless our purpose is doing harm,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And then I know of no better way<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">To close a road, abandon a farm,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Reduce the births of the human race,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And bring back nature in people's place.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">294<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">THE INVESTMENT ^<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Over back where they speak of life as staying<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">('You couldn't call it living, for it ain't'),<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">There was an old, old house renewed with paint,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And in it a piano loudly playing.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Out in the ploughed ground in the cold a digger,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Among unearthed potatoes standing still,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Was counting winter dinners, one a hill,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">With half an ear to the piano's vigor.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">All that piano and new paint back there,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Was it some money suddenly come into?<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Or some extravagance young love had been to?<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Or old love on an impulse not to care-<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Not to sink under being man and wife,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">But get some color and music out of life?<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">295<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">THE LAST MOWING<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">There's a place called Far-away Meadow<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">We never shall mow in again,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Or such is the talk at the farmhouse:<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The meadow is finished with men.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Then now is the chance for the flowers<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">That can't stand mowers and plowers.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">It must be now, though, in season<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Before the not mowing brings trees on,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Before trees, seeing the opening,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">March into a shadowy claim.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The trees are all I'm afraid of,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">That flowers can't bloom in the shade of;<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">It's no more men I'm afraid of;<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The meadow is done with the tame.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The place for the moment is ours<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">For you, oh tumultuous flowers,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">To go to waste and go wild in,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">All shapes and colors of flowers,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I needn't call you by name.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">296<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">THE BIRTHPLACE<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">ilere further up the mountain slope<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Than there was ever any hope,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">My father built, enclosed a spring,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Strung chains of Avail round everything,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Subdued the growth of earth to grass,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And brought our various lives to pass.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">A dozen girls and boys we were.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The mountain seemed to like the stir,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And made of us a little while<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">With always something in her smile.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Today she wouldn't know our name.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">(No girl's, of course, has stayed the same.)<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The mountain pushed us off her knees.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And now her lap is full of trees.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">297<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">DUST IN THE EYES<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">If, as they say, some dust thrown in my eyes<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Will keep my talk from getting overwise,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I'm not the one for putting off the proof.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Let it be overwhelming, off a roof<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And round a corner, blizzard snow for dust<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And blind me to a standstill if it must.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">298<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">SITTING BY A BUSH IN BROAD<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">SUNLIGHT<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">\A/hen I spread out my hand here today,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I catch no more than a ray<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">To feel of between thumb and fingers;<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">No lasting effect of it lingers.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">There was one time and only the one<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">When dust really took in the sun;<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And from that one intake of fire<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">All creatures still warmly suspire.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
