<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And if men have watched a long time<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And never seen sun-smitten slime<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Again come to life and crawl off,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">We must not be too ready to scoff.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">God once declared he was true<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And then took the veil and withdrew,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And remember how final a hush<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Then descended of old on the bush.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">God once spoke to people by name.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The sun once imparted its flame<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">One impulse persists as our breath;<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The other persists as our faith.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">299<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">WHAT FIFTY SAID<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">\Vhen I was young my teachers were the old.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I gave up fire for form till I was cold.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I suffered like a metal being cast.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I went to school to age to learn the past.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Now I am old my teachers are the young.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">What can't be moulded must be cracked and sprung,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I strain at lessons fit to start a suture.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I go to school to youth to learn the future.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">300<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">RIDERS<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The surest thing there is is we are riders,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And though none too successful at it, guiders,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Through everything presented, land and tide<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And now the very air, of what we ride.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">WTiat is this talked-of mystery of birth<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">But being mounted bareback on the earth?<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">We can just see the infant up astride,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">His small fist buried in the bushy hide.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">There is our wildest mount a headless horse.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">But though it runs unbridled off its course,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And all our blandishments would seem defied,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">We have ideas yet that we haven't tried.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">301<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">ON LOOKING UP BY CHANCE AT<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">THE CONSTELLATIONS<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">You'll wait a long, long time for anything much<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">To happen in heaven beyond the floats of cloud<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And the Northern Lights that run like tingling<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">nerves.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The sun and moon get crossed, but they never<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">touch,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Nor strike out fire from each other, nor crash oul<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">loud.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The planets seem to interfere in their curves,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">But nothing ever happens, no harm is done.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">We may as well go patiently on with our life,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And look elsewhere than to stars and moon and sun<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">For the shocks and changes we need to keep us sane.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">It is true the longest drouth will end in rain,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The longest peace in China will end in strife.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Still it wouldn't reward the watcher to stay awake<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">In hopes of seeing the calm of heaven break<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">On his particular time and personal sight.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">That calm seems certainly safe to last tonight.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">102<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">THE BEAR<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">1 he bear puts both arms around the tree above her<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And draws it down as if it were a lover<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And its choke cherries lips to kiss good-bye,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Then lets it snap back upright in the sky.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Her next step rocks a boulder on the wall<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">(She's making her cross-country in the fall).<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Her great weight creaks the barbed- wire in its staples<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">As she flings over and off down through the maples,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Leaving on one wire tooth a lock of hair.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Such is the uncaged progress of the bear.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The world has room to make a bear feel free;<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The universe seems cramped to you and me.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Man acts more like the poor bear in a cage<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">That all day fights a nervous inward rage,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">His mood rejecting all his mind suggests.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">He paces back and forth and never rests<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The toe-nail click and shuffle of his feet,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The telescope at one end of his beat,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And at the other end the microscope,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Two instruments of nearly equal hope,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And in conjunction giving quite a spread.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Or if he rests from scientific tread,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">'Tis only to sit back and sway his head<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Through ninety odd degrees of arc, it seems,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Between two metaphysical extremes.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">He sits back on his fundamental butt<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">With lifted snout and eyes (if any) shut,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">303<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">(He almost looks religious but he's not),<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And back and forth he sways from cheek to cheek,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">At one extreme agreeing with one Greek,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">At the other agreeing with another Greek<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Which may be thought, but only so to speak.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">A baggy figure, equally pathetic<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">When sedentary and when peripatetic.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">304<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">THE EGG AND THE MACHINE<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">JTle gave the solid rail a hateful kick.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">From far away there came an answering tick<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And then another tick. He knew the code:<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">His hate had roused an engine up the road.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">He wished when he had had the track alone<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">He had attacked it with a club or stone<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And bent some rail wide open like a switch<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">So as to wreck the engine in the ditch.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Too late though, now, he had himself to thank.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Its click was rising to a nearer clank.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Here it came breasting like a horse in skirts.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">(He stood well back for fear of scalding squirts.)<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Then for a moment all there was was size<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Confusion and a roar that drowned the cries<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">He raised against the gods in the machine.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Then once again the sandbank lay serene.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The traveler's eye picked up a turtle trail,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Between the dotted feet a streak of tail,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And followed it to where he made out vague<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">But certain signs of buried turtle's egg;<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And probing with one finger not too rough,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">He found suspicious sand, and sure enough,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The pocket of a little turtle mine.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">If there was one egg in it there were nine,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Torpedo-like, with shell of gritty leather<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">All packed in sand to wait the trump together.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">'You'd better not disturb me any more,'<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">305<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">He told the distance, *I am armed for war.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The next machine that has the power to pass<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Will get this plasm in its goggle glass.'<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">A Further Range<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">A LONE STRIKER<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">1 he swinging mill bell changed its rate<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">To tolling like the count of fate,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And though at that the tardy ran,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">One failed to make the closing gate.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">There was a law of God or man<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">That on the one who came too late<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The gate for half an hour be locked.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">His time be lost, his pittance docked.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">He stood rebuked and unemployed.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The straining mill began to shake.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The mill, though many, many eyed,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Had eyes inscrutably opaque;<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">So that he couldn't look inside<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">To see if some forlorn machine<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Was standing idle for his sake.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">(He couldn't hope its heart would break.)<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And yet he thought he saw the scene:<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The air was full of dust of wool.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">A thousand yarns were under pull,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">But pull so slow, with such a twist,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">All day from spool to lesser spool,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">It seldom overtaxed their strength;<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">They safely grew in slender length.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And if one broke by any chance,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The spinner saw it at a glance.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The spinner still was there to spin.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">300<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">That's where the human still came in.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Her deft hand showed with finger rings<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Among the harp-like spread of strings.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">She caught the pieces end to end<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And, with a touch that never missed,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Not so much tied as made them blend.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Man's ingenuity was good.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">He saw it plainly where he stood,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Yet found it easy to resist.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">He knew another place, a wood,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And in it, tall as trees, were cliffs;<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And if he stood on one of these,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">'Twould be among the tops of trees,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Their upper branches round him wreathing<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Their breathing mingled with his breathing,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Ifif he stood! Enough of ifs!<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">He knew a path that wanted walking;<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">He knew a spring that wanted drinking;<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">A thought that wanted further thinking;<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">A love that wanted re-renewing.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Nor was this just a way of talking<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">To save him the expense of doing.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">With him it boded action, deed.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The factory was very fine;<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">He wished it all the modern speed.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Yet, after all, 'twas not divine,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">That is to say, 'twas not a church.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">He never would assume that he'd<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">310<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">r5e any institution's need.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">But he said then arid still would say<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">If there should ever come a day<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">\Vhen industry seemed like to die<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Because he left it in the lurch,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Or even merely seemed to pine<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">For want of his appro val, why<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Come get him they knew where to search.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">TWO TRAMPS IN MUD TIME<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Out of the mud two strangers came<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And caught me splitting wood in the yard.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And one of them put me off my aim<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">By hailing cheerily 'Hit them hard!'<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I knew pretty well why he dropped behind<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And let the other go on a way.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I knew pretty well what he had in mind:<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">He wanted to take my job for pay.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Good blocks of beech it was I split,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">As large around as the chopping block;<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And every piece I squarely hit<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Fell splinterless as a cloven rock.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The blows that a life of self-control<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Spares to strike for the common good<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">That day, giving a loose to my soul,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I spent on the unimportant wood.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The sun was warm but the wind was chill.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">You know how it is with an April day<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">When the sun is out and the wind is still,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">You're one month on in the middle of May.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">But if you so much as dare to speak,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">A cloud comes over the sunlit arch,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">A wind comes off a frozen peak,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And you're two months back in the middle of<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">March.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">312<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">A DRUMLIN WOODCHUCK<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">(Jne thing has a shelving bank,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Another a rotting plank,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">To give it cozier skies<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And make up for its lack of size.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">My own strategic retreat<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Is where two rocks almost meet,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And still more secure and snug,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">A two-door burrow I dug.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">With those in mind at my back<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I can sit forth exposed to attack<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">As one who shrewdly pretends<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">That he and the world are friends.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">All we who prefer to live<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Have a little whistle we give,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And flash, at the least alarm<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">We dive down under the farm.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">We allow some time for guile<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And don't come out for a while<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Either to eat or drink.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">We take occasion to think.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And if after the hunt goes past<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And the double-barrelled blast<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">321<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">But not long since in the lumber camps).<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">They thought all chopping was theirs of right.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Men of the woods and lumber jacks,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">They judged me by their appropriate tool.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Except as a fellow handled an ax,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">They had no way of knowing a fool.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Nothing on either side was said.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">They knew they had but to stay their stay<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And all their logic would fill my head:<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">As that I had no right to play<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">With what was another man's work for gain.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">My right might be love but theirs was need.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And where the two exist in twain<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Theirs was the better right agreed.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">But yield who will to their separation,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">My object in living is to unite<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">My avocation and my vocation<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">As my two eyes make one in sight.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Only where love and need are one,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And the work is play for mortal stakes,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Is the deed ever really done<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">For Heaven and the future's sakes.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">THE WHITE-TAILED HORNET<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The white-tailed hornet lives in a balloon<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">That floats against the ceiling of the woodshed.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The exit he comes out at like a bullet<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Is like the pupil of a pointed gun.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And having power to change his aim in flight,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">He comes out more unerring than a bullet.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Verse could be written on the certainty<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">With which he penetrates my best defense<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Of whirling hands and arms about the head<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">To stab me in the sneeze-nerve of a nostril.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Such is the instinct of it I allow.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Yet how about the insect certainty<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">That in the neighborhood of home and children<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">!s such an execrable judge of motives<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">As not to recognize in me the exception<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I like to think I am in everything<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">One who would never hang above a bookcase<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">His Japanese crepe-paper globe for trophy?<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">He stung me first and stung me afterward.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">He rolled me off the field head over heels,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And would not listen to my explanations.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">That's when I went as visitor to his house.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">As visitor at my house he is better.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Hawking for flies about the kitchen door,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">In at one door perhaps and out another,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Trust him then not to put you in the wrong.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">315<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">He won't misunderstand your freest movements.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Let him light on your skin unless you mind<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">So many prickly grappling feet at once.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">He's after the domesticated fly<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">To feed his thumping grubs as big as he is.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Here he is at his best, but even here-<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I watched him where he swooped, he pounced, he<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">struck;<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">But what he found he had was just a nailhead.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">He struck a second time. Another nailhead.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">'Those are just nailheads. Those are fastened down/<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Then disconcerted and not unannoyed,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">He stooped and struck a little huckleberry<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The way a player curls around a football.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">'Wrong shape, wrong color, and wrong scent/ 1 said.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The huckleberry rolled him on his head.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">At last it was a fly. He shot and missed;<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And the fly circled round him in derision.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">But for the fly he might have made me think<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">He had been at his poetry, comparing<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Nailhead with fly and fly with huckleberry:<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">How like a fly, how very like a fly.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">But the real fly he missed would never do;<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The missed fly made me dangerously skeptic.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Won't this whole instinct matter bear revision?<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Won't almost any theory bear revision?<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">To err is human, not to, animal.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Or so we pay the compliment to instinct,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Only too liberal of our compliment<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">316<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">That really takes away instead of gives.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Our worship, humor, conscientiousness<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Went long since to the dogs under the table.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And served us right for having instituted<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Downward comparisons. As long on earth<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">As our comparisons were stoutly upward<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">With gods and angels, we were men at least,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">But little lower than the gods and angels.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">But once comparisons were yielded downward,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Once we began to see our images<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Reflected in the mud and even dust,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">'Twas disillusion upon disillusion.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">We were lost piecemeal to the animals,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Like people thrown out to delay the wolves.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Nothing but fallibility was left us,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And this day ' s work made even that seem doubtful.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">31?<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">k BLUE RIBBON AT AMESBURY<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Ouch a fine pullet ought to go<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">All coiffured to a winter show,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And be exhibited, and win.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The answer is this one has been<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And come with all her honors home.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Her golden leg, her coral comb,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Her fluff of plumage, white as chalk,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Her style, were all the fancy's talk.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">It seems as if you must have heard.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">She scored an almost perfect bird.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">In her we make ourselves acquainted.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">With one a Sewell might have painted.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Here common with the flock again,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">At home in her abiding pen,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">She lingers feeding at the trough,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The last to let night drive her off.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The one who gave her ankle-band,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Her keeper, empty pail in hand,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">He lingers too, averse to slight<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">His chores for all the wintry night.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">He leans against the dusty wall,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Immured almost beyond recall,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">318<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">A depth past many swinging doors<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And many litter-muffled floors.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">He meditates the breeder's art.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">He has a half a mind to start,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">With her for Mother Eve, a race<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">That shall all living things displace.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">'Tis ritual with her to lay<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The full six days, then rest a day;<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">At which rate barring broodiness<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">She well may score an egg-success.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The gatherer can always tell<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Her well-turned egg's brown sturdy shell,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">As safe a vehicle of seed<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">As is vouchsafed to feathered breed,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">No human spectre at the feast<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Can scant or hurry her the least.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">She takes her time to take her fill.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">She whets a sleepy sated bill.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">She gropes across the pen alone<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">To peck herself a precious stone.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">She waters at the patient fount.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And so to roost, the last to mount.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The roost is her extent of flight.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Yet once she rises to the height,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">319<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">She shoulders with a wing so strong<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">She makes the whole flock move along.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The night is setting in to blow.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">It scours the windowpane with snow,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">But barely gets from them or her<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">For comment a complacent chirr.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The lowly pen is yet a hold<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Against the dark and wind and cold<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">To give a prospect to a plan<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And warrant prudence in a man.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">320<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">A DRUMLIN WOODCHUCK<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">vjne thing has a shelving bank,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Another a rotting plank,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">To give it cozier skies<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And make up for its lack of size.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">My own strategic retreat<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Is where two rocks almost meet,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And still more secure and snug,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">A two-cloor burrow I dug.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">With those in mind at my back<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I can sit forth exposed to attack<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">As one who shrewdly pretends<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">That he and the world are friends.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">All we who prefer to live<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Have a little whistle we give,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And flash, at the least alarm<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">We dive down under the farm.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">We allow some time for guile<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And don't come out for a while<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Either to eat or drink.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">We take occasion to think.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And if after the hunt goes past<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And the double-barrelled blast<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">321<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">(Like war and pestilence<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And the loss of common sense),<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">If I can with confidence say<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">That still for another day,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Or even another year,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I will be there for you, my dear,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">It will be because, though small<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">As measured again the All,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I have been so instinctively thorough<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">About my crevice and burrow.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">322<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">THE GOLD HESPERIDEE<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Oquare Matthew Male's young grafted appletree<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Began to blossom at the age of five;<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And after having entertained the bee,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And cast its flowers and all the stems but three,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">It set itself to keep those three alive;<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And downy wax the three began to thrive.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">They had just given themselves a little twist<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And turned from looking up and being kissed<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">To looking down and yet not being sad,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">When came Square Hale with Let's see what we had;<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And two was all he counted (one he missed);<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">But two for a beginning wasn't bad.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">His little Matthew, also five years old,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Was led into the presence of the tree<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And raised among the leaves and duly told,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">We mustn't touch them yet, but see and see!<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And what was green would by and by be gold.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Their name was called the Gold Hesperidee.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">As regularly as he went to feed the pig<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Or milk the cow, he visited the fruit,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The dew of night and morning on his boot.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Dearer to him than any barnyard brute,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Each swung in danger on its slender twig,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">A bubble on a pipe-stem growing big.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">323<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Long since they swung as three instead of two<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">One more, he thought, to take him safely through.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Three made it certain nothing Fate could do<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">With codlin moth or rusty parasite<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Would keep him now from proving with a bite<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">That the name Gold Hesperidee was right.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And so he brought them to the verge of frost.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">But one day when the foliage all went swish<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">With autumn and the fruit was rudely tossed,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">He thought no special goodness could be lost<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">If he fulfilled at last his summer wish,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And saw them picked unbruised and in a dish,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Where they could ripen safely to the eating.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">But when he came to look, no apples there<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Under, or on the tree, or anywhere,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And the light-natured tree seemed not to care!<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">'Twas Sunday and Square Hale was dressed for<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">meeting,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The final summons into church was beating.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Just as he was without an uttered sound<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">At those who'd done him such a wrong as that,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Square Matthew Hale took off his Sunday hat<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And ceremoniously laid it on the ground,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And leaping on it with a solemn bound,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Danced slowly on it till he trod it flat.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">324<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Then suddenly he saw the thing he did.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And looked around to see if he was seen.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">This was the sin that Ahaz was forbid<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">(The meaning of the passage had been hid):<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">To look upon the tree -when it was green<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And worship apples.What else could it mean?<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">God saw him dancing in the orchard path,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">But mercifully kept the passing crowd<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">From witnessing the fault of one so proud.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And so the story wasn't told in Gath;<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">In gratitude for which Square Matthew vowed<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">To walk a graver man restrained &lt;n wrath.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">325<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">IN TIME OF CLOUDBURST<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Let the downpour roil and toil!<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The worst it can do to me<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Is carry some garden soil<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">A little nearer the sea.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">J Tis the world-old way of the rain<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">When it comes to a mountain farm<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">To exact for a present gain<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">A little of future harm.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And the harm is none too sure,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">For when all that was rotted rich<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Shall be in the end scoured poor,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">When my garden has gene down ditch,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Some force has but to apply,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And summits shall be immersed,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The bottom of seas raised dry<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The slope of the earth reversed.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Then all I need do is run<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">To the other end of the slope,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And on tracts laid new to the sun,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Begin all over to hope.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Some worn old tool of my own<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Will be turned up by the plow,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">326<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The wood of it changed to stone,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">But as ready to wield as now.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
