<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">May my application so close<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">To so endless a repetition<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Not make me tired and morose<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And resentful of man's condition.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">327<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">A ROADSIDE STAND<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">1 he little old house was out with a little new shed<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">In front at the edge of the road where the traffic sped,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">A roadside stand that too pathetically plead,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">It would not be fair to say for a dole of bread,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">But for some of the money, the cash, whose flow<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">supports<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The flower of cities from sinking and withering faint.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The polished traffic passed with a mind ahead,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Or if ever aside a moment, then out of sorts<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">At having the landscape marred with the artless paint<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Of signs that with N turned wrong and S turned<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">wrong<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Offered for sale wild berries in wooden quarts,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Or crook-necked golden squash with silver warts,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Or beauty rest in a beautiful mountain scene.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">You have the money, but if you want to be mean,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Why keep your money (this crossly), and go along.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The hurt to the scenery wouldn't be my complaint<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">So much as the trusting sorrow of what is unsaid:<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Here far from the city we make our roadside stand<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And ask for some city money to feel in hand<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">To try if it will not make our being expand,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And give us the life of the moving pictures' promise<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">That the party in power is said to be keeping from us.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">It is in the news that all these pitiful kin<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Are to be bought out and mercifully gathered in<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">To live in villages next to the theatre and store<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">328<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">At the shiny desert with spots of gloom<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">That might be people and are but cedar,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Have no purpose, have no leader,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Have never made the first move to assemble,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And so are nothing to make her tremble.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">She can think of places that are not thus<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Without indulging a 'Not for us! 7<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Life is not so sinister-grave.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Matter of fact has made them brave.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">He is husband, she is wife.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">She fears not him, they fear not life.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">They know where another light has been<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And more than one to theirs akin,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">But earlier out for bed tonight,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">So lost on me in my surface flight.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">This I saw when waking late,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Going by at a railroad rate,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Looking through wreaths of engine smoke<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Far into the lives of other folk.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">333<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">THE FIGURE IN THE DOORWAY<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">1 he grade surmounted, we were riding high<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Through level mountains nothing to the eye<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">But scrub oak, scrub oak and the lack of earth<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">That kept the oaks from getting any girth.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">But as through the monotony we ran,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">We came to where there was a living man.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">His great gaunt figure filled his cabin door,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And had he fallen inward on the floor,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">He must have measured to the further wall.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">But we who passed were not to see him fall.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The miles and miles he lived from anywhere<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Were evidently something he could bear.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">He stood unshaken, and if grim and gaunt,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">It was not necessarily from want.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">He had the oaks for heating and for light.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">He had a hen, he had a pig in sight.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">He had a well, he had the rain to catch.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">He had a ten by twenty garden patch.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Nor did he lack for common entertainment.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">That I assume was what our passing train meant.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">He could look at us in our diner eating,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And if so moved uncurl a hand in greeting.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">334<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">AT WOODWARD'S GARDENS<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">A boy, presuming on his intellect,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Once showed two little monkeys in a cage<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">A burning-glass they could not understand<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And never could be made to understand.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Words are no good: to say it was a lens<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">For gathering solar rays would not have helped.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">But let him show them how the weapon worked.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">He made the sun a pin-point on the nose<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Of first one then the other till it brought<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">A look of puzzled dimness to their eyes<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">That blinking could not seem to blink away.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">They stood arms laced together at the bars,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And exchanged troubled glances over life.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">One put a thoughtful hand up to his nose<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">As if remindedor as if perhaps<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Within a million years of an idea.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">He got his purple little knuckles stung.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The already known had once more been confirmed<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">By psychological experiment,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And that were all the finding to announce<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Had the boy not presumed too close and long.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">There was a sudden flash of arm, a snatch<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And the glass was the monkeys' not the boy's.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Precipitately they retired back cage<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And instituted an investigation<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">On their part, though without the needed insight.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">They bit the glass and listened for the flavor.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">335<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">J 'hsy broke the handle and the binding off it.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">T ben none the wiser, frankly gave it up,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And having hid it in their bedding straw<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Against the day of prisoners' ennui,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Came dryly forward to the bars again<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">To answer for themselves: Who said it mattered<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">W rut monkeys did or didn't understand?<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">They might not understand a burning-glass.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">They might not understand the sun itself.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">\t's knowing what to do with things that counts.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">336<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">A RECORD STRIDE<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">In a Vermont bedroom closet<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">With a door of two broad boards<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And for back wall a crumbling old chimney<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">(And that's what their toes are to wards ),<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I have a pair of shoes standing,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Old rivals of sagging leather,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Who once kept surpassing each other,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">But now live even together.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">They listen for me in the bedroom<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">To ask me a thing or two<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">About who is too old to go walking,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">With too much stress on the who.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I wet one last year at Moiitauk<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">For a hat I had to save.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The other I wet at the Cliff House<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">In an cxtra-vagant wave.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Two entirely different grandchildren<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Got me into my double adventure.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">But when they grow up and can read this<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I hope they won't take it for censure.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I touch my tongue to the shoes now<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And unless my sense is at fault,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">337<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">On one I can taste Atlantic,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">On the other Pacific, salt.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">One foot in each great ocean<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Is a record stride or stretch.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The authentic shoes it was made in<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I should sell for what they would fetch.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">But instead I proudly devote them<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">To my museum and muse;<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">So the thick-skins needn't act thin-skinned<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">About being past-active shoes.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And I ask all to try to forgive me<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">For being as over-elated<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">As if I had measured the country<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And got the United States stated.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">338<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">LOST IN HEAVEN<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The clouds, the source of rain, one stormy night<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Offered an opening to the source of dew;<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Which I accepted with impatient sight,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Looking for my old skymarks in the blue.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">But stars were scarce in that part of the sky,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And no two were of the same constellation<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">No one was bright enough to identify;<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">So 'twas with not ungrateful consternation,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Seeing myself well lost once more, I sighed,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">1 Where, where in Heaven am I? But don't tell me!*<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I warned the clouds, 'by opening on me wide.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Let's let my heavenly lostness overwhelm me/<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">339<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">DESERT PLACES<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Onow falling and night falling fast oh fast<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">In a field I looked into going past,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And the ground almost covered smooth in snow,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">But a few weeds and stubble showing last.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The woods around it have it it is theirs.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">All animals are smothered in their lairs.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I am too absent-spirited to count;<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The loneliness includes me unawares.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And lonely as it is that loneliness<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Will be more lonely ere it will be less<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">A blanker whiteness of benighted snow<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">With no expression, nothing to express.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">They cannot scare me with their empty spaces<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Between stars on stars where no human race is.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I have it in me so much nearer home<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">To scare myself with my own desert places.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">340<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">LEAVES COMPARED WITH FLOWERS<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">A tree's leaves may be ever so good,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">So may its bark, so may its wood;<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">But unless you put the right tiling to its root<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">It never will show much flower or fruit.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">But I may be one who does not care<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Ever to have tree bloom or bear.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Leaves for smooth and bark for rough,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Leaves and bark may be tree enough.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Some giant trees have bloom so small<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">They might as well have none at all.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Late in life I have come on fern.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Now lichens are due to have their turn.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I bade men tell me which in brief,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Which is fairer, flower or leaf.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">They did not have the wit to say,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Leaves by night and flowers by day.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Leaves and bark, leaves and bark,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">To lean against and hear in the dark.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Petals I may have once pursued.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Leaves are all my darker mood.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">341<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">A LEAF TREADER<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">1 have been treading ^n leaves all day until I am<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">autumn-tired.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">God knows all the color and form of leaves I have<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">trodden on and mired.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Perhaps I have put forth too much strength and<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">been too fierce from fear.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I have safely trodden underfoot the leaves of another<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">year.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">All summer long they were over head, more lifted<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">up than I.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">To come to their final place in earth they had to<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">pass me by.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">All summer long I thought I heard them threatening<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">under their breath.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And when they came it seemed with a will to carry<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">me with them to death.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">They spoke to the fugitive in my heart as if it were<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">leaf to leaf.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">They tapped at my eyelids and touched my lips<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">with an invitation to grief.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">But it was no reason I had to go because they had<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">to go.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Now up my knee to keep on top of another year of<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">snow.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">342<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">THEY WERE WELCOME TO THEIR<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">BELIEF<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">\JTrief may have thought it was grief.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Care may have thought it was care.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">They were welcome to their belief,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The over important pair.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">No, it took all the snows that clung<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">To the low roof over his bed,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Beginning when he was young,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">To induce the one snow on his head.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">But whenever the roof came white<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The head in the dark below<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Was a shade less the color of night<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">A shade more the color of snow.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Grief may have thought it was grief.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Care may have thought it was care.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">But neither one was the thief<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Of his raven color of hair.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">343<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">THE STRONG ARE SAYING<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">NOTHING<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">ihe soil now gets a rumpling soft and damp,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And small regard to the future of any weed.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The final flat of the hoe's approval stamp<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Is reserved for the bed of a few selected seed.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">There is seldom more than a man to a harrowed<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">piece.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Men work olone, their lots plowed far apart,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">One stringing a chain of seed in an open crease,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And another stumbling after a halting cart.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">To the fresh and black of the squares of early mould<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The leafless bloom of a plum is fresh and white;<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Though there's more than a doubt if the weather is<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">not too cold<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">For the bees to come and serve its beauty aright.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Wind goes from farm to farm in wave on wave,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">But carries no cry of what is hoped to be.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">There may be little or much beyond the grave,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Hut the strong are saying nothing until they see.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">344<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">THE MASTER SPEED<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">IN o speed of wind or water rushing by<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">But you have speed far greater. You can climb<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Back up a stream of radiance to the sky,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And back through history up the stream of time.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And you were given this swiftness, not for haste,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Nor chiefly that you may go where you will,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">But in the rush of everything to waste,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">That you may have the power of standing still<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Off any still or moving thing you say.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Two such as you with such a master speed<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Cannot be parted nor be swept away<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">From one another once you are agreed<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">That life is only life forevermore<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Together wing to wing and oar to oar.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">345<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">MOON COMPASSES<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I stole forth dimly in the dripping pause<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Between two downpours to see what there was.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And a masked moon had spread down compass rays<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">To a cone mountain in the midnight haze,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">As if the final estimate were hers,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And as it measured in her calipers,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The mountain stood exalted in its place.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">So love will take between the hands a face . . .<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">346<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">NEITHER OUT FAR NOR IN DEEP<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The people along the sand<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">All turn and look one way.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">They turn their back on the land.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">They look at the sea all day.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">As long as it takes to pass<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">A ship keeps raising its hull;<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The wetter ground like glass<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Reflects a standing gull.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The land may vary more;<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">But wherever the truth may be<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The water conies ashore,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And the people look at the sea.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">They cannot look out far.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">They cannot look in deep.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">But when was that ever a bar<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">To any watch they keep?<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">347<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">VOICE WAYS<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">borne things are never clear.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">But the weather is clear tonight,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Thanks to a clearing rain.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The mountains are brought up near,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The stars are brought out bright.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Your old sweet-cynical strain<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Would come in like you here:<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">'So we won't say nothing is clear.*<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">348<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">DESIGN<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">1 found a dimpled spider, fat and white,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">On a white heal-all, holding up a moth<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Like a white piece of rigid satin cloth-<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Assorted characters of death and blight<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Mixed ready to begin the morning right,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Like the ingredients of a witches' broth<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">A snow-drop spider, a flower like froth,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And dead wings carried like a paper kite.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">What had that flower to do with being white,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The wayside blue and innocent heal-all?<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">What brought the kindred spider to that height,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Then steered the white moth thither in the night?<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">What but design of darkness to appall?<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">If design govern in a thing so small.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">349<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">ON A BIRD SINGING IN ITS SLEEP<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">A bird half wakened in the lunar noon<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Sang half way through its little inborn tune.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Partly because it sang but once all night<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And that from no especial bush's height;<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Partly because it sang ventriloquist<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And had the inspiration to desist<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Almost before the prick of hostile ears,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">It ventured less in peril than appears.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">It could not have come down 1 o us so far<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Through the interstices of things ajar<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">On the long bead chain of repeated birth<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">To be a bird while we are men on earth<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">If singing out of sleep and dream that way<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Had made it much more easily a prey.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">350<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">UNHARVESTED<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">A scent of ripeness from over a wall.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And come to leave the routine road<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And look for what had made me stall,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">There sure enough was an appletrec<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">That had eased itself of its summer load.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And of all but its trivial foliage free,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Now breathed as light as a lady's fan.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">For there there had been an apple fall<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">As complete as the apple had given man.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The ground was one circle of solid red.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">May something go always unharvested!<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">May much stay out of our stated plan,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Apples or something forgotten and left,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">So smelling their sweetness would be no theft.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">351<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">THERE ARE ROUGHLY ZONES<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">We sit indoors and talk of the cold outside.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And every gust that gathers strength and heaves<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Is a threat to the house. But the house has long been<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">tried.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">We think of the tree. If it never again has leaves,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">We'll know, we say, that this was the night it died.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">It is very far north, we admit, to have brought the<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">peach.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">What comes over a man, is it soul or mind<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">That to no limits and bounds he can stay confined?<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">You would say his ambition was to extend the reach<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Clear to the Arctic of every living kind.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Why is his nature forever so hard to teach<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">That though there is no fixed line between wrong<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">and right,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">There are roughly zones whose laws must be obeyed.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">There is nothing much we can do for the tree tonight.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">But we can't help feeling more than a little betrayed<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">That the northwest wind should rise to such a height<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">o<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">fust when the cold went down so many below.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The tree has no leaves and may never have them again.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">We must wait till some months hence in the spring<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">to know.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">But if it is destined never again to grow,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">It can blame this limitless trait in the hearts of men.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">352<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">A TRIAL RUN<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I said to myself almost in prayer,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">It will start hair raising currents of air<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">\Vhen you give it the livid metal-sap.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">It will make a homicidal roar.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">It will shake its cast stone reef of floor.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">It will gather speed till your nerves prepare<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">To hear it wreck in a thunder-clap.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">But stand your ground<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">As they say in war.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">It is cotter-pinned, it is bedded true.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Everything its parts can do<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Has been thought out and accounted for.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Your least touch sets it going round,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And when to stop it rests with you.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">353<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">NOT QUITE SOCIAL<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Oome of you will be glad I did what I did,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And the rest won't want to punish me too severely<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">For finding a thing to do that though not forbid<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Yet wasn't enjoined and wasn't expected clearly.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">To punish me over cruelly wouldn't be right<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">For merely giving you once more gentle proof<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">That the city's hold on a man is no more tight<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Than when its walls rose higher than any roof.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">You may taunt me with not being able to flee the<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">earth.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">You have me there, but loosely as I would be held.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The way of understanding is partly mirth.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I would not be taken as ever having rebelled.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And anyone is free to condemn me to death<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">If he leaves it to nature to carry out the sentence.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I shall will to the common stock of air my breath<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And pay a death-tax of fairly polite repentance.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">354<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">PROVIDE PROVIDE<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The witch that came (the withered hag)<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">To wash the steps with pail and rag,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Was once the beauty Abishag,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The picture pride of Hollywood.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Too many fall from great and good<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">For you to doubt the likelihood.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Die early and avoid the fate.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Or if predestined to die late,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Make up your mirid to die in state-<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Make the whole stock exchange your own!<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">If need be occupy a throne,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Where nobody can call you crone.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Some have relied on what they knew;<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Others on being simply true.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">What worked for them might work for you.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">No memory of having starred<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Atones for later disregard,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Or keeps the end from being hard.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Better to go down dignified<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">With boughten friendship at your side<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Than none at all. Provide, provide!<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">355<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">TEN MILLS<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">PRECAUTION<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I never dared be radical when young<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">For fear it would make me conservative when old.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">THE SPAN OF LIFE<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The old dog barks backward without getting up.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I can remember when he was a pup.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">THE WRIGHTS' BIPLANE<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">This biplane is the shape of hi] man flight.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Its name might better be First Motor Kite.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Its makers' name Time cannot get that wrong.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">For it was writ in heaven doubly Wright.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">ASSERTIVE<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Let me be the one<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">To do what is done.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">EVIL TENDENCIES CANCEL<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Will the blight end the chestnut?<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The farmers rather guess not.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">It keeps smouldering at the roots<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And sending up new shoots<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Till another parasite<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Shall come to end the blight.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">356<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">PERTINAX<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Let chaos storm!<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Let cloud shapes swarm!<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I wait for form.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">WASPISH<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">On glossy wires artistically bent,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">He draws himself up to his full extent.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">His natty wings with self-assurance perk.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">His stinging quarters menacingly work.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Poor egotist, he has no way of knowing<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">But he's as good as anybody going.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">ONE GUESS<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">He has dust in his eyes and a fan for a wing,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">A leg akimbo with which he can sing,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And a mouthful of dye stuff instead of a sting.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">THE HARDSHIP OF ACCOUNTING<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Never ask of money spent<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Wliere the spender thinks it went.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Nobody was ever meant<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">To remember or invent<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">What he did with every cent.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">NOT ALL THERE<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I turned to speak to God<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">About the world's despair;<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">But to make bad matters worse<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">357<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I found God wasn't there.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">God turned to speak to me<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">(Don't anybody laugh)<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
