<p class="p1"><span class="s1">God found I wasn't there<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">At least not over half.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">IN DIVES &gt; DIVE<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">It is late at night and still I am losing,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">But still I am steady and unaccusing.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">As long as the Declaration guards<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">My right to be equal in number of cards,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">It is nothing to me who runs the Dive.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Let's have a look at another five.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">358<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">THE VINDICTIVES<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">You like to hear about gold.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">A king filled his prison room<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">As full as the room could hold<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">To the top of his reach on the wall<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">With every known shape of the stuff.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">'Twas to buy himself off his doom.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">But it wasn't ransom enough.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">His captors accepted it all,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">But didn't let go of the king.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">They made him send out a call<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">To his subjects to gather them more.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And his subjects wrung all they could wring<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Out of temple and palace and store.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">But when there seemed no more to bring,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">His captors convicted the king<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Of once having started a war,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And strangled the wretch with a string.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">But really that gold was not half<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">That a king might have hoped to compel-<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Not a half, not a third, not a tithe.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The king had scarce ceased to writhe,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">When hate gave a terrible laugh,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Like a manhole opened to Hell.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">If gold pleased the conqueror, well,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">That gold should be the one thing<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The conqueror henceforth should lack.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">359<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">They gave no more thought to the king.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">All joined in the game of hide-gold.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">They swore all the gold should go back<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Deep into the earth whence it came.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Their minds ran on cranny and crack.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">All joined in the maddening game.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The tale is still boastingly told<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Of many a treasure by name "<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">That vanished into the black<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And put out its light for the foe.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">That self-sack and self-overthrow<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">That was the splendidest sack<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Since the forest Germans sacked Rome<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And took the gold candlesticks home.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">One Inca prince on the rack,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">\nd late in his last hour alive,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Told them in what lake to dive<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">To seek what they seemed so to want.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">They dived and nothing was found.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">He told them to dive till they drowned.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The whole fierce conquering pack<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Hunted and tortured and raged.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">There were suns of story and vaunt<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">They searched for into Brazil<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Their tongues hanging out unassuaged.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">360<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">But the conquered grew meek and still.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">They slowly and silently aged.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">They kept their secrets and died,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Maliciously satisfied.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">One knew of a burial hole<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">In the floor of a tribal cave,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Where under deep ash and charcoal<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And cracked bones, human and beast,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The midden of feast upon feast,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Was coiled in its last resting grave<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The great treasure wanted the most,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The great thousand-linked gold chain,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Each link of a hundred weight,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">That once between post and post<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">(In-leaning under the strain),<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And looped ten times back and forth,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Had served as a palace gate.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Some said it had gone to the coast,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Some over the mountains east,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Some into the country north,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">On the backs of a single-file host,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Commanded by one sun-priest,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And raising a dust with a train<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Of flashing links in the sun.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">No matter what some may say.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">(The saying is never done.)<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">There bright in the filth it lay<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Untarnished by rust and decay.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And be all plunderers curst.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">361<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">'The best way to hate is the worst.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">'Tis to find what the hated need,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Never mind of what actual worth,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And wipe that out of the earth.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Let them die of unsatisfied greed,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Of unsatisfied love of display,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Of unsatisfied love of the high,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Unvulgar, unsoiled, and ideal.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Let their trappings be taken away.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Let them suffer starvation and die<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Of being brought down to the real/<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">362<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">THE BEARER OF EVIL TIDINGS<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">1 he bearer of evil tidings,,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Wlien he was halfway there,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Remembered that evil tidings<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Were a dangerous thing to bear.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">3o when he came to the parting<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Where one road led to the throne<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And one went off to the mountains<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And into the wild unknown,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">He took the one to the mountains.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">He ran through the Vale of Cashmere,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">He ran through the rhododendrons<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Till he came to the land of Pamir.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And there in a precipice valley<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">A girl of his age he met<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Took him home to her bower,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Or he might be running yet.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">She taught him her tribe's religion:<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">How ages and ages since<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">A princess en route from China<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">To marry a Persian prince<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Had been found with child; and her army<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Had come to a troubled halt.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">363<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And though a god was the father<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And nobody else at fault,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">It had seemed discreet to remain there<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And neither go on nor back.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">So they stayed and declared a village<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">There in the land of the Yak.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And the child that came of the princess<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Established a royal line,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And his mandates were given heed to<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Because he was born divine.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And that was why there were people<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">On one Himalayan shelf;<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And the bearer of evil tidings<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Decided to stay there himself.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">At least he had this in common<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">With the race he chose to adopt:<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">They had both of them had their reasons<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">For stopping where they had stopped.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">As for his evil tidings,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Belshazzar's overthrow,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Why hurry to tell Belshazzar<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">What soon enough he would know?<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">364<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">IRIS BY NIGHT<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">One misty evening, one another's guide,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">We two were groping down a Malvern side<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The last wet fields and dripping hedges home.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">There came a moment of confusing lights,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Such as according to belief in Rome<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Were seen of old at Memphis on the heights<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Before the fragments of a former sun<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Could concentrate anew and rise as one.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Light was a paste of pigment in our eyes.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And then there was a moon and then a scene<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">So watery as to seem submarine;<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">In which we two stood saturated, drowned.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The clover-mingled rowan on the ground<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Had taken all the water it could as dew,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And still the air was saturated too,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Its airy pressure turned to water weight.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Then a small rainbow like a trellis gate,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">A very small moon-made prismatic bow,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Stood closely over us through which to go.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And then we were vouchsafed the miracle<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">That never yet to other two befell<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And I alone of us have lived to tell.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">A wonder! Bow and rainbow as it bent,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Instead of moving with us as we went,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">(To keep the pots of gold from being found)<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">It lifted from its dewy pediment<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Its two mote-swimming many-colored ends,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">365<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And gathered them together in a ring.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And we stood in it softly circled round<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">From all division time or foe can bring<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">In a relation of elected friends.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">366<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">BUILD SOIL-A POLITICAL<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">PASTORAL<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">\Vhy Tityrus! But you've forgotten me.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Fm Meliboeus the potato man,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The one you had the talk with, you remember,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Here on this very campus years ago.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Hard times have struck me and I'm on the move.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Fve had to give my interval farm up<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">For interest, and I've bought a mountain farm<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">For nothing down, all-out-doors of a place,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">All woods and pasture only fit for sheep.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">But sheep is what Fm going into next.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Fm done forever with potato crops<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">At thirty cents a bushel. Give me sheep.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I know wool's down to seven cents a pound.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">But I don't calculate to sell my wool.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I didn't my potatoes. I consumed them.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">F1I dress up in sheep's clothing and eat sheep.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The Muse takes care of you. You live by writing<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Your poems on a farm and call that farming.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Oh I don't blame you. I say take life easy.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I should myself, only I don't know how.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">But have some pity on us who have to work.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Why don't you use your talents as a writer<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">To advertise our farms to city buyers,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Or else write something to improve food prices.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Get in a poem toward the next election.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">36?<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Oh Meliboeus, I have half a mind<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">To take a writing hand in politics.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Before now poetry has taken notice<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Of wars, and what are wars but politics<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Transformed from chronic to acute and bloody?<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I may be wrong, but Tityrus to me<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The times seem revolutionary bad.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The question is whether they've reached a depth<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Of desperation that would warrant poetry's<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Leaving love's alternations, joy and grief,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The weather's alternations, summer and winter,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Our age-long theme, for the uncertainty<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Of judging who is a contemporary liar<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Who in particular, when all alike<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Get called as much in clashes of ambition.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Life may be tragically bad, and I<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Make bold to sing it so, but do I dare<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Name names and tell you who by name is wicked?<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Whittier's luck with Skipper Ireson awes me.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Many men's luck with Greatest Washington<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">(Who sat for Stuart's portrait, but who sat<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Equally for the nation's Constitution).<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I prefer to sing safely in the realm<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Of types, composite and imagined people:<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">To affirm there is such a thing as evil<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Personified, but ask to be excused<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">From saying on a jury here's the guilty.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">368<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I doubt it you're convinced the times are bad.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I keep my eye on Congress, Meliboeus.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">They're in the best position of us all<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">To know if anything is very wrong.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">1 mean they could be trusted to give the alarm<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">If earth were thought about to change its axis,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Or a star coming to dilate the sun.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">As long as lightly all their live-long sessions,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Like a yard full of school boys out at recess<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Before their plays and games were organized,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">They yelling mix tag, hide-and-seek, hop-scotch,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And leap frog in each other's way, all's well.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Let newspapers profess to fear the worst!<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Nothing's portentous, I am reassured.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Is socialism needed, do you think?<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">We have it now. For socialism is<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">An clement in any government.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">There's no such thing as socialism pure<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Except as an abstraction of the mind.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">There's only democratic socialism<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Monarchic socialism oligarchic,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The last being what they seem to have in Russia.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">You often get it most in monarchy,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Least in democracy. In practice, pure,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I don't know what it would be. No one knows.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I have no doubt like all the loves when<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Philosophized together into one-<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">One sickness of the body and the soul.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">369<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Thank God our practice holds the loves apart<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Beyond embarrassing self-consciousness<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Where natural friends are met, where dogs are<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">kept,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Where women pray with priests. There is no love.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">There's only love of men and women, love<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Of children, love of friends, of men, of God,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Divine love, human love, parental love,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Roughly discriminated for the rough.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Poetry, itself once more, is back in love.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Pardon the analogy, my Meliboeus,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">For sweeping me away. Let's see, where was I?<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">But don't you think more should be socialized<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Than is?<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">What should you mean by socialized?<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Made good for everyone things like inventions-<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Made so we all should get the good of them<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">All, not just great exploiting businesses.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">We sometimes only get the bad of them.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">In your sense of the word ambition has<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Been socialized the first propensity<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">To be attempted. Greed may well come next.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">But the worst one of all to leave uncurbed,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Unsocialized, is ingenuity:<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Which for no sordid self-aggrandizement,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">For nothing but its own blind satisfaction<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">370<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">(In this it is as much like hate as love)<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Works in the dark as much against as for us.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Even while we talk some chemist at Columbia<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Is stealthily contriving wool from jute<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">That when let loose upon the grazing world<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Will put ten thousand farmers out of sheep.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Everyone asks for freedom for himself,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The man free love, the business man free trade,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The writer and talker free speech and free press.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Political ambition has been taught,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">By being punished back, it is not free:<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">It must at some point gracefully refrain.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Greed has been taught a little abnegation<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And shalUbe more before we're done with it.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">It is just fool enough to think itself<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Self-taught. But our brute snarling and lashinj<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">taught it.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">None shall be as ambitious as he can.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">None should be as ingenious as he could,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Not if I had my say. Bounds should be set<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">To ingenuity for being so cruel<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">In bringing change unheralded on the unready,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I elect you to put the curb on it.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Were I dictator, I'll tell you what Fd do.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">What should you do?<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Fd let things take their course<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And then Fd claim the credit for the outcome.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">371<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">You'd make a sort of safety-first dictator.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Don't let the things I say against myself<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Betray you into taking sides against me,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Or it might get you into trouble with me.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Pm not afraid to prophesy the future,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And be judged by the outcome, Meliboeus.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Listen and I will take my dearest risk.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">We're always too much out or too much in.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">At present from a cosmical dilation<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">We're so much out that the odds are against<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Our ever getting inside in again.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">But inside in is where we've got to get.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">My friends all know Pm interpersonal.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">But long before Pm interpersonal<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Away 'way down inside Pm personal.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Just so before we're international<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">We're national and act as nationals.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The colors are kept unmixed on the palette,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Or better on dish plates all around the room,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">So the effect when they are mixed on canvas<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">May seem almost exclusively designed.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Some minds are so confounded intermental<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">They remind me of pictures on a palette:<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">'Look at what happened. Surely some God pinxit.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Come look at my significant mud pie.'<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">It's hard to tell which is the worse abhorrence<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Whether it's persons pied or nations pied.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Don't let me seem to say the exchange, the encounter,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">372<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">May not be the important thing at last.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">It well may be. We meet I don't say when<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">But must bring to the meeting the maturest,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The longest-saved-up, raciest, localest<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">We have strength of reserve in us to bring.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Tityrus, sometimes I'm perplexed myself<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">To find the good of commerce. Why should 1<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Have to sell you my apples and buy yours?<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">It can't be just to give the robber a chance<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">To catch them and take toll of them in transit.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Too mean a thought to get much comfort out of.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I figure that like any bandying<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Of words or toys, it ministers to health.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">It vory likely quickens and refines us.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">To market 'tis our destiny to go.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">But much as in the end we bring for sale there<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">There is still more we never bring or should bring;<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">More that should be kept backthe soil for<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">instance<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">In my opinion, though we both know poets<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Who fall all over each other to bring soil<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And even subsoil and hardpan to market.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">To sell the hay off, let alone the soil,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Is an unpardonable sin in farming.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The moral is, make a late start to market.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Let me preach to you, will you Meliboeus?<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Preach on. I thought you were already preaching.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">But preach and see if I can tell the difference.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">373<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Needless to say to you, my argument<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Is not to lure the city to the country.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Let those possess the land and only those,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Who love it with a love so strong and stupid<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">That they may be abused and taken advantage of<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And made fun of by business, law and art;<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">They still hang on. That so much of the earth's<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Unoccupied need not make us uneasy.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">We don't pretend to complete occupancy.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The world's one globe, human society<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Another softer globe that slightly flattened<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Rests on the world, and clinging slowly rolls.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">We have our own round shape to keep unbroken.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The world's size has no more to do with us<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Than has the universe's. We arc balls,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">We are round from the same source of roundness.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">We are both round because the mind is round,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Because all reasoning is in a circle.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">At least that's why the universe is round.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">If what you're preaching is a line of conduct,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">[ust what am I supposed to do about it?<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Reason in circles?<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">No, refuse to be<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Seduced back to the land by any claim<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The land may seem to have on man to use it.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Let none assume to till the land but farmers.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I only speak to you as one of them.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">You shall go to your run-out mountain farm,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">374<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Poor cast-away of commerce, and so live<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">That none shall ever see you come to market-<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Not for a long long time. Plant, breed, produce,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">But what you raise or grow, why feed it out,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Eat it or plow it under where it stands<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">To build the soil. For what is more accursed<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Than an impoverished soil pale and metallic?<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">What cries more to our kind for sympathy?<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I'll make a compact with you, Meliboeus,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">To match you deed for deed and plan for plan.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Friends crowd around me with their five year plans<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">That Soviet Russia has made fashionable.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">You come to me and I'll unfold to you<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">A five year plan I call so, not because<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">It takes ten years or so to carry out,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Rather because it took five years at least<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">To think it out. Come close, let us conspire-<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">In self-restraint, if in restraint of trade.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">You will go to your run-out mountain farm<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And do what I command you, I take care<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">To command only what you meant to do<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Anyway. That is my style of dictator.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Build soil. Turn the farm in upon itself<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Until it can contain itself no more,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">But sweating-full, drips wine and oil a little.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I will go to my run-out social mind<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And be as unsocial with it as I can.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The thought I have, and my first impulse is<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">To take to market I will turn it under.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The thought from that thought 1 will turn it under<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">375<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">so on to the limit of my nature.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">We are too much out, and if we won't draw in<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">We shall be driven in. I was brought up<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">A state-rights free-trade Democrat. What's that ?<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">An inconsistency. The state shall be<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Laws to itself, it seems, and yet have no<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Control of what it sells or what it buys.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Suppose someone comes near me who in rate<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Of speech and thinking is so much my better<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I am imposed on, silenced and discouraged.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Do I submit to being supplied by him<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">As the more economical producer,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">More wonderful, more beautiful producer?<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">No. I unostentatiously move off<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Far enough for my thought-flow to resume.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Thought product and food product are to me<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Nothing compared to the producing of them<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I sent you once a song with the refrain:<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Let me be the one<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">To do what is done<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">My share at least lest I be empty-idle.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Keep off each other and keep each other off.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">You see the beauty of my proposal is<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">It needn't wait on general revolution.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I bid you to a one-man revolution<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The only revolution that is coming.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">We're too unseparate out among each other<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">With goods to sell and notions to impart.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">376<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">A youngster comes to me with half a quatrain<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">To ask me if I think it worth the pains<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Of working out the rest, the other half.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I am brought guaranteed young prattle poems<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Made publicly in school, above suspicion<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Of plagiarism and help of cheating parents.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">We congregate embracing from distrust<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">As much as love, and too close in to strike<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And be so very striking. Steal away<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The song says. Steal away and stay away.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Don't join too many gangs. Join few if any.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Join the United States and join the family<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">But not much in between unless a college.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Is it a bargain, Shepherd Meliboeus?<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Probably but you're far too fast and strong<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">For my mind to keep working in your presence.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I can tell better after I get home,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Better a month from now when cutting posts<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Or mending fence it all comes back to me<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">What I was thinking when you interrupted<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">My life-train logic. I agree with you<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">We're too unseparate. And going home<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">From company means coming to our senses.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">377<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">A MISSIVE MISSILE<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Oome one in ancient Mas cT Azil<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Once took a little pebble wheel<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And dotted it with red for me,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And sent it to me years and years<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">A million years to be precise<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Across the barrier of ice:<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Two round dots and a ripple streak,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">So vivid as to seem to speak.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">But what imperfectly appears<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Is whether the two dots were tears,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Two tear drops, one for either eye,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And the wave line a shaken sigh.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">But no, the color used is red.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Not tears but drops of blood instead.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The line must be a jagged blade.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The sender must have had to die,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And wanted some one now to know<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">His death was sacrificial- votive.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">So almost clear and yet obscure.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">If only anyone were sure<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">A motive then was still a motive.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">O you who bring this to my hand,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">You are no common messenger<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">(Your badge of office is a spade).<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">It grieves me to have had you stand<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">So long for nothing. No reply<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">There is no answer, I'm afraid,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">378<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Across the icy barrier<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">For my obscure petitioner.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
