<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Suppose his ghost is standing by<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Importunate to give the hint<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And be successfully conveyed.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">How anyone can fail to see<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Where perfectly in form and tint<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The metaphor, the symbol lies!<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Why will I not analogize?<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">(I do too much in some men's eyes.)<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Oh slow uncomprehending me,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Enough to make a spirit moan<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Or rustle in a bush or tree.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I have the ochre- written flint,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The two dots and the ripple line.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The meaning of it is unknown,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Or else I fear entirely mine,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">All modern, nothing ancient in't,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Unsatisfying to us each.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Far as we aim our signs to reach,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Far as we often make them reach,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Across the soul-from-soul abyss,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">There is an aeon-limit set<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Beyond which they are doomed to miss.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Two souls may be too widely met.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">That sad-with-distance river beach<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">"With mortal longing may beseech;<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">It cannot speak as far as this.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">379<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">A Witness Tree<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">BEECH<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">rVhere my imaginary line<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Bends square in woods., an iron spine<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And pile of real rocks have beenfounded.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And off this corner in the wild,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Where these are driven in and piled,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">One tree, by being deeply wounded,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Has been impressed as Witness Tree<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And made commit to memory<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">My proof of being not unbounded.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Thus truth's established and borne out,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Though circumstanced with dark and doubt-<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Though by a world of doubt surrounded.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">THE MOODIE FORESTER<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">SYCAMORE<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Zaccheus he<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Did climb the tree<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Our Lord to see.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">THE I EW F. NGLAND PRIMER<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">383<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">THE SILKEN TENT<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">is as in a field a silken tent<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">At midday when a sunny summer breeze<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Has dried the dew and all its ropes relent,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">So that in guys it gently sways at ease,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And its supporting central cedar pole,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">That is its pinnacle to heavenward<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And signifies the sureness of the soul,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Seems to owe naught to any single cord,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">But strictly held by none, is loosely bound<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">By countless silken ties of love and thought<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">To everything on earth the compass round,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And only by one's going slightly taut<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">In the capriciousness of summer air<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Is of the slightest bondage made aware.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">385<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">ALL REVELATION<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">A head thrusts in as for the view,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">But where it is it thrusts in from<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Or what it is it thrusts into<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">By that Cyb'laean avenue,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And what can of its coming come,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And whither it will be withdrawn,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And what take hence or leave behind,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">These things the mind has pondered on<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">A moment and still asking gone.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Strange apparition of the mind!<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">But the impervious geode<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Was entered, and its inner crust<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Of crystals with a ray cathode<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">At every point and facet glowed<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">In answer to the mental thrust.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Eyes seeking the response of eyes<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Bring out the stars, bring out the flowers,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Thus concentrating earth and skies<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">So none need be afraid of size.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">All revelation has been ours.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">386<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">HAPPINESS MAKES UP IN HEIGHT<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">FOR WHAT IT LACKS IN LENGTH<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Oh, stormy stormy world,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The days you were not swirled<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Around with mist and cloud.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Or wrapped as in a shroud,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And the sun's brilliant ball<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Was not in part or all<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Obscured from mortal view-<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Were days so very few<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I can but wonder whence<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I get the lasting sense<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Ot so much warmth and light.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">If my mistrust is right<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">It may be altogether<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">From one day's perfect weather,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">When starting clear at dawn,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The day swept clearly on<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">To finish clear at eve.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I verily believe<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">My fair impression may<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Be all from that one day<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">No shadow crossed but ours<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">As through its blazing flowers<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">We went from house to wood<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">For change of solitude.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">38?<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">COME IN<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">rVs I came to the edge of the woodsJ<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Thrush music hark! '<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Now if it was dusk outside,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Inside it was dark.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Too dark in the woods for a bird<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">By sleight of wing<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">To better its perch for the night,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Though it still could sing.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The^last of the light of the sun<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">That had died in the west^<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Still lived for one song more<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">In a thrush's breast.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Far in the pillared dark<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Thrush music went<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Almost like a call to come in<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">To the dark and lament.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">But no, I was out for stars:<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I would not come in.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">\ meant not even if asked,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">\nd I hadn't been.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I COULD GIVE ALL TO TIME<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">To Time it never seems that he is brave<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">To set himself against the peaks of snow<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">To lay them level with the running wave,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Nor is he overjoyed when they lie low,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">But only grave, contemplative and grave.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">What now is inland shall be ocean isle,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Then eddies playing round a sunken reef<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Like the curl at the corner of a smile;<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And I could share Time's lack of joy or grief<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">At such a planetary change of style.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I could give all to Time except except<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">What I myself have held. But why declare<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The things forbidden that while the Customs slept<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I have crossed to Safety with? For I am There,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And what I would not part with I have kept.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">389<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">CAKPE DIEM<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Age saw two quiet children<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Go loving by at twilight,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">He knew not whether homeward.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Or outward from the village,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Or (chimes were ringing) churchward.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">He waited (they were strangers)<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Till they were oat of hearing<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">To bid them both be happy.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">u Be happy, happy, happy,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And seize the day of pleasure."<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The age-long theme is Age's.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">'Twas Age imposed on poems<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Their gather-roses burden<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">To warn against the danger<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">That overtaken lovers<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">From being overflooded<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">With happiness should have it<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And yet not know they have it.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">But bid life seize the present?<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">It lives less in the present<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Than in the future always,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And less in both together<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Than in the past. The present<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Is too much for the senses,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Too crowding, too confusing<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">;Too present to imagine.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">390<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">THE WIND AND THE RAIN<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">1 hat far-off day the leaves in flight<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Were letting in the colder light.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">A season-ending wind there blew<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">That as it did the forest strew<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I leaned on with a singing trust<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And let it drive me deathward too.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">V/ith breaking step I stabbed the dust,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Yet did not much to shorten stride.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I sang of deathbut had I known<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The many deaths one must have died<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Before he came to meet his own!<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Oh, should a child be left unwarned<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">That any song in which he mourned<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Would be as if he prophesied?<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">It were unworthy of the tongue<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">To let the half of life alone<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And play the good without the ill.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And yet 'twould seem that what is sung<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">In happy sadness by the young<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">F"ate has no choice but to fulfill.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">II *<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Flowers in the desert heat<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Contrive to bloom<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">On melted mountain water led by flume<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">To wet their feet.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">391<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">But something in it still is incomplete.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Before I thought the wilted to exalt<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">With water I would see them water-bowed.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I would pick up all ocean less its salt,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And though it were as much as cloud could bear<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">"Would load it on to cloud,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And rolling it inland on roller air,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Would empty it unsparing on the flower<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">That past its prime lost petals in the flood,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">(Who cares but for the future of the bud?)<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And all the more the mightier the shower<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Would run in under it to get my share.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">*Tis not enough on roots and in the mouth,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">But give me water heavy on the head<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">In all the passion of a broken drouth.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And there is always more than should be said.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">As strong is rain without as wine within,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">As magical as sunlight on the skin.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I have been one no dwelling could contain<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">When there was rain;<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">But I must forth at dusk, my time of day,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">To see to the unburdening of skies.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Rain was the tears adopted by my eyes<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">That have none left to stay.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">392<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">THE MOST OF IT<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Jrle thought he kept the universe alone;<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">For all the voice in answer he could wake<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Was but the mocking echo of his own<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">From some tree-hidden cliff across the lake.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Some morning from the boulder-broken beach<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">He would cry out on life, that what it wants<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Is not its own love back in copy speech,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">But counter-love, original response.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And nothing ever came of what he cried<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Unless it was the embodiment that crashed<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">In the cliff's talus on the other side,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And then in the far distant water splashed,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">But after a time allowed for it to swim,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Instead of proving human when it neared<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And someone else additional to him,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">As a great buck it powerfully appeared,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Pushing the crumpled water up ahead,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And landed pouring like a waterfall,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And stumbled through the rocks with horny tread,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And forced the underbrush and that was all.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">393<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">NEVER AGAIN WOULD<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">BIRDS' SONG BE THE SAME<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">lie would declare and could himself believe<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">That the birds there in all the garden round<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">From having heard the daylong voice of Eve<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Had added to their own an oversound,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Her tone of meaning but without the words.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Admittedly an eloquence so soft<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Could only have had an influence on birds<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">When call or laughter carried it aloft.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Be that as may be, she was in their song<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Moreover her voice upon their voices crossed<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Had now persisted in the woods so long<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">That probably it never would be lost.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Never again would birds' song be the same.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And to do that to birds was why she came.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">394<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">WILFUL HOMING<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">It is getting dark and time he drew to a house,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">But the blizzard blinds him to any house ahead.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The storm gets down his neck in an icy souse<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">That sucks his breath like a wicked cat in bed.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The snow blows on him and off him, exerting force<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Downward to make him sit astride a drift,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Imprint a saddle and calmly consider a course.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">He peers out shrewdly into the thick and swift.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Since he means to come to a door he will come to a<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">door,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Although so compromised of aim and rate<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">He may fumble wide of the knob a yard or more,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And to those concerned he may seem a little late,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">395<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">A CLOUD SHADOW<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">A breeze discovered my open book<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And began to flutter the leaves to look<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">For a poem there used to be on Spring.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I tried to tell her "There's no such thing!"<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">For whom would a poem on Spring be by?<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The breeze disdained to make reply;<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And a cloud-shadow crossed her face<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">For fear I would make her miss the place.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">396<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">THE QUEST OF THE<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">PURPLE-FRINGED<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I felt the chill of the meadow underfoot,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">But the sun overhead;<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And snatches of verse and song of scenes like this<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I sung or said.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I skirted the margin alders for miles and miles<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">In a sweeping line.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The day was the day by every flower that blooms,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">But I saw no sign.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Yet further I went to be before the scythe,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">For the grass was high;<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Till I saw the path where the slender fox had come<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And gone panting by.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Then at last and following him I found-<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">In the very hour<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">When the color flushed to the petals it must have<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">been<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The far-sought flower.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">There stood the purple spires with no breath of air<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Nor headlong bee<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">To disturb their perfect poise the livelong day<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">'Neath the alder tree.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">397<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">i only knelt and putting the boughs aside<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Looked., or at most<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Counted them all to the buds in the copse's depth<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">That were pale as a ghost.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Then I arose and silently wandered home,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And I for one<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Said that the fall might come and whirl of leaves.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">For summer was done.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">398<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">THE GIFT OUTRIGHT<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">1 he land was ours before we were the land's.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">She was our land more than a hundred years<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Before we were her people. She was ours<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">In Massachusetts, in Virginia,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">But we were England's, still colonials,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Possessing what we still were unpossessed by,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Possessed by what we now no more possessed.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Something we were withholding made us weak<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Until we found it was ourselves<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">We were withholding from our land of living,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And forthwith found salvation in surrender.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Such as we were we gave ourselves outright<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">(The deed of gift was many deeds of war)<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">To the land vaguely realizing westward,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">But still unstoried, artless, uiienhanced,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Such as she was, such as she would become.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">399<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">TRIPLE BRONZE<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">ihe Infinite's being so wide<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Is the reason the Powers provide<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">For inner defense my hide.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">For next defense outside<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I make myself this time<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Of wood or granite or lime<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">A wall too hard for crime<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Either to breach or climb.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Then a number of us agree<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">On a national boundary.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And that defense makes three<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Between too much and me.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">400<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">OUR HOLD ON THE PLANET<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">\Ve asked for rain. It didn't flash and roar.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">It didn't lose its temper at our demand<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And blow a gale. It didn't misunderstand<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And give us more than our spokesman bargained<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">for;<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And just because we owned to a wish for rain,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Send us a flood and bid us be damned and drown.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">It gently threw us a glittering shower down.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And when we had taken that into the roots of grain,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">It threw us another and then another still<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Till the spongy soil again was natal wet.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">We may doubt the just proportion of good to ill.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">There is much in nature against us. But we forget:<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Take nature altogether since time began,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Including human nature, in peace and war,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And it must be a little more in favor of man,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Say a fraction of one per cent at the very least,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Or our number living wouldn't be steadily more,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Our hold on the planet wouldn't have so increased.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">401<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">TO A YOUNG WRETCH<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">(BOETHIAN)<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">As gay for you to take your father's axe<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">As take his gun rod to go hunting fishing.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">You nick my spruce until its fiber cracks.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">It gives up standing straight and goes down swishing.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">You link an arm in its arm and you lean<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Across the light snow homeward smelling green.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">[ could have bought you just as good a tree<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">To frizzle resin in a candle flame,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And what a saving 'twould have meant to me.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">But tree by charity is not the same<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">As tree by enterprise and expedition.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I must not spoil your Christmas with contrition.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">It is your Christmases against my woods.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">But even where thus opposing interests kill,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">They are to be thought of as opposing goods<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Oftener than as conflicting good and ill;<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Which makes the war god seem no special dunce<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">For always fighting on both sides at once.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And though in tinsel chain and popcorn rope,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">My tree a captive in your window bay<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Has lost its footing on my mountain slope<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And lost the stars of heaven, may, oh, may<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The symbol star it lifts against your ceiling<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Help me accept its fate with Christmas feeling.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">AO2<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">THE LESSON FOR TODAY<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">If this uncertain age in which we dwell<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Were really as dark as I hear sages tell,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And I convinced that they were really sages,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I should not curse myself with it to hell,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">But leaving not the chair I long have sat in,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I should betake me back ten thousand pages<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">To the world's undebatably dark ages,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And getting up my mediaeval Latin,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Seek converse common cause and brotherhood<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">(By all that's liberalI should, I should)<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">With poets who could calmly take the fate<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Of being born at once too early and late,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And for these reasons kept from being great.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Yet singing but Dione in the wood<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And uer aspergit terramfloribus<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">They slowly led old Latin verse to rhyme<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And to forget the ancient lengths of time,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And so began the modern world for us.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Td say, O Master of the Palace School,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">You were not Charles' nor anybody's fool:<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Tell me as pedagogue to pedagogue*<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">You did not know that since King Charles did rule<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">You had no chance but to be minor, did you?<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Your light was spent perhaps as in a fog<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">That at once kept you burning low and hid you.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The age may very well have been to blame<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">For your not having won to Virgil's fame.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">403<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">But no one ever heard you make the claim.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">You would not think you knew enough to judge<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The age when full upon you. That's my point.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">We have to-day and I could call their name<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Who know exactly what is out of joint<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">To make their verse and their excuses lame.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">They've tried to grasp with too much social fact<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Too large a situation. You and I<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Would be afraid if we should comprehend<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And get outside of too much bad statistics<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Our muscles never could again contract:<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">We never could recover human shape,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">But must live lives out mentally agape,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Or die of philosophical distension.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">That's how we feel and we're no special mystics.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">We can't appraise the time in which we act.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">But for the folly of it, let's pretend<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">We know enough to know it for adverse.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">One more millennium's about to end.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Let's celebrate the event, my distant friend,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">In publicly disputing which is worse,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The present age or your age. You and I<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">As schoolmen of repute should qualify<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">To wage a fine scholastical contention<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">As to whose age deserves the lower mark,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Or should I say the higher one, for dark.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I can just hear the way you make it go:<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">There's always something to be sorry for,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">A sordid peace or an outrageous war.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">404<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Yes, yes, of course. We have the same convention.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The groundwork of all faith is human woe.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">It was well worth preliminary mention.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">There's nothing but injustice to be had,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">No choice is left a poet, you might add,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">But how to take the curse, tragic or comic.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">It was well worth preliminary mention.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">But let's get on to where our cases part,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">If part they do. Let me propose a start.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">(We're rivals in the badness of our case,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Remember, and must keep a solemn face.)<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Space ails us moderns: we are sick with space,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Its contemplation makes us out as small<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">As a brief epidemic of microbes<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">That in a good glass may be seen to crawl<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The patina of this the least of globes.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">But have we there the advantage after all?<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">You were belittled into vilest worms<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">God hardly tolerated with his feet;<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Which comes to the same thing in different terms.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">We both are the belittled human race,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">One as compared with God and one with space,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I had thought ours the more profound disgrace;<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">But doubtless this was only my conceit.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The cloister and the observatory safnt<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Take comfort in about the same complaint.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">So science and religion really meet.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I can just hear you call your Palace class:<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Come learn the Latin Eheu for alas.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">403<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">You may not want to use it and you may.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">O paladins, the lesson for to-day<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Is how to be unhappy yet polite.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And at the summons Roland, Olivier,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And every sheepish paladin and peer,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Being already more than proved in fight,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Sits down in school to try if he can write<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Like Horace in the true Horatian vein,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Yet like a Christian disciplined to bend<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">His mind to thinking always of the end.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Memento mori and obey the Lord.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Art and religion love the somber chord.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Earth's a hard place in which to save the soul,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And could it be brought under state control,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">So automatically we all were saved,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Its separateness from Heaven could be waive<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">It might as well at once be kingdom-come.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">(Perhaps it will be next millennium.)<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">But these are universals, not confined<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">To any one time, place, or human kind.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">We're either nothing or a God's regret.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">As ever when philosophers are met,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">No matter where they stoutly mean to get,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Nor what particulars they reason from,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">They are philosophers, and from old habit<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">They end up in the universal Whole<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">As unoriginal as any rabbit.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">406<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
