<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">One age is like another for the soul.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I'm telling you. You haven't said a thing,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Unless I put it in your mouth to say.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Fm having the whole argument my way<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">But in your favorplease to tell your King-<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">In having granted you all ages shine<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">With equal darkness, yours as dark as mine.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I'm liberal. You, you aristocrat<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Won't know exactly what I mean by that.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I mean so altruistically moral<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I never take my own side in a quarrel.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Fd lay my hand on his hand on his staff,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Lean back and have my confidential laugh,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And tell him I had read his Epitaph.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">It sent me to the graves the other day.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The only other there was far away<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Across the landscape with a watering pot<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">At his devotions in a special plot.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And he was there resuscitating flowers<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">(Make no mistake about its being bones);<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">But I was only there to read the stones<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">To see what on the whole they had to say<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">About how long a man may think to live,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Which is becoming my concern of fete.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And very wide the choice they seemed to give;<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The ages ranging all the way from hours<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">To months and years and many many years.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">One man had lived one hundred years and eight.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">But though we all may be inclined to wait<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">407<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And follow some development of state,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Or see what comes of science and invention,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">There is a limit to our time extension.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">We all are doomed to broken-off careers,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And so's the nation, so's the total race.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The earth itself is liable to the fate<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Of meaninglessly being broken off.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">(And hence so many literary tears<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">At which my inclination is to scoff. )<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I may have wept that any should have died<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Or missed their chance, or not have been their best,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Or been their riches, fame, or love denied;<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">On me as much as any is the jest.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I take my incompleteness with the rest.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">God bless himself can no one else be blessed.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I hold your doctrine of Memento Mori.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And were an epitaph to be my story<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I'd have a short one ready for my own.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I would have written of me on my stone:<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I had a lovers quarrel with the world.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">408<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">TIME OUT<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">It took that pause to make him realize<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The mountain he was climbing had the slant<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">As of a book held up before his eyes<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">(And was a text albeit done in plant).<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Dwarf cornel, gold-thread, and maianthemum,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">He following fingered as he read,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The flowers fading on the seed to come;<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">But the thing was the slope it gave his head:<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The same for reading as it was for thought,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">So different from the hard and level stare<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Of enemies defied and battles fought.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">It was the obstinately gentle air<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">That may be clamored at by cause and sec*.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">But it will have its moment to reflect.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">409<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">TO A MOTH SEEN IN WINTER<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Here's first a gloveless hand warm from my pocket,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">A perch and resting place 'twixt wood and wood,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Bright-black-eyed silvery creature, brushed with<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">brown,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The wings not folded in repose, but spread.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">(Who would you be, I wonder, by those marks<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">If I had moths to friend as I have flowers?)<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And now pray tell what lured you with false hope<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">To make the venture of eternity<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And seek the love of kind in winter time?<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">But stay and hear me out. I surely think<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">You make a labor of flight for one so airy,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Spending yourself too much in self-support.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Nor will you find love either nor love you.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And what I pity in you is something human,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The old incurable untimeliness,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Only begetter of all ills that are.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">But go. You are right. My pity cannot help.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Go till you wet your pinions and are quenched.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">You must be made more simply wise than I<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">To know the hand I stretch impulsively<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Across the gulf of well nigh everything<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">May reach to you, but cannot touch your fate.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I cannot touch your life, much less can save,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Who am tasked to save my own a little while.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">CIRCA 1900<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">410<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">A CONSIDERABLE SPECK<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">(MICROSCOPIC)<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">A speck that would have been beneath my sight<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">On any but a paper sheet so white<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Set off across what I had written there.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And I had idly poised my pen in air<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">To stop it with a period of ink<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">When something strange about it made me think,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">This was no dust speck by my breathing blown,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">But unmistakably a living mite<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">With inclinations it could call its own.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">It paused as with suspicion of my pen,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And then came racing wildly on again<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">To where my manuscript was not yet dry;<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Then paused again and either drank or smelt<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">"With loathing, for again it turned to fly.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Plainly with an intelligence I dealt.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">It seemed too tiny to have room for feet,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Yet must have had a set of them complete<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">To express how much it didn't want to die.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">It ran with terror and with cunning crept.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">It faltered: I could see it hesitate;<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Then in the middle of the open sheet<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Cower down in desperation to accept<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Whatever I accorded it of fate.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I have none of the tenderer-than-thou<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Collectivistic regimenting love<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">With which the modern world is being swept.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">411<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">But this poor microscopic item now!<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Since it was nothing I knew evil of<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I let it lie there till I hope it slept.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I have a mind myself and recognize<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Mind when I meet with it in any guise.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">No one can know how glad I am to find<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">On any sheet the least display of mind.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">412<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">THE LOST FOLLOWER<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">As I have known them passionate and fine<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The gold for which they leave the golden line<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Of lyric is a golden light divine,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Never the gold of darkness from a mine.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The spirit plays us strange religious pranks<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">To whatsoever god we owe the thanks.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">No one has ever failed the poet ranks<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">To link a chain of money-metal banks.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The loss to song, the danger of defection<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Is always in the opposite direction.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Some turn in sheer, in Shelleyan dejection<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">To try if one more popular election<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Will give us by short cut the final stage<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">That poetry with all its golden rage<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">For beauty on the illuminated page<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Has failed to bring I mean the Golden Age.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And if this may not be (and nothing's sure),<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">At least to live ungolden with the poor,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Enduring what the ungolden must endure.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">This has been poetry's great anti-lure.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The muse mourns one who went to his retreat<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Long since in some abysmal city street,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">413<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The bride who shared the crust he broke to eat<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">As grave as he about the world's defeat.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">With such it has proved dangerous as friend<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Even in a playful moment to contend<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">That the millennium to which you bend<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">In longing is not at a progress-end<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">By grace of state-manipulated pelf,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Or politics of Ghibelline or Guelph,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">But right beside you book-like on a shelf,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Or even better god-like in yourself.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">He trusts my love too well to deign reply.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">But there is in the sadness of his eye,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Something about a kingdom in the sky<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">(As yet unbrought to earth) he means to try.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">414<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">NOVEMBER<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">\Ve saw leaves go to glory,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Then almost migratory<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Go part way down the lane,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And then to end the story<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Get beaten down and pasted<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">In one wild day of rain.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">We heard " 'Tis over" roaring.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">A year of leaves was wasted.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Oh, we make a boast of storing,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Of saving and of keeping,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">But only by ignoring<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The waste of moments sleeping,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The waste of pleasure weeping,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">By denying and ignoring<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The waste of nations warring.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">1938<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">415<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">THE RABBIT HUNTER<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">(Careless and still<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The hunter lurks<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">With gun depressed,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Facing alone<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The alder swamp?<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Ghastly snow-white.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And his hound works<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">In the ofiing there<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Like one possessed,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And yelps delight<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And sings and romps,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Bringing him on<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The shadowy hare<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">For him to rend<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And deal a death<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">That he nor it<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">(Nor I) have wit<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">To comprehend.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">4*6<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">A LOOSE MOUNTAIN<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">(TELESCOPIC)<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">JDid you stay up last night (the Magi did)<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">To see the star shower known as Leonid<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">That once a year by hand or apparatus<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Is so mysteriously pelted at us?<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">It is but fiery puffs of dust and pebbles,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">No doubt directed at our heads as rebels<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">In having taken artificial light<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Against the ancient sovereignty of night.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">A fusillade of blanks and empty flashes,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">It never reaches earth except as ashes<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Of which you feel no least touch on your face<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Nor find in dew the slightest cloudy trace.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Nevertheless it constitutes a hint<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">That the loose mountain lately seen to glint<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">In sunlight near us in momentous swing<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Is something in a Balearic sling<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The heartless and enormous Outer Black<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Is still withholding in the Zodiac<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">But from irresolution in his back<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">About when best to have us in our orbit,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">So we won't simply take it and absorb it.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">417<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">IT IS ALMOST THE YEAR<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">TWO THOUSAND<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">To start the world of old<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">We had one age of gold<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Not labored out of mines,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And some say there are signs<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The second such has come,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The true Millennium,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The final golden glow<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">To end it. And if so<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">(And science ought to know)<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">We well may raise our heads<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">From weeding garden beds<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And annotating books<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">To watch this end de luxe.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">418<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">ON OUR SYMPATHY WITH<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">THE UNDER DOG<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Jrirst under up and then again down under,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">We watch a circus of revolving dogs<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">No senator dares in to kick asunder<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Lest both should bite him in the toga-togs.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">419<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">A QUESTION<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">A voice said. Look me in the stars<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And tell me truly, men of earth,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">If all the soul-and-body scars<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Were not too much to pay for birth.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">42O<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">BOEOTIAN<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I love to toy with the Platonic notion<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">That wisdom need not be of Athens Attic,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">But well may be Laconic., even Boeotian.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">At least I will not have it systematic.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">421<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">THE SECRET SITS<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">\Ve dance round in a ring and suppose,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">But the Secret sits in the middle and knows.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">422<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">A SEMI-REVOLUTION<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">1 advocate a semi-revolution.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The trouble with a total revolution<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">(Ask any reputable Rosicrucian)<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Is that it brings the same class up on top.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Executives of skillful execution<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Will therefore plan to go half-way and stop.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Yes, revolutions are the only salves,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">But they're one thing that should be done by halves<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">423<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">ASSURANCE<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The danger not an inch outside<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Behind the porthole's slab of glass<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And double ring of fitted brass<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">L trust feels properly defied.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">4/24<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">AN ANSWER<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">But Islands of the Blessed, bless you son,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I never came upon a blessed one.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">425<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">TRESPASS<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">INO, I had set no prohibiting sign,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And yes, my land was hardly fenced.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Nevertheless the land was mine:<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I was being trespassed on and against.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Whoever the surly freedom took<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Of such an unaccountable stay<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Busying by my woods and brook<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Gave me strangely restless day.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">He might be opening leaves of stone.,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The picture-book of the trilobite,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">For which the region round was known,,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And in which there was little property right.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">'Twas not the value I stood to lose<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">In specimen crab in specimen rock,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">But his ignoring what was whose<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">That made me look again at the clock.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Then came his little acknowledgment:<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">He asked for a drink at the kitchen door,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">An errand he may have had to invent,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">But it made my property mine once more.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">426<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">A NATURE NOTE<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Jr our or five whippoorwills<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Have come down from their native ledge<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">To the open country edge<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">To give us a piece of their bills.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Two in June were a pair<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">You'd say sufficiently loud,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">But this was a family crowd,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">A full-fledged family affair.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">All out of time pell-mell!<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I wasn't in on the joke<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Unless it was coming to folk<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">To bid us a mock farewell.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I took note of when it occurred,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The twenty-third of September,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Their latest that I remember,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">September the twenty-third.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">427<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">OF THE STONES OF THE PLACE<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">1 farm a pasture where the boulders lie<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">As touching as a basket full of eggs.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And though they're nothing anybody begs,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I wonder if it wouldn't signify<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">For me to send you one out where you live<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">In wind-soil to a depth of thirty feet,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And every acre good enough to eat,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">As fine as flour put through a baker's sieve.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I'd ship a smooth one you could slap and chafe,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And set up like a statue in your yard,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">An eolith palladium to guard<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The West and keep the old tradition safe.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Carve nothing on it. You can simply say<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">In self-defense to quizzical inquiry:<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">"The portrait of the soul of my gransir Ira.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">It came from where he came from anyway."<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">A SERIOUS STEP LIGHTLY TAKEN<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Between two burrs on the map<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Was a hollow-headed snake.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The burrs were hills, the snake was a stream,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And the hollow head was a lake.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And the dot in front of a name<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Was what should be a town.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And there might be a house we could buy<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">For only a dollar down.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">With two wheels low in the ditch<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">We left our boiling car,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And knocked at the door of a house we found,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And there to-day we are.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">It is turning three hundred years<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">On our cisatlantic shore<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">For family after family name.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">We'll make it three hundred more<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">For our name farming here,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Aloof yet not aloof,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Enriching soil and increasing stock,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Repairing fence and roof;<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">429<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">A hundred thousand days<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Of front-page paper events,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">A half a dozen major wars,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And forty-five presidents.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">430<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">THE LITERATE FARMER AND THE<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">PLANET VENUS<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">A Dated Popular-Science Medley<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">on a Mysterious Light Recently Observed in the<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Sky at Evening<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">JVly unexpected knocking at the door<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Started chairs thundering on the kitchen floor,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Knives and forks ringing on the supper plates,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Voices conflicting like the candidates.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">A mighty farmer flung the house door wide,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">He and a lot of children came outside,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And there on an equality we stood.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">That's the time knocking at a door did good.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">"I stopped to compliment you on this star<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">You get the beauty of from where you are.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">To see it so, the bright and only one<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">In sunset light, you'd think it was the sun<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">That hadn't sunk the way it should have sunk,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">But right in heaven was slowly being shrunk<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">So small as to be virtually gone,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Yet there to watch the darkness coming on<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Like someone dead permitted to exist<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Enough to see if he was greatly missed.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I didn't see the sun set. Did it set?<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Will anybody swear that isn't it?<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And will you give me shelter for the night?<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">If not, a glass of rnilk will be all right. "<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">431<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">4 'Traveler, I'm glad you asked about that light.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Your mind mistrusted there was something wrong,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And naturally you couldn't go along<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Without inquiring if 'twas serious.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">'Twas providential you applied to us,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Who were just on the subject when you came.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">There is a star that's Serious by name<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And nature too, but this is not the same.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">This light's been going on for several years,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Although at times we think it disappears.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">You'll hear all sorts of things. You'll meet with them<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Will tell you it's the star of Bethlehem<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Above some more religion in a manger.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">But put that down to superstition, Stranger.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">What's a star doing big as a baseball?<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Between us two it's not a star at all.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">It's a new patented electric light,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Put up on trial by that Jerseyite<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">So much is being now expected of,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">To give developments the final shove<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And turn us into the next specie folks<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Are going to be, unless these monkey jokes<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Of the last fifty years are all a libel,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And Darwin's proved mistaken, not the Bible.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I s'pose you have your notions on the vexed<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Question of what we're turning into next."<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">"As liberals we're willing to give place<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">To any demonstrably better race,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">No matter what the color of its skin.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">432<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">(But what a human race the white has been!)<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I heard a fellow in a public lecture<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">On Pueblo Indians and their architecture<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Declare that if such Indians inherited<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The condemned world the legacy was merited.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">So far as he, the speaker, was concerned<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">He had his ticket bought, his passage earned,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">To take the Mayflower back where he belonged<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Before the Indian race was further wronged.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">But come, enlightened as in talk you seem,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">You don't believe that that first-water gleam<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Is not a star?"<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">''Believe it? Why, I know it.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Its actions any cloudless night will show it.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">You'll see it be allowed up just so high,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Say about halfway up the western sky,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And then get slowly, slowly pulled back down.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">You might not notice if you've lived in town,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">As I suspect you have. A town debars<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Much notice of what's going on in stars.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The idea is no doubt to make one job<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Of lighting the whole night with one big blob<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Of electricity in bulk the way<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The sun sets the example in the day."<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">"Here come more stars to character the skies,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And they in the estimation of the wise<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Are more divine than any bulb or arc,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">433<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Because their purpose is to flash and spark.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">But not to take away the precious dark.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">We need the interruption of the night<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">To ease attention off when overtight,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">To break our logic in too long a flight,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And ask us if our premises are right."<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">"Sick talk, sick talk, sick sentimental talk!<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">It doesn't do you any good to walk.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">I see what you are: can't get you excited<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">With hopes of getting mankind unbenighted.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Some ignorance takes rank as innocence.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Have it for all of me and have it dense.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The slave will never thank his manumitter;<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Which often makes the manumitter bitter.''<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">u ln short, you think that star a patent medicine<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Put up to cure the world by Mr. Edison."<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">"You said it that's exactly what it is.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">My son in Jersey says a friend of his<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Knows the old man and nobody's so deep<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">In incandescent lamps and ending sleep.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The old man argues science cheapened speed.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">A good cheap anti-dark is now the need.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Give us a good cheap twenty-four-hour day,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">No part of which we'd have to waste, I say,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And who knows where we can't get! Wasting time<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">In sleep or slowness is the deadly crime.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">He gave up sleep himself some time ago,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">434<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="s1"></span><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">It puffs the face and brutalizes so.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">You take the ugliness all so much dread,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Called getting out of the wrong side of bed.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">That is the source perhaps of human hate,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And well may be where wars originate.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Get rid of that and there' d be left no great<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Of either murder or war in any land.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">You know how cunningly mankind is planned:<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">We have one loving and one hating hand.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The loving's made to hold each other like,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">While with the hating other hand we strike.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The blow can be no stronger than the clutch,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">Or soon we'd bat each other out of touch,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And the fray wouldn't last a single round.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And still it's bad enough co badly wound,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And if our getting up to start the day<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">On the right side of bed would end the fray,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">We'd hail the remedy. But it's been tried<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And found, he says, a bed has no right side.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">The trouble is, with that receipt for love,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">A bed's got no right side to get out of.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">We can't be trusted to the sleep we take,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">And simply must evolve to stay awake.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">He thinks that chairs and tables will endure,<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">But beds in less than fifty years he's sure<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">There will be no such piece of furniture.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">He's surely got it in for cots and beds.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">No need for us to rack our common heads<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">About it, though. We haven't got the mind.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="s1">It best be left to great men of his kind<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span></p>
